original: Masters of the Atom
translation: 原子之主

original: We have used the world's first nuclear weapon, firmly placing us in the lead of the current arms race. Our immense efforts have paid off, and for now the world will have no choice but to marvel at our power. They might some day match us, but we have ensured they will never outmatch us.
translation: 我们使用了世界上第一个核武器，现在，我们就是军备竞赛中的领先者了。种种的努力都取得了成果，当今世界将会不得不敬畏我们的力量。或许有一天他们会赶上我们，但是我们绝对不会让他们超过我们。

original: Pound our enemies into dust!
translation: 让我们的敌人灰飞烟灭！

original: In the Shadow of Others
translation: 落于下风

original: Others have used the world's first nuclear weapon, placing them firmly in the lead of the current arms race. Despite our best efforts, we are left with no defense and no means of retaliation. Utterly outmatched, we have no choice but to redouble our efforts and bridge the gap before they can unleash much more of this devastation.
translation: 有其他国家使用了世界上第一个核武器，而成为军备竞赛中的领先者。尽管我们作出了种种努力，但我们现在失去了防御和报复打击的能力，落于下风。在他们可以带来更多的毁灭之前，我们必须加紧脚步，缩小与他们的差距。

original: The program must get all we can spare.
translation: 我们必须全力投入这个项目。

original: Powerful Friends
translation: 强力盟友

original: Our allies have used the world's first nuclear weapon, firmly placing our alliance in the lead of the current arms race. Though we have been outmatched, the weapon is mastered by our ally, ensuring our ability to retaliate should any enemy master the atom, themselves.
translation: 我们的盟友已经使用了世界第一个核武器，我们的同盟由此成为了军备竞赛中的领先者。尽管我们落于下风，但是掌握这个武器的是我们的盟友。假如我们的敌人也掌握了原子的力量，我们也会有打击报复的能力。

original: An acceptable outcome.
translation: 一个可以接受的结果。

original: Icelandic Independence
translation: 冰岛独立

original: With the severance of contact after the invasion, the Icelandic Parliament has taken control of the nation's own foreign affairs. This is understood to be a temporary measure, until the end of the occupation.
translation: 遭到入侵后与冰岛的联系断绝了，现在冰岛议会直接掌控了他们国家的外交事务。这被认为是军事占领结束之前的临时手段。

original: Good luck to them.
translation: 祝他们好运。

original: Iceland Takes Control of Foreign Affairs
translation: 冰岛掌控外交事务

original: With the capitulation of its union partner Denmark, the Icelandic Parliament has taken control of its own foreign affairs, and in doing so has essentially become a fully independent nation. The newly-elected provisional governor has already proclaimed Icelandic neutrality in the current conflict, despite the invasion of its parent nation.
translation: 在丹麦沦陷后，它的联统国家冰岛就掌握了他们自己的外交事务。如此，他们便从根本上成为了一个完全独立的国家。尽管其母国丹麦遭受了侵略，新获选的冰岛临时总督仍然在当前的冲突中宣布中立。

original: Neutrality did not save Denmark.
translation: 保持中立并没有保护丹麦。

original: The MacDonald Proposal
translation: 麦克唐纳提案

original: With the current war putting a strain on British convoys, our Eastern neighbours have become increasingly anxious for the use of our air and naval bases, from which they hope to expand their protective coverage of their convoy routes. A British envoy by the name of Malcolm MacDonald has now arrived to propose the return of Northern Ireland to sovereign Irish control, in return for our immediate entry into the war on the side of the United Kingdom.
translation: 当前的战争给英国的航运造成了极大的压力。为了扩大自己对航路的保护规模，这位东方的邻居已经越来越迫切地想要使用我们的海军和空军基地了。一位英国的使者，马尔科姆·麦克唐纳，提议归还我们北爱尔兰的主权，以换取我们在这场战争中对不列颠的同盟。

original: An excellent idea.
translation: 好主意。

original: The prize is not worth the cost.
translation: 得不偿失。

original: British Demand French Fleet
translation: 英国索要法国舰队

original: British fleets have appeared outside our fleet's main harbors, and we have received an ultimatum demanding the immediate surrender of our navy. If we do not sail our ships to British ports immediately, the British admiral has threatened to open fire.
translation: 英国的舰队出现在我们舰队的主要停泊港口前面，我们收到了来自他们的最后通牒：立刻移交我们的海军。如果我们不立刻将我们的船只驶向英国的港口，英国的海军统帅可能就会开火。

original: We have no other choice...
translation: 我们别无他选……

original: We shall never let any other nation take our fleet!
translation: 我们绝不会让其他国家带走我们的舰队！

original: French Surrender Fleet
translation: 法国交出舰队

original: The French have made the wise decision to sail their ships to our ports. We now have complete control over the French fleet.
translation: 法国人聪明地将他们的舰队开到了我们的港口。我们已经完全控制了法国海军。

original: At least we kept it out of the hands of the Germans.
translation: 至少德国人是得不到她们了。

original: French Reject Ultimatum
translation: 法国人拒绝了最后通牒

original: The French have rejected our demands. We are now left with the an unenviable choice of backing down or turning on our erstwhile allies...
translation: 法国人拒绝服从我们的要求。我们现在要么就得退下，要么就得背叛我们曾经的盟友了。

original: We cannot allow the French fleet to serve German interests!
translation: 我们绝不允许法国舰队为德国的利益奔走！

original: This is too unpalatable. We must back down.
translation: 真不是滋味。我们只能撤离了。

original: French Surrender Fleet
translation: 法国交出舰队

original: Yesterday, British naval units blockaded their French counterparts in important naval bases in North Africa, issuing an ultimatum for the French to sail to British ports immediately and surrender control of their fleet, or the British would open fire upon their former ally. Faced with superior firepower, the French accepted the ultimatum, and their fleet is now under British control.
translation: 昨日，英国海军将法国海军封锁于他们在位于北非的重要军港中，并向他们递交了一份最后通牒，要求他们立刻驶向英国港口并且交出舰队控制权，否则英国舰队就会向他们曾经的盟友开火。在拥有强大火力优势英国人面前，法国接受了通牒。现在他们的舰队已经交由英国控制。

original: A wise decision.
translation: 明智之举。

original: Luckily bloodshed was averted.
translation: 所幸这一场血腥屠戮得以避免。

original: How dare they?!
translation: 他们好大的胆子！

original: We had no choice.
translation: 我们别无他选。

original: They will continue the fight under the British.
translation: 他们会在英国人的指挥下继续战斗。

original: British Attack at Mers-el-Kébir
translation: 英国在凯比尔港发动攻击

original: Yesterday, British naval units blockaded their French counterparts in important naval bases in North Africa, issuing an ultimatum for the French to sail to British ports immediately and surrender control of their fleet, or the British would open fire upon their former ally. Upon French rejection of the British demands, an exchange of gunfire took place that sank at least one French battleship and severely damaged sizeable portions of the French fleet.
translation: 昨日，英国海军将法国海军封锁于他们在位于北非的重要军港中，并向他们递交了一份最后通牒，要求他们立刻驶向英国港口并且交出舰队控制权，否则英国舰队就会向他们曾经的盟友开火。法国人拒绝了英国的要求后，双方开始交火。相当一部分法国舰队遭受了非常严重的打击，至少一艘法国战列舰被击沉。

original: We did what had to be done.
translation: 我们做了必须做的事情。

original: This is outrageous!
translation: 真是骇人听闻！

original: We may have underestimated them.
translation: 我们可能低估了他们。

original: We will not soon forget this treachery!
translation: 我们不会忘记这场背叛！

original: They have proven their resolve.
translation: 他们证明了自己的决心。

original: Ireland Accepts MacDonald Proposal
translation: 爱尔兰接受麦克唐纳提案

original: The Irish Government has accepted our proposal, and have joined our cause in return for Northern Ireland.
translation: 爱尔兰政府接受了我们的提案，为了换取北爱尔兰的回归，他们加入了我们的事业。

original: Ireland Rejects MacDonald Proposal
translation: 爱尔兰拒绝了麦克唐纳提案

original: The Irish Government has rejected our proposal, refusing to join our fight for Democracy.
translation: 爱尔兰政府拒绝了我们的提案，不愿加入我们为民主事业的斗争中。

original: Who will help them when the Germans come for them?
translation: 等到德国人来了谁还能帮助他们？

original: American Emergency Arms Deliveries
translation: 美国紧急军备送达

original: The American government, with the gracious support of the American Committee for Defense of British Homes, has sent us an emergency shipment of old rifles, equipment, and some artillery pieces. It is too varied an assortment to be of true use for our army, but they will no doubt go a long way to hastily equipping the Home Guard garrissons.
translation: 在美国国会防御英国本土委员会的慷慨支持下，美国政府向我们送来了一批带有旧步枪、装备和火炮组件的紧急装备。对我们的军队来说，这批装备的类型太过杂乱，不大可能真的会派上用场。但是这批装备一定会帮助我们为本土防卫驻军快速准备军备。

original: They have saved us from invasion!
translation: 多谢他们的协助，我们得以免于入侵！

original: Wehrmacht Officers Challenge Hitler
translation: 国防军军官挑战希特勒

original:
Latent dissatisfaction with Hitler's rule has come to a head with the current crisis, caused by the administration's move to remilitarize the Rhineland. A number of Wehrmacht generals have rallied behind the well-known Field Marshal August von Mackensen, who has put in motion plans aiming to depose Hitler, and to remove the Nazi party from Germany.

With the split in the German high command becoming clearly apparent even abroad, foreign powers have elected not to protest against the remilitarization, more concerned with the growing internal German instability. The aging Field Marshal has moved quickly, already establishing a provisional government, to which scores have flocked in their opposition to the Nazi government.

The military coup is already well on its way.
translation:
在让莱茵兰重新军事化的政府行动后，对希特勒统治的潜在不满已经在这场危机中浮出水面了。一批国防军将领集结在德高望重的奥古斯特·冯·马肯森元帅之下，决定实施一系列计划以除掉希特勒，把纳粹党赶出德国。

因为德国高级军官的分裂就是在国外也众人皆知，外国势力也决定不再反对莱茵兰的重新军事化，而是更担忧德国内部的政治动荡。老元帅的势力进展十分迅速，已经建立起了一个自治政府，从来自反对纳粹政府的人们那获得了大量支持。

看起来这场军事政变已经箭在弦上了。

original: Purge this Nazi scum from our lands!
translation: 把这个纳粹渣滓赶出我们的国土！

original: German Expatriates Join the Cause
translation: 德国流亡者加入事业

original: After the recent harsh treatment and forced expatriation in their home country, many of our displaced German comrades have flocked to our environs. With some leadership, we have managed to create a number of divisions from these eager recruits, and they now stand ready to fight our enemies!
translation: 在遭受苛刻的压迫、被强制逐出国境后，许多被放逐的德国同胞来到了我们这里。在我们的领导下，我们成功地让这些人组建起数支师团，他们已经准备好对抗我们的敌人了！

original: Germany Lifts Exile of Wilhelm II
translation: 德国取消对威廉二世的流放

original: Germany has invited Wilhelm II to return to his fatherland as Kaiser. With recent tumultuous events, this may aid the Germans in establishing peace and stability to their nation. The eyes of the world are upon us, however, as many have not forgotten the terrific conflict the old Kaiser plunged us into a mere two decades ago.
translation: 德国邀请威廉二世以德皇的身份回到家乡重新登基。或许这可以帮助德国从最近的动荡中恢复过来，建立和平与稳定。然而，世界的眼光也已聚焦到我们身上，许多人并没有忘记二十年前老皇帝将我们卷入其中的骇人战争。

original: We must allow him to return and lead his people.
translation: 我们应该允许他回国领导他的人民。

original: We must stop him - we cannot risk another Great War.
translation: 我们必须阻止他——我们不想引起另一场世界大战。

original: Kaiser Returns to Germany
translation: 皇帝回到德国

original: In the midst of extatic celebrations, Wilhelm II has returned as Kaiser to the German Empire! The Netherlands is owed a debt of gratitude for allowing him safe refuge these past decades, and for refusing his extradition to our former enemies on multiple occasions. Though the nation has suffered much in the recent civil war, it is hoped that the Kaiser's return will bring further stability and unity.
translation: 在民众欣喜若狂的庆祝下，威廉二世返德复位了！在过去的数十年里，荷兰政府为陛下提供了一处避风港，多次拒绝引渡陛下给我们的前敌，我们深深地感激他们。尽管我们的国家在这场内战中伤痕累累，皇帝的回归或许能为我们带回稳定与团结。

original: He shall undoubtedly lead the nation well.
translation: 毫无疑问，他一定会贤明地领导我们的国家。

original: Netherlands Prevents Return of the Kaiser
translation: 荷兰拒绝皇帝回国

original: The dastardly Netherlands, having so long nobly offered Wilhelm II refuge, have now blocked the Kaiser's attempts at crossing the border to Germany, and have escorted him back to his residence, Huis Doorn. The Dutch cite concerns for the stability of the continent as their reasons for denying the Kaiser's return to the German throne.
translation: 尽管假作高尚地为威廉二世提供避难之处这么多年，卑鄙的荷兰人现在竟把皇帝从边界上拦了下来，并把他遣送回他自己的府邸多伦庄园。荷兰人用“担忧危害欧洲大陆的稳定”这样的借口拒绝皇帝返德复位。

original: We shall give them some more immediate concerns!
translation: 我们这就给他们一些“担忧”瞧瞧！

original: Perhaps they have a point... We have other candidates.
translation: 或许他们说的在理……我们还有其他人选。

original: The old Kaiser may well be able to aid his son in his rule.\n
translation: 老皇帝还是可以辅佐他的儿子进行统治的。\n

original: Wilhelm II Freed
translation: 威廉二世获得自由

original: Our forces, after clearing the area surrounding Huis Doorn of Dutch forces, found the Kaiser in good health and returned him to Germany in motor convoy. Wilhelm II triumphantly crossed the border only a few hours ago, and solemnly accepted the responsibilities of Kaiser of the German Empire upon his arrival in Berlin.
translation: 在我们的军队清除了多伦庄园周边残存的荷兰军队后，我们找到了毫发无伤的皇帝，用摩托部队护送他回到了德国。数个小时前，威廉二世胜利跨过德荷边境。抵达柏林后，他庄严地接受了作为德意志帝国皇帝的义务。

original: None shall stop us.
translation: 已经没有人可以阻止我们了。

original: The fascist supporters start a civil war.\n
translation: 法西斯支持者发动内战。\n

original: Unchecked Economic Dependency on [From.GetName]
translation: 对[From.GetName]的极度经济依赖

original: With the gradual spiral deeper into [From.GetNameDef]'s sphere of influence, our economy has become more and more dependent on that of our ally. When, today, the Germans at last moved to take further control over our economy, we were powerless to stop them. As a result, German control over our foreign policy has reached unprecedented levels.
translation: 我们已经在不知不觉中深深地卷入了[From.GetNameDef]的势力范围内，这使得我们在经济上越来越依赖于我们的这位盟友。今天，德国人最终还是跨出这一步了，他们要求进一步地控制我们的经济，我们无力阻止他们。因此，德国对我国外交事务的控制达到了前所未有的程度。

original: We must make do with the situation... For now.
translation: 我们只得适应这种状况。至少现在是这样。

original: Germany Offers Support for Monarchist Coup
translation: 德国为君主制分子政变提供帮助

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has approached pro-monarchy and anti-fascist elements of the Italian government and the underground with plans for the assassination of Mussolini and the institution of Victor Emmanuel III as leader of the nation. The Germans ensure us they can handle the assassination; all we have to do is affirm our willingness to create a replacement government, and to pledge our future military support to German endeavours.
translation: 意大利政府和地下组织内的复辟主义者和反法西斯主义者得到了[From.GetNameDefCap]的支持，并且讨论了刺杀墨索里尼、将维克托·伊曼纽尔三世安置成为国家领袖的计划。德国人向我们保证他们能够完成刺杀任务，我们只需要保证我们有意愿建立一个新政府，以及愿意为未来德国的利益提供军事支持即可。

original: We must look to the Monarchy in the time ahead.
translation: 我们必须走向一个君主制的未来。

original: Preposterous! We will never abandon our ways!
translation: 荒谬！我们绝对不会放弃我们的道路！

original: Italians Accept Coup Proposal
translation: 意大利人接受了政变提议

original: Elements in the Italian government and underground have accepted our proposal for a coup. They are making preparations for a swift siezure of power for the King, as soon as the assassination has happened.
translation: 意大利政府和地下组织内的复辟主义者和反法西斯主义者已经接受了我们的政变提议。他们正在为政权转移做准备，以保证刺杀成功后，国王可以迅速夺取权力。

original: We can set our plans in motion.
translation: 可以开始启动计划了。

original: Italians Reject Coup Proposal
translation: 意大利人拒绝了政变提议

original: The elements of the Italian government and underground we contacted have told us, in not too gentle terms, that they are uninterested in our proposal for a coup. They have threatened to reveal our plans to the Italian government if we dare make the same offer again.
translation: 意大利政府和地下组织内的复辟主义者和反法西斯主义者毫不客气地告诉我们，他们对我们的政变提议毫无兴趣。他们还威胁道，倘若我们胆敢再提，他们就要向意大利政府揭露我们的计划。

original: How unfortunate.
translation: 真是不幸。

original: German Assassination of Mussolini
translation: 德国人刺杀墨索里尼

original: The German plan has been put in action and Mussolini was shot in his car in the streets of Rome today. King Victor Emmanuel III has taken the reins of the nation, and has pledged to join the Central Powers alongside [From.GetNameDef].
translation: 德国人的计划开始实施了，今天墨索里尼在罗马的街道上坐车巡视时被人枪杀。维克托·伊曼纽尔三世已经掌握了国家的政权，保证与[From.GetNameDef]携手共建旧同盟国。

original: We must show our gratitude.
translation: 我们必须感激他们。

original: Mussolini Assassination Succeeds
translation: 成功刺杀墨索里尼

original: Our plan has been executed flawlessly, and Victor Emmanuel III has taken up the mantle of leadership of his nation. His first act was to sign a treaty ensuring Italian entry into the Central Powers alliance.
translation: 我们的计划执行得简直完美无缺。现在维克托·伊曼纽尔三世已经披上领袖的披肩，开始领导他得国家。他实行的第一个政策就是签订意大利进入旧同盟国的协议。

original: The monarchies shall rise again!
translation: 君主制再次崛起了!

original: Reunification of Austria-Hungary
translation: 奥匈帝国的再统一

original: With our support, [From.GetOldName] has taken the lead in the reunification of the Austro-Hungarian empire. Treaties between the involved parties were signed this morning, undoing two decades of separatist sentiment. The new unified government immediately pledged their military support to our cause, becoming a member of the Central Powers.
translation: 在我们的帮助下，[From.GetOldName]已经开始着手重建奥匈帝国。昨天，相关方之间交换了意见，签署了条约，磨除了两个世纪的分离主义情绪。新成立的政府立刻承诺对我们事业提供军事协助，并成为了旧同盟国的一员。

original: Our old ally has returned to our side.
translation: 我们的老盟友回到了我们身边。

original: Germany Offers Guarantee for Territory
translation: 德国提出独立保障换取领土

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has approached us with an offer that they say may benefit both parties. In light of the current political situation, and the threat on our Eastern border, the Germans propose to issue a guarantee that they will come to our military aid in the event that we come to war with the Soviet Union. In return, they only ask for the return of their lost territories of Danzig and Poznan.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]向我们提出一份“对双方都有益”的提议。考虑到当下的政治形势，以及我国东边领土所遭受的威胁，德国人提议，假如我们与苏联开战的话，他们会为我们提供军事协助。作为交换，他们希望我们将他们失去的领土波兹南和但泽归还给他们。

original: Their military might is more use to us than land.
translation: 比起领土，我们更需要他们的军事力量。

original: We will never give up our lands!
translation: 我们永远不会让出哪怕一寸领土！

original: Poland Accepts Offer
translation: 波兰接受提议

original: The Poles have decided to accept our offer, and have made arrangements to transfer their border provinces to us. They have put their faith in us, and urge us to stand ready in case of Soviet aggression..
translation: 波兰人决定接受我们的请求，他们已经开始着手安排移交边界领土。他们把信任放到我们身上，要求我们随时准备应对苏联的入侵……

original: This blight of Versailles undone at last!
translation: 我们终于打破了凡尔赛协议的枷锁！

original: Poland Rejects Offer
translation: 波兰拒绝提议

original: The Poles have decided to reject our offer. In powerful language they have made it clear that they shall never relinquish their territory willingly, and would rather face any enemy alone if this is the price for help.
translation: 波兰人决定回绝我们的提议。他们义正言辞地、非常清楚地告诉我们，他们是绝对不会愿意交出自己的领土的，即使是要毫无帮助地独自面对敌人。

original: We will never relinquish our claims!
translation: 我们也决不会撤除我们的宣称！

original: Perhaps we must come to terms with it.
translation: 或许我们还是得接受这个结果。

original: German Communists Flee to France
translation: 德国共产党人逃往法国

original: The German government has cracked down on communism, and has banished them abroad. As a result we are now receiving a large influx of communist ideologues from our neighbour...
translation: 德国政府严厉打击了共产主义，并且把他们赶出了国境。因此，我们从我们的邻居那儿受到了大量的共产主义意识形态影响……

original: If only this doesn't destabilize the country too much...
translation: 只能希望不要太严重地影响国家稳定……

original: Nazi Leadership Captured
translation: 抓捕纳粹领导人

original: At long last we have freed our country from the grip of our enemies, and those loyal citizens who rose up to support our cause may now finally return to their homes. As a nation, we may begin the long and arduous process of rebuilding our nation. The country's leadership, in turn, is free to begin looking ahead at what might come in the future: democracy, or a return to the old monarchy.\n\nOne last thing remains to be taken care of, however. With the end of the civil war, our troops have managed to capture a large group of the Nazi leadership. Now, there only remains the decision of what to do with this unsavory part of our recent history.
translation: 终于，我们将国家从敌人手中解放了出来，那些支持我们事业的忠诚公民终于能够回到他们的家乡。国家再度统一，我们终于可以开始漫长而又艰辛的重建。国家的精英团体们也终于可以自由地讨论决定我国的未来：是民主，还是恢复过去的君主制。\n\n我们还剩下一件事需要关心。当内战结束之后，我们的部队成功抓捕了一大批纳粹领导。现在，我们要讨论一下到底将如何对待我国这段令人不齿的历史。

original: Hang them!
translation: 统统吊死！

original: Imprison them for life, they might come in useful in the future.
translation: 将他们终身囚禁，或许在未来他们还能派上用场。

original: Germany Speaks Out Against Soviet Union
translation: 德国公开反对苏联

original: Recent German rhetoric aimed against us has become increasingly harmful to our reputation in Europe. Slanderous accusations of our supposed 'aggression' are beginning to cause fear and misunderstanding of our intentions.
translation: 近来德国人反对我们的声音，已经对我们在欧洲的名声造成了越来越严重的不良影响。他们对我们“侵略”的诽谤指控，已经让很多人对我们的本意产生了恐惧和误解。

original: Start a series of huge military exercises to intimidate them all!
translation: 开始一系列的大型军事演习来震慑他们！

original: Military Exercises
translation: 军事演习

original: We must salvage our reputation and smooth relations.
translation: 我们必须抢救我们的名声，恢复我们的关系。

original: Smoothed Relationships
translation: 恢复关系

original: Do they think we care what they say of us?
translation: 他们还真觉得我们把他们的话当回事了？

original: Germany Creates Central European Alliance
translation: 德国组建中欧同盟

original: Continuing to embark on their slanderous campaign against us, the Germans have now announced the creation of a new alliance. There is little doubt it is aimed against us and that they mean to interfere with our sphere of influence.
translation: 为了继续针对我们的诽谤打击，卑鄙的德国人宣布他们组建起了一个新的同盟。毫无疑问，这个同盟旨在反对我们，并且绝对会介入我们的势力范围。

original: They better stay our of our sphere of influence!
translation: 他们最好不要触及我们的势力范围！

original: Reiterated Claims
translation: 重申宣称

original: We must not give them any excuse to escalate further.
translation: 我们不会再给他们激化事端的借口了。

original: Germans Invite Baltics
translation: 德国邀请波罗的海国家

original: Germans Invite Poland
translation: 德国邀请波兰

original: Germans Invite Finland
translation: 德国邀请芬兰

original: The Germans have offered membership to a nation in our immediate sphere of influence. The threat to the motherland is clear!
translation: 德国向我们势力范围内的一个国家提出了成为成员国的提议。他们明目张胆地威胁我们的祖国！

original: We must strike to secure the rest!
translation: 为了保住剩下的，我们必须出击！

original: Securing Sphere of Influence
translation: 确保势力范围

original: We cannot afford to antagonize the West.
translation: 我们不能让西方对我们产生敌意。

original: The Great Red Menace
translation: 赤色威胁

original: Through both official and unofficial channels, the Germans have made it clear that the Soviet Union is, and has been, the greatest threat to the stability of Europe since its inception two decades ago. They have urged us to remember that we are not alone in enduring the threat of communism, and that, if only the continent unites, we can beat down the Bear.
translation: 通过官方和非官方的渠道，德国已经明确地指出，自苏联二十年前建国以来，它就是欧洲稳定最大的威胁。他们向我们表示，时刻牢记我们在共产主义的威胁面前永远不是孤单的。他们还说，如果整个大陆团结起来，我们就能击倒巨熊。

original: Let us hope they are right.
translation: 希望他们是对的。

original: Soviet Union Smooths Relations
translation: 苏联正在恢复关系

original: The Soviet Union has made a concerted effort to alleviating the concerns of European nations. With a public announcement they have claimed they do not have any hostile intentions, and hope that their restrained reaction to the belligerent German rhetoric will speak for them.
translation: 苏联正在竭力去除欧洲国家的担忧。他们发布了一个声明，表示自己绝无敌意，希望他们他们对德国人的挑衅说辞能够保持克制的态度。

original: That remains to be seen.
translation: 后续进展有待观察。

original: Wilhelm II Dies
translation: 威廉二世驾崩

original: Last night Wilhelm II, our beloved Kaiser, passed away peacefully in his sleep. Despite his long exile, providence had seen fit to allow his return to the fatherland well before his death, and ever since his return he had led our nation well. His son, Friedrich Wilhelm, has now taken up the reins of the nation, and after his coronation will become known as Wilhelm III.
translation: 昨晚，威廉二世，我们敬爱的皇帝，在睡梦中平静地离开了人世。虽然他长期流亡在外，天意使然，他在这最后的日子里回到了祖国父亲的怀抱，之后也贤明地领导着我们的国家。他的儿子，弗雷德里希·威廉，现在已经开始掌握国家权力。在登基之后，他正式以威廉三世为世人所知。

original: Long live the Kaiser!
translation: 皇帝万岁！

original: August Von Mackensen Dies
translation: 奥古斯特·冯·马肯森逝世

original: Last night August von Mackensen, our most esteemed field marshal, passed away peacefully in his sleep. His celebrated exploits in the Great War and in ousting the fascist oppressor from our homeland, will long be remembered. The exiled Kaiser's son, Friedrich Wilhelm, has filled the power vacuum of the nation, and after his coronation will become known as Wilhelm III, ruling the Empire as the first Kaiser since the 1918 abdication of his father.
translation: 昨晚，我们尊敬的大元帅，奥古斯特·冯·马肯森在睡梦中平静地去世了。他在大战中的赫赫战功，以及把法西斯压迫者赶出国家的贡献，将会是我们国家长久的记忆。流亡皇帝威廉的儿子，弗雷德里希·威廉，弥补了我国的权力真空。在正式登基之后，他正式以威廉三世为世人所知。他将是1918年以来，在他父亲退位之后的第一位欧洲皇帝。

original: Germany Lifts Exile of Wilhelm II
translation: 德国取消对威廉二世的流放

original: The German Empire has lifted the exile of Wilhelm II, and has now approached the Netherlands for the return of the old Kaiser. It seems that, despite numerous extradition appeals to the Dutch government to hold him accountable for starting the Great War, the warmongerer will return to take the reins of the German Empire.
translation: 德意志帝国解除了对威廉二世的流放，向荷兰要求引渡老皇帝。尽管荷兰政府收到了无数的引渡要求，要让这位发动第一次世界大战的人伏法，然而现在，这位战争狂人似乎要回到德国掌握政权了。

original: The German Empire has lifted the exile of Wilhelm II, and has now approached the Netherlands for the return of the old Kaiser. In the face of Dutch refusal to allow his return, they have now escalated this to a military conflict!
translation: 德意志帝国解除了对威廉二世的流放，向荷兰要求引渡老皇帝。然而荷兰人拒绝了他们的引渡请求，而这件事已经要升级到军事冲突了！

original: They shall not stand alone! Rally the British to war!
translation: 不要让他们单打独斗！不列颠公民集结起来加入战争！

original: The German Empire has lifted the exile of Wilhelm II, and has now approached the Netherlands for the return of the old Kaiser. It seems that, despite numerous extradition appeals to the Dutch government to hold him accountable for starting the Great War, the warmongerer will return to take the reins of the German Empire.\n\nThe French have already decided that this is unacceptable, and seem intent on issuing an ultimatum backed by military force. Popular opinion in Britain is against a war, but if we refuse to stand by the French our alliance with them will be dissolved.
translation: 德意志帝国解除了对威廉二世的流放，向荷兰要求引渡老皇帝。尽管荷兰政府收到了无数的引渡要求，要让这位发动第一次世界大战的人伏法，然而现在，这位战争狂人似乎要回到德国掌握政权了。\n\n法国人已经做出决定，声明这是一个不可接受的行为，似乎他们将要提出一份军事力量保底的最后通牒。尽管英国人总体的民意是反对战争，但如果我们拒绝站在法国人一边的话，我们的联盟就会破碎。

original: The German Empire has lifted the exile of Wilhelm II, and has now approached the Netherlands for the return of the old Kaiser. In the face of Dutch refusal to allow his return, they have now escalated this to a military conflict!\n\nThe French have already decided that this is unacceptable, and seem intent on issuing an ultimatum backed by military force. Popular opinion in Britain is against a war, but if we refuse to stand by the French our alliance with them will be dissolved.
translation: 德意志帝国解除了对威廉二世的流放，向荷兰要求引渡老皇帝。然而荷兰人拒绝了他们的引渡请求，而这件事已经要升级到军事冲突了！\n\n法国人已经做出决定，声明这是一个不可接受的行为，似乎他们将要提出一份军事力量保底的最后通牒。尽管英国人总体的民意是反对战争，但如果我们拒绝站在法国人一边的话，我们的联盟就会破碎。

original: We must come to the aid of the Dutch!
translation: 我们必须帮助荷兰人！

original: The German Empire has lifted the exile of Wilhelm II, and has now approached the Netherlands for the return of the old Kaiser. It seems that, despite numerous extradition appeals to the Dutch government to hold him accountable for starting the Great War, the warmongerer will return to take the reins of the German Empire.\n\nThe French seem content to limit their response to this outrage to diplomatic objections, and public opinion in Britain is firmly against a war.
translation: 德意志帝国解除了对威廉二世的流放，向荷兰要求引渡老皇帝。尽管荷兰政府收到了无数的引渡要求，要让这位发动第一次世界大战的人伏法，然而现在，这位战争狂人似乎要回到德国掌握政权了。\n\n法国人似乎仅仅满足于进行一份怒不可遏的外交抗议，而英国公众的意见也明确反对战争。

original: The British are refusing to support us against Germany, claiming that the question of German monarchy is an internal one. If we go to war with the Germans, it looks like we will be on our own.\n\nPublic opinion in France is against a war, but Germany will only grow stronger, and the return of the Kaiser may well elicit renewed imperialist sentiment. Issuing an ultimatum would be less threatening without Britain on our side. Should we proceed against them alone?
translation: 英国拒绝支持我们对抗德国的行动，声称德国的君主复辟只是他们的内政。如果执意要向德国开战，那我们似乎只能靠自己了。\n\n尽管法国国内的民意总体是反战的，但是德国只会变得更强大。皇帝的归位甚至还可能引发新一轮的帝国主义情绪。现在英国人拒绝站在我们一边，颁布最后通牒就不具有那么大的威胁性。我们应不应该单独对抗德国人？

original: Though popular support for a war is lacking in Britain, the British government has recognized the threat posed by the Germans and they have offered us their full support. We will issue a final ultimatum to Germany to prevent a return of the warmongerer Kaiser. If they refuse, it is time for our forces to drive deep into Germany and put an end to their tyrannical regime!
translation: 尽管缺乏对战争的公众支持，英国政府还是意识到了德国的威胁，并已经为我们提供了完全的支持。我们会向德国颁布一份最后通牒，不让这位战争狂人皇帝轻易得逞。如果他们拒绝，那就是我们将部队开进德国，终结他们暴政的时候！

original: The British and French have refused to accept the return of our Kaiser, calling it an 'outrage' that the supposed instigator of the Great War is allowed to return to his throne. They are mobilizing their forces against us and have issued an ultimatum that our forces back down at once and return the Kaiser to his exile, or our nations are at war.
translation: 英国人和法国人拒绝接受皇帝归位，声称道，这位第一次世界大战的发起者竟然还能回到他的皇位，真是“骇人听闻”。他们正在动员自己的部队来反对我们，并且颁布了一份最后通牒，要求我们的部队立刻撤下，并且立刻重新流放皇帝，不然我们的国家就要进入战争状态了。

original: We cannot back down! Long live the Kaiser!
translation: 我们不会退下的！皇帝陛下万岁！

original: The British have seen reason and accepted the return of the Kaiser, but the mad French are refusing to back down! Claiming that this incident constitutes a direct threat against the security of their nation, they are mobilizing their forces and may sweep in across the border at any moment! We are at war!
translation: 英国人理解了我们的决定，接受了皇帝归位的事实，但是疯狂的法国人并不打算收手！他们声称这一事件将会是对他们国家严重的威胁。他们已经动员起了部队，随时都可能穿过边界！我们已经处于战争状态了！

original: Despite our clarification that the return of Wilhelm II to the German throne would be viewed as an act of war, Germany has refused to back down and return their Kaiser into exile, ignoring our warning. This means that despite our best efforts to maintain peace, war has once again broken out in Europe.
translation: 尽管我们声明了威廉二世的复辟就是发动战争，但德国忽略了我们的威胁，并没有要退缩和再度流放德皇的意思。这意味着，尽管我们长期以来一直在维持和平，欧洲大陆的战争已经不可避免地再次开始了

original: Germans Demand Return of Qingdao
translation: 德国要求归还青岛

original: The German Empire has spewed more and more rhetoric lately, urging for a return to colonialism. They have now, through diplomatic channels, issued a demand for the return of their old enclave in Qingdao. Perhaps we can use this to come to a lucrative arrangement...
translation: 德意志帝国内部关于恢复殖民政策的呼声越来越大。他们现在通过外交手段，要求我们归还他们在青岛的飞地。或许我们能以此来达成一些有利可图的安排……

original: Demand the continued support of Von Falkenhausen in return.
translation: 要求冯·法尔肯豪森的继续支持。

original: Perhaps they will be useful to have in the area.
translation: 或许他们在该地区的军事存在会派上用场。

original: We will never again give up our sovereign territory!
translation: 我们绝不会再次割让我们的主权领土！

original: China Offers Qingdao Trade
translation: 中方提出青岛协议

original: Chinese officials have contacted us with an offer of a potential trade, which they say will satisfy both parties. They propose to return Qingdao to rightful German hands, in return for a guarantee that we will not recall Von Falkenhausen's mission.
translation: 中国官员向我们提供了一份潜在的交易提案，他们认为这份提案能使得双方都满意。他们提出将青岛合法地返还到的德国手中，以保证我们不会撤销冯·法尔肯豪森的任务。

original: We can agree to that.
translation: 我们可以同意。

original: No, we must keep our options open.
translation: 不行，我们应当考虑所有可能的选择。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Rejects Qingdao Demand
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝了青岛要求

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has utterly rejected our demands for the return of Qingdao. We will have no choice but to seek its return at a later date.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]完完全全拒绝了归还青岛的要求。我们只能指望它能够在未来的某个日子回到我们手中。

original: We can be patient.
translation: 我们可以有耐心点。

original: Germany Accepts Qingdao Trade
translation: 德国同意青岛协议

original: The German Empire has accepted our proposal for a trade for Qingdao. They have guaranteed us the continued support of Von Falkenhausen.
translation: 德意志帝国接受了我们关于青岛的相关协议，并保证冯·法尔肯豪森会继续帮助我们。

original: Germany Rejects Qingdao Trade
translation: 德国拒绝青岛协议

original: The German Empire has rejected our proposal for a trade for Qingdao. They must not have desired their enclave very badly.
translation: 德意志帝国拒绝了我们关于青岛的相关协议。他们肯定没有那么渴望得到这块飞地。

original: Germans Demand Return of Qingdao
translation: 德国要求归还青岛

original: The German Empire has spewed more and more rhetoric lately, urging for a return to colonialism. Despite the nature of their loss of Qingdao - our seizure of it in 1914 - the Germans have now decided to open diplomatic negotiations, requesting the return of their old enclave in Qingdao. Perhaps we can use this to come to a lucrative arrangement...
translation: 德意志帝国内部关于恢复殖民政策的呼声越来越大。尽管他们已经失去了青岛——那里在1914年被我们夺取，如今德国人打算开始外交谈判以期他们能收回在青岛的飞地。或许我们可以以此来达成一些有利可图的安排……

original: Demand the Germans withdraw Von Falkenhausen in return.
translation: 要求德国撤回冯·法尔肯豪森。

original: They will never set foot in the Far East again!
translation: 他们休想再踏上远东一步！

original: Japan Offers Qingdao Trade
translation: 日方提出青岛协议

original: Japanese officials have contacted us with an offer of a potential trade, which they say will satisfy both parties. They propose to return Qingdao to rightful German hands, in return for the immediate withdrawal of Von Falkenhausen's mission in China.
translation: 日方官员向我们提供了一份潜在的交易提案，他们认为这项提案能令双方都满意，他们提出将青岛合法地返还到的德国手中，并让我们立刻终止冯·法尔肯豪森在中国的活动。

original: The German Empire has accepted our proposal for a trade for Qingdao. They have immediately withdrawn the mission of Von Falkenhausen to China.
translation: 德意志帝国接受了我们关于青岛的相关协议，他们将立刻终止冯·法尔肯豪森在中国的活动并令其撤出中国。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Accepts Demands
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]接受要求

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has accepted our demands, and arranged for the immediate return of Qingdao to German hands!
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经接受了我们的要求，并着手开始安排青岛回到帝国手中！

original: Nazi Expulsion Takes Heavy Toll on [nazi_state_withdrawn.GetName]
translation: 驱逐纳粹对[nazi_state_withdrawn.GetName]造成了重大的损失

original: We have finally managed to secure control over [nazi_state_withdrawn.GetName], but fighting has been severe. The Nazis grow ever more fanatical and desperate as we advance, often fighting until the surrounding area lies in ruins. There have also been reports of scorched-earth tactics, in accordance with Hitler's 'Nerobefehl'.\n\nWe can undoubtedly expect further destruction on this scale until we end this war.
translation: 我们终于设法控制了[nazi_state_withdrawn.GetName]，但战况根本不容乐观。阻碍我们前进的纳粹越来越狂热绝望，每场战斗都会让战区化为一片焦土。随着希特勒发布“尼禄法令”，他们使用焦土战术的报道越来越多。\n\n毫无疑问，直到我们终结这场战争之前，我们可能还会见到这般规模的毁灭。

original: A small price to rid our fatherland of them.
translation: 为了把这些渣滓从祖国中清理出去，这只是一些微不足道的代价

original: Hitler Found Dead
translation: 希特勒死亡

original: With the capture of Berlin, our troops discovered the corpse of Hitler in a bunker in the city. Choosing death over seeing anti-fascist elements take over the country, the leader evidently took his own life rather than risk capture.\n\nIn his stead, Heinrich Himmler has now stepped up to lead the Nazis, and he has already affirmed that the government will not abate in their fight against 'anti-German treason'.
translation: 占领柏林之后，我们的部队在一处掩体内发现了希特勒的尸体。在看到国家被反法西斯势力接管时，这位领导人最终结束自己的生命而不是铤而走险逃亡。\n\n他死后，海因里希·希姆莱开始领导纳粹党，并且明确表示帝国政府对这场“反德叛乱”绝不姑息。

original: It is the beginning of the end for the Nazis.
translation: 这是纳粹党末日的开始。

original: Reinstate the Captured Nazi Leadership?
translation: 恢复被囚禁的纳粹党领导层？

original: The war has become so protracted and devastating that now all adult Germans have been called upon to serve. Though they may not fit in with our ideological views, the captured Nazi leadership does possess skills that may prove useful to us in this time of need.\n\nWe could make them an offer to regain their freedom after the war, in return for lending their skills to our cause now.
translation: 战争变得越来越漫长而且越来越具有破坏性，现在每一位成年的德国人都被迫入伍。虽然我们和被囚禁的纳粹党领导层有意识形态上的差异，但他们确实拥有一些国家现在迫切需要的能力。\n\n我们可以向他们承诺战后的自由来换取他们现在的效忠。

original: Yes, partly reinstate the Nazi leadership.
translation: 是的，恢复一部分纳粹领导人的权力。

original: Fascist-only advisors are once more eligible for service.\n
translation: 只对法西斯意识形态开放的顾问现在也可以被使用了。\n

original: No, they are fine where they are.
translation: 不，他们在大牢里就挺好的。

original: We cannot allow them to regain freedom should the war go badly... Hang them!
translation: 既然战争还是毫无起色，那他们就甭想什么自由了……统统都吊死吧！

original: Democratic Civil War in [From.From.GetName]
translation: [From.From.GetName]的民主内战

original: Democratic elements in [From.From.GetName] have launched a civil war to re-establish free elections and return power to the people. They may well require our help, and their success will ensure a future ally for our cause.
translation: [From.From.GetName]的民主分子们掀起了一场内战，致力于重开自由选举并将权力返还给人民。他们可能会需要我们的援助，一旦他们的斗争成功，我们将会拥有一个能为我们事业奔走的未来盟友。

original: We will stand by democracy!
translation: 我们将支援民主！

original: They will have to solve their own problems.
translation: 他们还是自己解决自己的问题吧。

original: Austrian Pro-German Sentiment Soars
translation: 奥地利亲德情绪暴涨

original: German sentiment in our southern neighbor Austria has increased remarkably now that we have been allies for some time. It would not be outside the realm of possibility that a referendum calling for unification with Germany might meet with the Austrian people's approval. Should we urge the Austrian government to hold one?
translation: 在与我们结盟一段时间后，我们南方邻国奥地利的亲德情结显著暴涨。如果举行一场全民公投的话，奥地利人民的确可能会同意德国和奥地利的统合，我们可以敦促奥地利政府举行一场公投？

original: Yes, the Lesser German solution was a mistake.
translation: 对，小德意志方案是个错误。

original: No, the Greater German solution would be a mistake.
translation: 不，大德意志方案是个错误。

original: German Government Urges Referendum for Unification
translation: 德国政府敦促全民公决以实现统一

original: The German government has approached us with a proposal for unification, should the Austrian people wish it. They urge us to hold a referendum so that we may find out.
translation: 德国政府已经向我们提出了统一的建议，并声称这是奥地利人民所希望的。他们敦促我们举行公投，以查明实情。

original: Campaign in favor of unification.
translation: 支持统一运动

original: Campaign against unification.
translation: 反对统一运动

original: Austrian People Votes for Unification
translation: 奥地利人民公投赞成统一

original: The Austrian people have voted in favor of unification with their northern brethren. Integration of the Austrian states and their military will commence immediately.
translation: 奥地利人投票赞成和北方同胞归于一统。对奥地利国家及其军队的整合将立即开始。

original: A great day for the German Question!
translation: 德意志议题的伟大一天！

original: The German Territories
translation: 德国领土

original: Our war with the Soviet Union is not proceeding well, and we risk losing everything. To our West, Germany has undergone rapid changes the last few years, but is now a stalwart defender of democratic values. Arranging a quick return of the old German Territories of Danzig and Poznan would undoubtedly save millions from oppression under the Soviet boot.
translation: 我们同苏联的战争进展不顺利，并且有失去一切的风险。在我们的西方，德国在过去几年里经历了迅速的变化，现在他们是民主价值观的坚定捍卫者。将但泽和波兹南等旧德国领土返还无疑能把数百万人从苏联的压迫下拯救。

original: Rather Germany than the Soviets!
translation: 与其臣服于苏联不如并入德国

original: Never! What is Polish shall fall Polish!
translation: 绝不！生是波兰人，死葬波兰土！

original: Poland Offers Return of German Territories
translation: 波兰主动返还德国领土

original: As the Polish war with the Soviet Union is not going well, their government has reached out to us through secret channels, offering the rapid return of our old territories of Danzig and Poznan. They argue that their people will undoubtedly fare better under democratic German rule, than under the oppressive Soviet boot.
translation: 波兰与苏联的战争并不顺利，波兰政府已经通过秘密渠道与我们接洽，提议将但泽和波兹南等旧日领土返还于我们。他们认为在德国民主统治下，人民无疑会比在苏联的压迫下受到更好的待遇。

original: Such guile! We will keep them safe.
translation: 真狡猾！我们会保障他们的安全。

original: No, we cannot risk Soviet retaliation.
translation: 不，我们不能冒着被苏联报复的风险。

original: Austrian People Rejects Unification
translation: 奥地利人拒绝统一

original: The Austrian people has rejected our calls for unification, preferring to continue Austrian independence at least for a little while longer.
translation: 奥地利人拒绝了我们的统一号召，宁愿奥地利多少再独立一段时间

original: We must respect their wishes.
translation: 我们必须尊重他们的意愿

original: Germany Accepts Danzig and Poznan
translation: 德国接纳了但泽和波兹南

original: The German government has decided to accept their old territories, and has solemnly vowed to stand for the protection of the region's Polish citizens.
translation: 德国政府决定接受他们的旧领土，并庄严宣誓为该地区前波兰公民提供保护。

original: At least they will be safe.
translation: 至少他们安全了。

original: Germany Rejects Danzig and Poznan
translation: 德国拒绝了但泽和波兹南

original: The German government has informed us that they are unable to accept our offer. They fear Soviet retaliation, and so feel they cannot take the risk.
translation: 德国政府已通知我们，他们不能接受我们的提议。因为他们认为不能承担苏联报复的风险。

original: Who will help them when all have fallen to the Reds?
translation: 当所有人都输给赤色分子时，谁来帮助他们？

original: Companies Demand MEFO Payment
translation: 企业要求承兑米福券

original: With the end of the recent war, the companies we have issued MEFO bills to are now pushing for us to issue payments. They claim there is no longer any necessity to withhold payments 'for the good of the fatherland'.
translation: 随着战争的结束，我们签发给米福券的公司正在催促我们承兑本票。他们声称“为了祖国的繁荣昌盛”，没有必要继续拒绝承兑这些债券。

original: Very well.
translation: 很好。

original: [GER.GetName] Reintegrates Alsace-Lorraine
translation: [GER.GetName]整合阿尔萨斯-洛林

original: The [GER.GetAdjective] government has issued legislation stipulating the reintegration of Alsace-Lorraine and Luxemburg into the [GER.GetName]. Mass drafting of our population has already begun...
translation: [GER.GetAdjective]政府已立法规定将阿尔萨斯-洛林和卢森堡整合于[GER.GetName]。对于人口的大量征召已经开始……

original: The bastards! This isn't over!
translation: 这些混蛋！走着瞧吧！

original: [GER.GetName] Reintegrates Luxemburg
translation: [GER.GetName]整合卢森堡

original: What can we do?
translation: 我们能做些什么？

original: [From.GetName] Requests War Participation
translation: [From.GetName]请求参战

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has informed us that they require our land to march their forces to the Soviet enemy. They remind us that we are under their protection against the communists, and that we therefore owe them our assistance in their current war.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]告诉我们要通过我们的领土与苏联敌人交战。他们提醒我们是在他们的保护下才能对抗共产主义。因此，我们应该在当前战争中向他们提供援助。

original: They are correct - we will join their war.
translation: 他们说得对，我们会加入。

original: Who do they think they are?! Never!
translation: 他们以为自己是谁？不可能！

original: [From.GetName] Accepts Demands
translation: [From.GetName]接受请求

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has decided to join us in our war against [SOV.GetNameDef], which has the added benefit of allowing our forces passage through their country.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]决定加入我们对抗[SOV.GetNameDef]的战争，这将允许我们的部队通过他们的国家。

original: [From.GetName] Rejects Demands
translation: [From.GetName]拒绝请求

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has rebuffed our demands for war participation, and continues to close their borders to our troops. If the Poles are not willing to grant us access for our forces, then we shall simply have to go over them.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝了我们参与战争的要求，并继续向我军关闭边界。如果波兰人不愿意让我们的部队进入，那么我们只需碾过他们。

original: They brought it on themselves.
translation: 咎由自取

original: [From.GetName] Proposes Imperial Reintegration
translation: [From.GetName]提出再次整合帝国

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government has approached us with a proposal for reintegration of the old Austro-Hungarian Empire. Since pro-imperial sentiment is quite high in our respective nations, they claim that it would be in the best interests of everyone to unite our nations.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府政府向我们提出旧奥匈帝国的整合方案。由于亲帝国的观点在我们各自的国家呼声都很高，所以他们声称将我们的国家团结在一起对每个人都有好处。

original: An excellent idea! We shall accept.
translation: 好主意！我们接受。

original: Join them willingly? Never!
translation: 心甘情愿加入他们？没门！

original: [From.GetName] Accepts Integration
translation: [From.GetName]接受整合

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government has responded to our proposal for reintegration of the old Austro-Hungarian Empire. They acknowledge the benefits of this move, and have stated their willingness to integrate their nation with ours, should all parties accept.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府政府回应了我们对旧奥匈帝国的整合方案。他们承认这一举措是有利的，并表示如果各方都接受的话，愿意将他们的国家与我们的国家结合起来。

original: [From.GetName] Rejects Integration
translation: [From.GetName]拒绝整合

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government has responded to our proposal for reintegration of the old Austro-Hungarian Empire. In no uncertain terms, they have indicated that they will never willingly accept our leadership in such a venture.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府回应了我们对旧奥匈帝国的整合方案。他们已毫无疑问的表示，绝不会愿意冒险接受我们的领导。

original: The Re-formation of the Austro-Hungarian Empire
translation: 奥匈帝国重组

original: Both our neighbouring Austro-Hungarian successor states have accepted the proposed re-integration of their lands into our nation, and thereby re-forming into the Austro-Hungarian Empire. The signing of the treaty of re-unification has been greeted by extatic masses in the streets, and the [GER.GetAdjective] government has eagerly welcomed us back into their alliance.
translation: 与我们相邻的奥匈帝国继承者们已经同意将他们的土地重新整合到我们的国家，从而重新组成了奥匈帝国。狂喜的人群在大街上庆祝重新统一条约的签署，[GER.GetAdjective]政府热切希望我们回到他们的联盟。

original: A new era for Austria-Hungary dawns.
translation: 奥匈帝国新时代的黎明！

original: [From.GetLeader] Requests Reinstatement of Royal Titles
translation: [From.GetLeader]要求恢复王室头衔

original: On behalf of Kaiser [From.GetLeader], the [From.GetAdjective] government has requested that we revert the deprivation of British peerages and royal titles from German royal and princely families, as allowed by the Titles Deprivation Act 1917. They argue that this would show the world how the British and German royal and princely families have already returned to their pre-war good relations, and thus this would serve as a symbol of future Anglo-German friendship.
translation: 以皇帝[From.GetLeader]的名义，[From.GetAdjective]政府要求我们回复德国皇室及宗亲在一九一七头衔剥夺法案中被剥夺的英国贵族头衔。他们主张这会让世界看到英国和德国高贵的王室家族已经回到大战前的良好关系，因此这将作为未来英德友谊的象征。

original: This is a great idea!
translation: 所见略同！

original: We think not.
translation: 恕难苟同。

original: [From.GetAdjective] Government Accepts Request
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府接受请求

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government has decided to support our request for the reinstatement of British peerages and royal titles to German royal and princely families. They propose a grand 'royal ceremony of the century', to which all German royalty is invited to personally be returned the titles that were wrongfully taken from them two decades ago.\n\nIt is proposed by Imperial advisors that the entire extended royal family make a grand entrance using the very pinnacle of German technology. The state-of-the-art Hindenburg airship would suit the occasion perfectly.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府已决定恢复我们德国高贵王室家庭的英国贵族和皇室头衔。他们提出了一个宏伟的世纪皇家仪式，德国皇室将受邀前来，恢复被错误地剥夺了二十年前的旧头衔。\n\n皇家顾问推荐整个皇室大家庭采用德国顶尖科技的手段，宏大的登场。国家最先进的兴登堡飞艇完美契合这一点。

original: An excellent idea! We shall send a liaison.
translation: 好主意！我们将派出联络人。

original: Princess Victoria Louise is sent ahead to aid in the preparations of this grand ceremony. This will tax our government's resources somewhat.\n
translation: 维多利亚·路易丝公主被派去帮助筹备这次盛大的仪式。这会对我们政府的收支造成一定的影响。\n

original: An excellent idea! We shall all travel together.
translation: 好主意！我们应该一同出行。

original: The entire extended royal family will travel aboard the Hindenburg to the ceremony. This will increase the Imperial Family's prestige in the eyes of our allies and our people, strengthening our government's position.\n
translation: 整个王室家族将乘兴登堡号出国参加仪式。这将在我们的盟友和人民眼中增加皇室的声望，巩固我们政府的地位。\n

original: Hindenburg Aflame in London
translation: 兴登堡号在伦敦陨落

original: In a terrible tragedy, the Hindenburg was destroyed today while attempting to dock in London. For reasons not yet determined, the airship was engulfed in flames and crashed to the ground, claiming the lives of all passengers and crew aboard - including virtually all members of the extended German Imperial Family.\n\nThe only survivor is the Princess Victoria Louise, who was sent ahead to aid in the preparations of the ceremony. The Princess, the third to bear the name 'Victoria' after her grandmother, German Empress Victoria, and her great-grandmother Queen Victoria, has therefore become the only remaining heir to the throne. Still shaken from having lost her family, she has now nevertheless ascended to the throne as Kaiserin Victoria I of the German Empire.
translation: 今天发生的一场可怕悲剧中，兴登堡号在伦敦试图停泊时被焚毁，事故的原因尚未确定。飞艇被大火吞噬，坠落到地面上，吞噬了包括德国皇室几乎所有成员在内的乘客和机组人员的生命。\n\n皇室唯一幸存者是被派去协助仪式准备工作的维多利亚·路易丝公主。继祖母德国皇后维多利亚和她的曾祖母维多利亚女皇之后，第三位名为维多利亚的公主成为了王位的唯一继承人。沉浸在失去她家人的悲痛中，她登上了德意志帝国的皇位，加冕为德意志帝国的维多利亚一世。

original: The Kaiser is dead... Long live the Kaiserin!
translation: 皇帝已逝，女皇万岁！

original: In a terrible tragedy, the Hindenburg was destroyed today while attempting to dock in London. For reasons not yet determined, the airship was engulfed in flames and crashed to the ground, claiming the lives of all passengers and crew aboard - including all members of the extended German Imperial Family.\n\nWith the utter elimination of the Imperial Family, the government has assumed direct control, but it seems unlikely that this will see the return of democracy in the short term.
translation: 今天发生的一场可怕悲剧中，兴登堡号在伦敦试图停泊时被焚毁，事故的原因尚未确定。飞艇被大火吞噬，坠落到地面上，吞噬了包括德国皇室所有成员在内的乘客和机组人员的生命。\n\n随着皇室彻底绝嗣，政府取得了直接控制权，但短期内不太可能看到民主的回归。

original: A tragedy!
translation: 一场悲剧！

original: [From.GetAdjective] Government Rejects Request
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府拒绝请求

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government, after a lengthy session in parliament, has decided to reject our request for reinstatement of British peerages and royal titles to German royal and princely families.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府经过议会冗长的讨论后，决定拒绝恢复我们德国高贵王室家庭的英国贵族和皇室头衔的请求。

original: That is most unfortunate...
translation: 真不走运……

original: In a terrible tragedy, the Hindenburg was destroyed today while attempting to dock in London. For reasons not yet determined, the airship was engulfed in flames and crashed to the ground, claiming the lives of all passengers and crew aboard - including virtually all members of the extended German Imperial Family.\n\nThe only survivor is the Princess Victoria Louise, who was sent ahead to aid in the preparations of the ceremony. The princess, the third royal to bear the name 'Victoria' after her grandmother, German Empress Victoria, and her great-grandmother Queen Victoria, has therefore become the only remaining heir to the throne. Still shaken from having lost her family, she has now nevertheless ascended to the throne as Kaiserin Victoria I of the German Empire.
translation: 今天发生的一场可怕悲剧中，兴登堡号在伦敦试图停泊时被焚毁，事故的原因尚未确定。飞艇被大火吞噬，坠落到地面上，吞噬了包括德国皇室几乎所有成员在内的乘客和机组人员的生命。\n\n皇室唯一幸存者是被派去协助仪式准备工作的维多利亚·路易丝公主。继祖母德国皇后维多利亚和她的曾祖母维多利亚女皇之后，第三位名为维多利亚的公主成为了王位的唯一继承人。沉浸在失去她家人的悲痛中，她登上了德意志帝国的皇位，加冕为德意志帝国的维多利亚一世。

original: A terrible tragidy... With unexpected results.
translation: 可怕的悲剧……意料之外的结果。

original: In a terrible tragedy, the Hindenburg was destroyed today while attempting to dock in London. For reasons not yet determined, the airship was engulfed in flames and crashed to the ground, claiming the lives of all passengers and crew aboard - including all members of the extended German Imperial Family.\n\nWith the utter decimation of the Imperial Family, the government has assumed direct control, but it seems unlikely that this will see the return of democracy in the short term.
translation: 今天发生的一场可怕悲剧中，兴登堡号在伦敦试图停泊时被焚毁，事故的原因尚未确定。飞艇被大火吞噬，坠落到地面上，吞噬了包括德国皇室所有成员在内的乘客和机组人员的生命。\n\n随着皇室彻底绝嗣，政府取得了直接控制权，但短期内不太可能看到民主的回归。

original: Such a terrible tragedy!
translation: 多么可怕的悲剧！

original: Germany Embroiled in Civil War
translation: 德国卷入内战

original: A sudden Wehrmacht coup, led by the famed Field Marshal August von Mackensen, has triggered a civil war in Germany early this morning. Fascists, Royalists, and Democrats alike have taken up arms against their former countrymen, and military units have been removed from the borders to see to the internal threat.\n\nThe fascists, under orders of Hitler, have already vowed to destroy the nation rather than see it fall to 'treasonous Germans'.
translation: 今天凌晨国防军在著名的陆军元帅奥古斯特·冯·马肯森领导下突然发动政变，引发了德国内战。法西斯分子，保皇派，和民主党都武装起来对抗他们的同胞，部队已从边境开拔参与内战。\n\n希特勒领导下的法西斯分子，已经发誓即使摧毁这个国家也不让它落到德国人的叛徒之手。

original: There is no turning back now.
translation: 开弓没有回头箭。

original: Betrayed by the military! We cannot suffer the same.
translation: 被军队背叛！我们要引以为戒。

original: Let us hope peace will soon return to Europe...
translation: 让我们祈祷和平快些重返欧陆……

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Blocks Return of Wilhelm II
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]阻止威廉二世回国

original:
Not long after the German Empire lifted the exile on Wilhelm II in a surprise announcement yesterday morning, Dutch authorities blocked the old Kaiser's motorcade before it passed the German border, and forced it to return to his residence of Huis Doorn.

An official Dutch communiqué cites concerns for destabilizing the continent should Wilhelm II be allowed to assume the German throne once more, and the Dutch government has therefore taken it upon themselves to place the old Kaiser in house arrest.

A German response to the crisis has yet to be made, but public outcry has included the demand for military force to be used to see to the Kaiser's return.
translation:
在昨天上午德意志帝国出人意料的宣布解除了对威廉二世的流放后不久，荷兰当局在通过德国边境前阻挡了老皇帝的车队，并迫使其回到他在多伦庄园的住所。

荷兰官方公报称威廉二世如果被允许回到皇位上会破坏大陆的稳定局势，荷兰政府因此将老皇帝遣返回住所继续软禁。

 德国尚未对此次危机作出反应，但公众抗议内容已经包括要求用军事力量保障皇帝的返回。

original: How dare they?!
translation: 真是吃了熊心豹子胆！

original: They had better know what they are doing...
translation: 他们最好认清形势……

original: Someone had to take a stand.
translation: 有些人必须表明立场。

original: Wilhelm II Returns to the German Empire
translation: 威廉二世返回德意志帝国

original: In a surprise announcement yesterday morning, the German government officially lifted the exile on Wilhelm II. Later in the day, the old Kaiser's motorcade passed the Dutch-German border, and upon his return to Berlin he was ceremoniously reinstated as Kaiser of the German Empire.\n\nThe Kaiser has already vowed to see Germany returned to its old greatness, but it remains to be seen which direction the nation will take with its diplomacy.
translation: 昨天上午德意志帝国出人意料的宣布解除了对威廉二世的流放。随后，老皇帝的车队通过德荷边境。威廉二世回到柏林后，隆重地重登帝位。\n\n 皇帝已经发誓要看到德国恢复昔日荣光，但国家的外交方向尚待分晓。

original: Long live the Kaiser!
translation: 皇帝万岁！

original: A return to the start of the century?
translation: 本世纪初的重演？

original: We have done our part in keeping him safe.
translation: 我们已尽我们所能保障他的安全。

original: We should have pushed the Dutch harder for his extradition!
translation: 我们应向荷兰人施加更大的压力促使皇帝回归！

original: Wilhelm II Freed from Dutch House Arrest
translation: 威廉二世从荷兰人的软禁中解放

original: Despite vain Dutch attempts to resist the German advance, the government saw no choice but to capitulate in the face of overwhelming German force. German troops freed the old Kaiser from his house arrest at Huis Doorn, and has since his return to Berlin been ceremoniously reinstated as Kaiser of the German Empire.\n\nThe Kaiser has already vowed to see Germany returned to its old greatness, but it remains to be seen which direction the nation will take with its diplomacy.
translation: 尽管荷兰徒劳地试图抵抗德国的推进，政府面对德国压倒性的力量只好投降。德国军队将老皇帝从他被软禁的多伦庄园中解放，此后他回到柏林，隆重地重登帝位。\n\n皇帝已经发誓要看到德国恢复昔日荣光，但国家的外交方向尚待分晓。

original: None shall stop the German Empire!
translation: 任何人都不能阻止德意志帝国！

original: It was a foolish gesture of the Dutch.
translation: 荷兰人的愚蠢行为。

original: Perhaps this was not such a good idea after all...
translation: 也许这不是一个好主意……

original: Mussolini Assassinated
translation: 墨索里尼被刺杀

original: Reports from Rome indicate Il Duce was shot and killed in broad daylight earlier today, in the streets of the city. Concurrently, elements in the government have made moves to seize power from the Italian fascists. A wave of arrests was made, and military units cordoned off government buildings and streets, instating a curfew.\n\nSpokesmen of the coup government have announced their loyalty to Victor Emmanuel III, and in his first act as leader of Italy the King signed an alliance treaty with the German Empire.
translation: 来自罗马的报道表明，今天早些时候墨索里尼领袖在光天化日之下在街上被枪杀身亡，。与此同时，政府中的一些成员采取行动，从意大利法西斯手中夺取权力。同时进行了一些逮捕，军队了封锁政府大楼和街道，并设置宵禁。\n\n 政变政府的发言人已对维托里奥·埃马努埃莱三世宣誓效忠。国王签署了与德意志帝国的联盟条约作为他第一次履行意大利国王职责的行为。

original: Everything went perfectly.
translation: 一切顺利

original: Long live the King!
translation: 国王万岁！

original: The Germans must have had a hand in this...
translation: 德国人肯定插手其中……

original: Austria-Hungary Reformed
translation: 奥匈帝国重组

original: The Danubian successor states to the Austro-Hungarian Empire have recently undergone a wave of pro-Imperial sentiment, and, under the leadership of [From.GetOldNameDef], have now elected to unify their respective countries once more into Austria-Hungary.\n\nThe new Austro-Hungarian government immediately took steps to sign a formal treaty of alliance with the German Empire, openly giving their support to the German anti-British and anti-French foreign policy.
translation: 多瑙河流域的奥匈帝国继承者们最近经历了一波亲帝国情绪，在[From.GetOldNameDef]的领导下，现在已经公投将各自的国家再次并入奥匈帝国。\n\n新奥匈帝国政府立即采取措施，签署与德意志帝国联盟的正式条约，公开支持德国的反英反法的外交政策。

original: And we didn't have to fire a shot.
translation: 不发一枪一炮。

original: Unified once more!
translation: 再次联合起来！

original: A new power block in Europe? Concerning.
translation: 对欧洲新的制约？令人担忧。

original: Poland Returns Danzig
translation: 波兰返还但泽

original: The Polish government has accepted a German proposal for the return of Danzig in exchange for military guarantees. A treaty has been drawn up, assuring the Poles that the Germans will come to their aid in the event of any hostilities committed against them.\n\nThough the price has been high, once more entirely cutting off the Poles from the sea, it may well have been worth it in light of the communist threat in the East.
translation: 波兰政府已经接受了德国用军事保障交换但泽的建议。条约已经制定，确保德国人会在任何对波兰进行的敌对行为中施以援手。\n\n尽管代价高昂，并且切断了波兰同大海的联系，但它很有可能在面对东方的共产主义威胁时发挥作用。

original: 'Danzig or war'? Hah! Diplomacy prevails again.
translation: 但泽或战争？哈！又一次外交胜利。

original: Let us hope the cost was worth it.
translation: 但愿物有所值。

original: The Germans meddle in our sphere of influence...
translation: 德国人干涉我们的势力范围……

original: A beneficial deal for both? We'll see.
translation: 双赢？走着瞧吧。

original: German Civil War Ends
translation: 德国内战结束

original: The civil war that has wracked Germany has now come to an end. The fighting was extraordinarily intense, with fanatical resistance by the Nazis causing devastation on a scale reminiscent of the Great War.\n\nIt appears Hitler is dead, and the Nazi leadership imprisoned or executed. The provisional government has now announced that it is necessary to secure their hold over the state and ensure the return of stability to the nation, before there can be any thought of embarking on a process of constitutional reforms.
translation: 在德国肆虐的内战已经走到了尽头。这场战斗异常激烈，纳粹分子的狂热抵抗造成了规模巨大的毁灭。\n\n希特勒似乎死了，纳粹领导人被监禁或处决。临时政府现在宣布，在着手进行宪政改革之前，必须确保他们对国家的控制以及国家的稳定。

original: Let the rebuilding begin.
translation: 让重建开始吧。

original: Let us hope the new regime is more accommodating...
translation: 我们希望新政权更加通融……

original: Soviets Announce Large-Scale Exercises
translation: 苏联宣布大规模演习

original: In response to what they call 'increasingly hostile German rhetoric', the Soviet military has announced a series of large-scale military exercises to be held this year.\n\nIt is hoped the heightened state of readiness will discourage the Germans from 'continuing on their slanderous tirade', according to spokesmen of the Soviet Government.
translation: 针对他们所谓日益敌对的德国言论，苏联军方宣布了今年一系列大规模军事演习计划。\n\n 根据苏联政府的发言人所称，希望战争准备状态的加剧能阻止德国人继续他们的诽谤言论。

original: They played right into our hands!
translation: 正中下怀

original: That will surely get them thinking.
translation: 这会让他们三思而后言

original: Let us hope the Germans don't fail us...
translation: 希望德国人不会让我们失望……

original: They are not helping defuse the situation...
translation: 对于缓和局势没有半点帮助……

original: Soviets Ramp Up Military Build-Up
translation: 苏联加强军队建设

original: In response to the recent German announcement to create a Central European Alliance against Soviet aggression, the Soviet government has passed measures to see to the drastic speed-up of military production.\n\nA spokesman of the Kremlin made it clear, in no uncertain terms, that the Soviet Union cannot sit by and watch this threat unfold at their borders. Measures to counter it must be, and have been taken at once.
translation: 作为对最近德国宣布建立反对苏联侵略的中欧联盟的回应，苏联政府通过一系列措施，使军工生产急剧加速。\n\n克林姆林宫发言人态度明确，毫不含糊。即苏联不会坐视这种威胁在他们的边界展开，必将采取立即反制措施。

original: They continue to unwittingly help our cause!
translation: 他们继续不自觉地帮助我们的事业！

original: Surely they won't dare try anything even more foolish!
translation: 他们肯定不敢尝试更愚蠢的事！

original: An alliance has been formed, at least.
translation: 至少已经建立了一个联盟。

original: This is escalating rapidly...
translation: 局势在迅速升级……

original: Soviets Move to Secure Sphere
translation: 苏联人进入安全区

original: With the invitation of one of their border states to the [GER.GetFactionName], the Soviet government has warned in no unclear terms against further interference in the affairs of 'their sphere of influence'.\n\nUncomfirmed reports have indicated a mobilization of the Soviet military forces, possibly preparing for war.
translation: 应[GER.GetFactionName]的一个边境省份的秘密邀请，苏联政府警告称，没有明确的条约对势力范围内的进一步干预事务进行限制。\n\n未经证实的报告表明了苏联对军事力量的动员，可能在准备战争。

original: Have we finally pushed them far enough?
translation: 我们终于把局势推动了吗？

original: We must secure our borders!
translation: 我们必须保护我们的边境！

original: Together we can stand against them!
translation: 团结一致，我们可以对抗他们！

original: Is this the spark?
translation: 再次点燃火药桶的火花？

original: We must prepare for war!
translation: 我们必须准备战争！

original: Protest Against the Kaiser Leads to War
translation: 对复辟的抗议导致战争

original: In response to the German decision to allow the return of Wilhelm II, [FRA.GetNameDef] and [Eng.GetNameDef] have declared war on [GER.GetNameDef]. The French and British cite the 'flagrant German obstinacy' in allowing a 'known war criminal' to become head of state once again as the cause of this escalation.\n\nSpokesmen of their respective governments argue that it is utterly immoral to allow the 'key instigator' of the Great War to assume the German Crown once again, and that the German government has ignored all warnings. 'We had no other choice'.
translation: 作为对威廉二世返回德国的回应，[FRA.GetNameDef]和[Eng.GetNameDef]已对[GER.GetNameDef]宣战。法国和英国申明，臭名远扬的德式固执和公然让一个已知的战争罪犯再次成为国家元首是局势恶化的主要原因。\n\n政府发言人坚决主张让上一次大战的主要煽动者再次承担德国皇冠是完全不道德的，而德国政府忽略了所有警告，他们别无选择。

original: They presume to tell us who can be our leader?!
translation: 他们连谁领导我们都要说了算！

original: They forced our hand!
translation: 他们强迫我们动手！

original: And so we are back to 1914.
The Wilhelm III Compromise
translation: 威廉三世妥协

original: In response to vehement Anglo-French opposition to the return of Wilhelm II as Kaiser, the German government has proposed a compromise wherein Wilhelm II will continue to live in exile, but his son will assume the German throne as Wilhelm III.\n\nHaving been accepted by [ENG.GetNameDef] and [FRA.GetNameDef], it is hoped this will lead to enduring peace between the great European powers.
translation: 为回应英法对威廉二世重返帝位的激烈反对，德国政府提出了一个折中方案，即威廉二世将继续流亡的生活，但他的儿子将即位成为威廉三世。\n\n该方案已被[ENG.GetNameDef]和[FRA.GetNameDef]接受，希望这能让欧洲列强之间的和平持续下去。

original: We had no other choice.
translation: 我们别无选择

original: Thankfully the Germans saw reason.
translation: 幸亏德国人懂得利弊。

original: Peace has been maintained...
translation: 和平维持住了……

original: In response to the German decision to allow the return of Wilhelm II, and in spite of lacking British support, [FRA.GetNameDef] has declared war on [GER.GetNameDef]. The French cite the 'flagrant German obstinacy' in allowing a 'known war criminal' to become head of state once again as the cause of this escalation.\n\nSpokesmen of the French government argue that it is utterly immoral to allow the 'key instigator' of the Great War to assume the German Crown once again, and that the German government has ignored all warnings. 'We had no other choice'.
translation: 作为对威廉二世返回德国的回应，尽管没有英国的支持，[FRA.GetNameDef]对[GER.GetNameDef]宣战。法国政府申明，臭名远扬的德式固执和公然让一个已知的战争罪犯再次成为国家元首是局势恶化的主要原因。\n\n法国政府发言人坚决主张让上一次大战的主要煽动者再次承担德国皇冠是完全不道德的，而德国政府忽略了所有警告，他们别无选择。

original: Foolish, obstinate Frenchmen!
translation: 愚蠢、固执的法国人！

original: But what will the British do?
translation: 英国人会怎么做呢？

original: In response to vehement French opposition to the return of Wilhelm II as Kaiser, the German government has proposed a compromise wherein Wilhelm II will continue to live in exile, but his son will assume the German throne as Wilhelm III.\n\nHaving been accepted by [FRA.GetNameDef], it is hoped this will lead to enduring peace between the great continental European powers.
translation: 为回应法国对威廉二世重返帝位的激烈反对，德国政府提出了一个折中方案，即威廉二世将继续流亡的生活，但他的儿子将即位成为威廉三世。\n\n该方案已被[FRA.GetNameDef]接受，希望这能让欧洲列强之间的和平持续下去。

original: Thankfully the Germans were more reasonable than the French...
translation: 谢天谢地，德国人比法国人更理智……

original: China Restores German Rule to Tsingtao
translation: 中国恢复德国对青岛统治

original: The Chinese government has decided to accede to recent German demands for the return of their old enclave in Qingdao.\n\nEffective immediately, German control has been reinstated inside the city limits, and the German Government has renamed it to its old German name of Tsingtao.
translation: 中国政府已经决定同意最近德国对青岛的要求，将旧日飞地返还。\n\n 随即，德国的控制已经在城市范围内恢复，而德国政府已经为它重命名为旧德国名字——德属青岛。

original: We shall see our return to colonial glory, yet.
translation: 我们终将看到我们重返殖民地的辉煌。

original: It was but a small price to pay.
translation: 这些还不够塞牙缝。

original: We took it from them before, we can do so again!
translation: 我们拿走一次就能拿第二次！

original: German colonialism, once more?
translation: 德国殖民主义，又来一次？

original: Japan Restores German Rule to Tsingtao
translation: 日本交还德国对青岛统治

original: The Japanese government has decided to accede to recent German demands for the return of their old enclave in Qingdao.\n\nEffective immediately, German control has been reinstated inside the city limits, and the German Government has renamed it to its old German name of Tsingtao.
translation: 日本政府已经决定同意最近德国对青岛的要求，将旧日飞地返还。\n\n 随即，德国的控制已经在城市范围内恢复，而德国政府已经为它重命名为旧德国名字——德属青岛。

original: How dare they surrender -our- territory?!
translation: 他们怎么敢拿我们的领土投降？！

original: Consider us even for 1914.
translation: 即使经历了1914年的事也要考虑我们。

original: Austria Votes to Join Germany
translation: 奥地利公投加入德国

original: Since the close allied cooperation of [AUS.GetNameDef] and [GER.GetNameDef] began, pro-unification sentiment has risen dramatically in Austria. A plebiscite held yesterday saw the Austrian people vote overwhelmingly in favor of unification with their northern neighbours.\n\nIntegration of the Austrian state has been pushed forward immediately, and the old state was abolished this morning.
translation: 由于[AUS.GetNameDef]和[GER.GetNameDef]间的亲密联盟合作已经开始，统一的呼声在奥地利日益引人注目。昨天举行的公投可以看出与北方邻居统一的意见占压倒性多数。\n\n对奥地利的整合立即开始，今天上午旧国家已经作古。

original: For a Greater Germany.
translation: 为了大德意志的美好明天。

original: It was what they wished.
translation: 如他们所愿。

original: Poland Returns Danzig and Poznan
translation: 波兰返还但泽和波兹南

original: In face of the continued Soviet onslaught, the Polish government this morning announced the immediate return of the old German territories of Danzig and Poznan to [GER.GetNameDef].\n\nDespite utter silence on the part of the Polish or German governments on the reasons why, experts agree it most likely is an attempt to keep these territories out of Soviet hands, in the face of imminent Polish military collapse.
translation: 面对苏联持续性的进攻。波兰政府今晨宣布立即归还旧日的德国领土但泽和波兹南给[GER.GetNameDef]。\n\n尽管不论波兰还是德国政府都对原因保持沉默，但专家们都同意这最有可能是意在使这些领土脱离苏联魔爪的尝试，以应对波兰的军事崩溃近在眼前的情形。

original: We shall protect them with our lives.
translation: 我们将以生命捍卫他们。

original: It was the best option...
translation: 这是最好的选择……

original: Devious and underhanded diplomatic weaseling!
translation: 狡猾和阴险狡猾的外交诡计！

original: A remarkably sly diplomatic arrangement...
translation: 明显的外交诡计……

original: Germany Announces Anti-Soviet Pact
translation: 德国发表反苏条约

original: In light of increased perceived Soviet aggression, the [GER.GetName] has offered "states under immediate threat from communism" a chance to form n alliance against the [SOV.GetName]. Any country in the alliance will be committed to fighting a war against the [SOV.GetName], should there come a time when a member is attacked.
translation: 根据对苏联侵略行为的预估，[GER.GetName]向面对共产分子直接威胁的国家提出了一个组成对抗[SOV.GetName]联盟的机会。当联盟的成员被攻击时，联盟中的所有国家将致力于对抗[SOV.GetName]的战争。

original: [From.GetName] Speaks Out Against Soviet Union
translation: [From.GetName]呼吁对抗苏联

original: The German government has stepped up its rhetoric against the Soviet Union, warning that Europe's Eastern Neighbor is a "Great Red Menace" that looms over the continent. Whether it is fear-mongering or has a basis in fact is disputed, but it certainly seems like the Germans are aiming to unite the continent against the East.
translation: 德国政府加强了对苏联的论战，警告欧洲东部邻国，苏联是一个笼罩在大陆的“红色威胁”。无论是出于恐惧或是依据有争议的事实，但德国人的目标看起来是结合欧洲大陆与东方对抗。

original: The world must know of the Soviet threat!
translation: 他们必须了解苏联的威胁！

original: How dare they slander us like that?!
translation: 他们竟敢这样诽谤我们？！

original: We shall see how the Soviets receive this.
translation: 我们将看看苏联作何反应

original: [From.GetName] Announces Central European Alliance
translation: [From.GetName]宣告中欧联盟成立

original: Germany has continued on their recent anti-Soviet rhetoric, and has now developed a concrete plan to curb Soviet influence in the rest of the continent. A new alliance, the Central European Alliance, has been formed and, with time, will hopefully be able to provide its members with protection against what the Germans call "unbridled Soviet aggression".
translation: 德国继续他们最近的反苏论战，现在已经制定了一个具体的计划来遏制苏联在欧洲大陆其他地区的影响。一个新的联盟，中欧联盟，已经形成，并且随着时间的推移，有希望能够为其成员提供保护，防止德国人所说的肆无忌惮的苏联侵略。

original: We will lead Free Europe against the threat of communism!
translation: 我们将领导自由欧洲免受共产主义的威胁！

original: They increasingly threaten our position...
translation: 他们越来越威胁我们的地位……

original: At last, the Germans are taking steps.
translation: 德国人终于采取了措施。

original: It's unlikely the Soviets will take this lying down...
translation: 苏联不太可能善罢甘休……

original: Vichy France Annexed
translation: 维希法国被吞并

original: A German operation to annex Vichy France, launched earlier this week, has since been completed successfully. German forces were able to take control of the naval base at Toulon before orders to scuttle the French fleet could be sent out. As such, the entire French fleet has fallen into German hands, intact.
translation: 本周早些时候德国吞并维希法国的行动已经成功完成。德国军队在法国舰队自沉命令发出前控制了土伦军港。因此，整个法国舰队已完好无损的落入德军手中。

original: A great success!
translation: 巨大的成功！

original: They failed in their duty...
translation: 他们太失职了……

original: The Germans are ruthless.
translation: 德国人冷酷无情。

original: French Scuttle Fleet
translation: 法国舰队自沉

original: A German operation to annex Vichy France, launched earlier this week, has since been completed successfully. However, German forces were unable to take control of the naval base at Toulon before orders to scuttle the French fleet could be sent out. As such, the entire French fleet has been scuttled, in order to keep it out of German hands.
translation: 本周早些时候德国吞并维希法国的行动已经成功完成。德国军队没能在法国舰队自沉命令发出前控制土伦军港。因此，整个法国舰队全体自沉，以防落入德军手中。

original: A disappointment, but it is of no consequence.
translation: 令人失望，但无伤大雅。

original: They kept their word to the end.
translation: 他们恪守誓言到最后一刻。

original: A final act of French defiance.
translation: 法国反抗的最后一幕。

original: Burma Road closed
translation: 滇缅公路被封锁

original: [occupying_country.GetAdjective] forces attacking into [state_occupied.GetName] have reached the Burma road and cut the trail in several places. No further supplies can reach us through this path.
translation: [occupying_country.GetAdjective]军队攻入到[state_occupied.GetName]的滇缅公路并在几个地方切断了道路，导致没有补给能通过这条路运达我们这里。

original: This will not make things any easier.
translation: 无济于事。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] Government has decided to no longer allow traffic through the Burma road. All convoys on the road have been halted and ordered to return. No further supplies can reach us through this path.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府已决定不再允许车辆通过滇缅公路。路上的所有车队都被截停并被命令返回。没有更多的补给能通过这条路到达我们这里。

original: [From.GetAdjective] forces have advanced rapidly up the Burma road and overrun several vital bridges and crossings. The road is closed to all traffic now and no further supplies can reach us through this route.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]部队迅速沿滇缅公路推进，通过了一些重要的桥梁和过境点。这条路现在禁止所有车辆通行，通过这条路线我们不能再获得任何物资。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Reopens Part of the Burma Road
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]重新开放部分滇缅公路

original: Following the successful recapture of much of the Burma Road, the [From.GetAdjective] authorities have allowed traffic to resume along the trail. While remnants of enemy forces make the trip even more dangerous than before, supplies are once again flowing.
translation: 在成功夺回大部分滇缅公路之后，[From.GetAdjective]当局允许交通沿着小道恢复。虽然敌军的残余使补给运输比以前更加危险，但至少物资再次流动了起来

original: A good first step.
translation: 万事开头难。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Reopens the Burma Road
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]重新开放滇缅公路

original: The first supply convoy through the reopened Burma road has reached Yunnan today. While it will take time until traffic flows smoothly again, supplies are once again reaching us.
translation: 第一趟补给车队通过重新开放的滇缅公路到达了云南。虽然使补给重新顺利流通还需要时间需要时间，但我们再次可以收到补给了。

original: A much needed relief.
translation: 雪中送炭。

original: Ledo Road closed
translation: 中印公路被封锁

original: [occupying_country.GetAdjective] forces attacking into [state_occupied.GetName] have reached the Ledo road and cut the trail in several places. No further supplies can reach us through this path.
translation: [occupying_country.GetAdjective]的部队已经进攻到[state_occupied.GetName]并且占领了中印公路，还切断了许多补给路线。没有更多补给能给我们了。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] Government has decided to no longer allow traffic through the Ledo road. All convoys on the road have been halted and ordered to return. No further supplies can reach us through this path.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府已经决定不再允许任何交通工具通过中印公路。公路上的所有车队都已停下来，并且奉命返回。如此看来，将没有更多的补给能到达我们这里了。

original: [From.GetAdjective] forces have advanced rapidly up the Ledo road and overrun several vital bridges and crossings. The road is closed to all traffic now and no further supplies can reach us through this route.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]部队在中印公路上迅速挺进，攻占了几座重要的桥梁和过境点。现在道路已经关闭，所有的车辆和补给都无法通过公路到达我们。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Reopens Part of the Ledo Road
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]重新开放部分的中印公路

original: Following the successful recapture of much of the Ledo Road, the [From.GetAdjective] authorities have allowed traffic to resume along the trail. While remnants of enemy forces make the trip even more dangerous than before, supplies are once again flowing.
translation: 在成功夺回大部分中印公路之后，[From.GetAdjective]当局允许交通沿着小道恢复。虽然敌军的残余使补给运输比以前更加危险，但至少物资再次流动了起来。

original: A good first step.
translation: 万事开头难

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Reopens the Ledo Road
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]重新开放中印公路

original: he first supply convoy through the reopened Ledo road has reached Yunnan today. While it will take time until traffic flows smoothly again, supplies are once again reaching us.
translation: 第一趟补给车队通过重新开放的中印公路到达了云南。虽然使补给重新顺利流通还需要时间需要时间，但我们再次可以收到补给了。

original: Great news!
translation: 太棒了！

original: Hump Airlift Suspended
translation: 驼峰空运暂停

original: [occupying_country.GetAdjective] forces have overrun several airfields in [state_occupied.GetName], forcing the local air transport wings flying the Himalaya Route to evacuate. With the threat of enemy fighter activity increasing and the longer ranges making it impossible to reach the target on a single load of fuel, the airlift has been suspended. No further supplies can reach us through this route.
translation: [occupying_country.GetAdjective]的部队攻占了[state_occupied.GetName]的几个机场，迫使当地的运输机沿着喜马拉雅山脉线路撤离。 随着敌方战斗机活动增加的威胁和敌军战斗机的增长的航程使得我们不可能在增加载油量打主意，因此空运活动已被暂停。没有更多的物资可以通过这条路线到达我们。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] Government has ordered all flights over the Himalayas to cease, effective immediately. Despite immediate protests, they have not shown any indication that they might reconsider their approach.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]的政府已经下令停止喜马拉雅山脉附近的所有航运，即刻生效。尽管我们立即提出抗议，但他们没有表明他们可能会重新考虑他们的决策。

original: [From.GetAdjective] troops have captured the airfields used in the Hump Airlift, making it impossible to supply us by air. No more supplies can be expected from this path.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]部队已经占领了驼峰空运所需要的机场，导致空军无法通过空中补给我们。如此一来，将不会有更多的补给从驼峰运来了。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Restarts the Hump Airlift
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]重启驼峰空运

original: The first [From.GetAdjective] planes have begun to arrive, carrying vital supplies over the Himalayas. While enemy action still poses a threat to the planes, supplies have begun flowing again.
translation: 第一架[From.GetAdjective]飞机顺利到达，在喜马拉雅航线上运载重要物资，虽然敌方空军仍然对空运行动构成威胁，但补给又开始流通。

original: A good first step.
translation: 帮我们解除了燃眉之急

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Restarts the Hump Airlift
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]重启驼峰空运

original: The airlift over the Himalayas is operating at full capacity again, with a tightly controlled schedule of daily flights bringing large amounts of desperately needed supplies.
translation: 喜马拉雅山航线再次满负荷运转，空军地勤人员严格控制每日航班的时间表，随之而来的是我们大量急需的物资。

original: Gifts from the sky!
translation: 上天的馈赠!

original: Hanoi Route closed
translation: 河内航线关闭

original: Cargo ships carrying supplies for our army have been turned away from Hanoi harbor as the route north towards the Chinese border has been closed by [GetVietnamOwner]. \n\nNo further supplies can move through this route.
translation: [GetVietnamOwner]拒绝我军携带补给品的货船入境，因为中国边境以北的路线已经被关闭，因此河内港口已经拒绝了我们的补给船靠岸。\n\n没有更多的补给能通过这条补给路线运输。

original: Local [From.GetAdjective] authorities have received orders to block any further unloading of war material in Hanoi for transport towards the Chinese border. Armed guards have been posted at the docks to prevent any crews from breaking the blockade. The [From.GetAdjective] Coast guard is turning away any ships still at sea. \n\nNo further supplies can be expected through this channel.
translation: 本地[From.GetAdjective]当局已收到命令，阻止在河内的港口进一步卸载战争物资运往中国边境的镇南关。武装警察已经在码头上耀武扬威，以防止任何船员打破封锁。[From.GetAdjective]的海岸警卫队正在将仍在河内附近海域的任何船只驱离。\n\n没有更多的补给能通过这条补给路线运输。

original: [From.GetAdjective] forces occupying Hanoi have seized a number of cargo vessels carry supplies for us. Ships still at sea have turned around and are fleeing for neutral harbors.\n\nNo further supplies can be expected through this route.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]占领河内的部队已经俘获了一批为我们携带补给的货船。仍然在海上的船只已经调头逃离了中港口。\n\n没有更多的补给能通过这条补给路线运输。

original: the Japanese Army
translation: 日占越南

original: the French authorities
translation: 法属印度支那

original: China Demands Subjugation
translation: 统一全中国

original: It appears that [From.GetLeader] has made the decision to finally spread his authority to the far areas of China. A representative from the Central Government has arrived, demanding that we follow the orders of [From.GetLeader] or be replaced by a more obedient government.
translation: 似乎[From.GetLeader]已经决定最终将他的权威传播到全中国的广大地区。中央政府的一位代表到来，要求我们遵守[From.GetLeader]的命令，或者由一个更顺从的政府来代替。

original: Together we stand!
translation: 同仇敌忾众志成城!

original: Let him try.
translation: 就让他们试试

original: [From.GetLeader] Submits
translation: [From.GetLeader]屈服了

original: [From.GetLeader] has sent the messenger back with a personal note, promising to strictly obey our commands and coordinate with our government.
translation: [From.GetLeader]以个人的名义将信件发出，在信里说道他保证严格遵守我们的命令，服从中央指挥。

original: Good Man.
translation: 识时务者为俊杰

original: [From.GetLeader] Refuses
translation: [From.GetLeader]拒绝了

original: [From.GetLeader] has returned our note, claiming that the Central Government has no legal authority to replace a provincial governor. It was accompanied by a detailed report stating the combat-readiness of his troops.
translation: [From.GetLeader]已经回复了我们的要求，他声称中央政府没有法律权力取代其管理者。该报告附有一份详细的报告，强调了他所属部队的战备情况！

original: We will see about that.
translation: 我们严密关注

original: China Demands Subjugation
translation: 统一全中国
