original: The government of [From.GetLeader] has sent a fiery message, noting a number of policy decisions we have made over the last few months, which they consider to run counter to the national interests of [From.GetNameDef]. Unless we align our policies more closely with the [From.GetAdjective] government, they will take "such measures as they deem necessary.
translation: [From.GetLeader]的政府用激烈的言辞把我们在过去几个月做出的一些政策数落了一番，他们宣称这些决定违背了[From.GetNameDef]的国家利益。除非我们与[From.GetAdjective]政府更加密切地协调政策，否则他们会采取他们认为必要的措施。

original: We have no choice.
translation: 我们别无选择

original: We will fight!
translation: 牺牲到底！

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Submits
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]屈服了

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government has responded to our note and promised to consult us in all further decisions. Our ambassador to [From.GetNameDef] has been promoted to Special Representative and has been tasked with ensuring the [From.GetAdjective] don't stray too far.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]的政府已经回复了我们的说明，并承诺在政府所有进一步的决定前先咨询我们的意见。 我们的[From.GetNameDef]大使已晋升为特别代表，并负责确保[From.GetAdjective]安心当苟。

original: Great!
translation: 非常好!

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Defiant
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]违抗了我们

original: Our diplomatic note to [From.GetNameDef] has apparently been leaked to the press, which is now in an uproar. Even the international news papers have written very unfavorable editorials, calling our reasonable requests of consultation "meddling in internal affairs", "a dangerous precedent" and even "naked imperialism". \n\nNeedless to say, the [From.GetAdjective] government has refused to discuss the matter any further and has indicated that bringing it up again would lead to suspension of diplomatic contacts entirely.
translation: 我们和[From.GetNameDef]的外交照会已然被泄露给媒体，现在全球一片哗然。 甚至连国际新闻报都写下了对我们非常不利的社论，把我们的合理要求称为我们“干涉内政”，“这将是危险的先例”甚至称我们是“赤裸裸的帝国主义反动派”。 \n\n不可否认，[From.GetAdjective]政府拒绝进一步讨论此事，并表示再次提起此事将导致下一步的行动暂停。

original: Measures will have to be taken.
translation: 必要的措施还是要做的

original: Counter-infiltration Sweep
translation: 三光政策

original: Communist Cell Discovered in [infiltrated_state.GetName]
translation: 共党在[infiltrated_state.GetName]被发现

original: Investigations by our authorities have uncovered a communist base area in [infiltrated_state.GetName]. The full force of our military should be brought to bear on these bandits as soon as possible. Any delay may allow them to expand their base of operations and make rooting them out much harder.
translation: 我们当局已经调查到[infiltrated_state.GetName]涌现了共产主义浪潮。我们该对这些共党所在的地区进行彻查，并着手剿匪行动。如果我们行动有丝毫懈怠，他们会蛊惑到更多愚昧无知的民众，这将对我们的国家产生严重的危害。

original: Send in the troops.
translation: 派遣还乡团

original: Communists contained
translation: 逮捕了共党

original: During our latest raids on known communist hideouts our agents came up empty handed. We know that communists infiltrators are still active in our country, but it appears that there are no cells operating that we did not know about before.
translation: 在我们对共党窝最近突袭行动中，我们的特种部队两手空空。但我们知道，渗透进政府部门的共党依然在我们国家内依然在兴风作浪。只可能是还未曾被我们发现，或是说我们以前甚至不知道他们的存在。

original: Let us eradicate the ones we found!
translation: 把那些共党斩草除根！

original: Communist Infiltration defeated?
translation: 共党的阴谋被击败了？

original: Reports of a wide-spread communist infiltration seems to have been grossly exaggerated. Raids on a number of known hideouts and communist activists have turned up nothing. This either means that the Communists have been unable to organize any cells, or that we have crushed the ones they managed to create. We must remain vigilant, however, as they will no doubt try to lull us in a sense of security before begining their efforts anew.
translation: 共党蛊惑人心的渗透似乎被报道严重夸大了。我们的对大多数已知共党窝点及其人员的干净利索地肃清，意味着共党几乎无法组织起任何有意义的活动，换句话说，我们已经严重破坏了他们的组织建制，让他们无法再重新建立根据地。但只要共党以任何形式存在，我们必须同样保持警惕，防止他们卷土重来。

original: Hopefully we got rid of them all.
translation: 希望我们已经将共匪一网打尽了

original: [infiltrated_state.GetName] Base Area Discovered
translation: [infiltrated_state.GetName]的根据地被发现

original: Nationalist patrols have closed in on our Base Area in [infiltrated_state.GetName]. If they are willing to spend the resources, they may well stamp it out in a concerted military operation.
translation: 国民党特务已经发现了我们在[infiltrated_state.GetName]的根据地。如果他们愿意花费资源，他们可能会在接下来的的军事行动中将我们剿灭。

original: Let's hope it won't come to that.
translation: 希望那不要到来。

original: [infiltrated_state.GetName] Base Area Attacked
translation: [infiltrated_state.GetName]的根据地被攻击

original: Enemy forces have begun their attack on our Base Area in [infiltrated_state.GetName]. No messages have been received from our comrades in the state, but the enemy press is reporting the conclusion of the "[infiltrated_state.GetName] Encirclement and Erradication Campaign". We must assume the worst.
translation: 敌军在[infiltrated_state.GetName]开始对我们的根据地区域进行攻击。我们没能从我们的同志那边得到任何相关讯息，但国民党的新闻媒体报道了对[infiltrated_state.GetName]的包围和即将根除我们的同志的宣言。我们必须承担最坏的情况。

original: The revolution has suffered a setback.
translation: 革命陷入低谷

original: Communist Uprising
translation: 共党的崛起

original: Things are afoot in the Communist Party. Our intelligence serives have intercepted a number of couriers moving between base areas, carrying secret orders talking about "The Revolutionary Counterstroke" being prepared in secret bases all across the country. Soldiers and supplies are being gathered for a major operation - perhaps even a nation-wide uprising. We must make preparations immediately.
translation: 共党正在策划什么？我们的特务局的特工拦截了一些在他们根据地地区之间快速传令的信使，他们携带秘密指令--在全国各地的秘密根据地将准备“武装夺取政权”。士兵和补给被大量调配来支持一项重大行动 - 甚至可能是全国性的暴动。我们必须立即做好准备。

original: Prepare to fight for China!
translation: 为了华夏文明而战!

original: Communist Cell Discovered in [infiltrated_state.GetName]
translation: 共党在[infiltrated_state.GetName]被发现

original: Acting on information gathered by the intelligence service, our patrols have uncovered a major Communist Base Area. We should strike at once, before they can get more organized and resist our attempts to remove them.
translation: 根据情报部门收集到的情报，我们的特务部门发现了一个重要的共党窝点。我们应该立即开展行动，在他们组织起有效抵抗之前，全数消灭他们。

original: Speed is of the essence.
translation: 兵贵神速

original: Communist threat receeding?
translation: 共党的威胁消退？

original: A series of raids on known Communist hideouts has uncovered little news about the extent of the Communist infiltration. Extensive interrogation of the arrested Communists revealed nothing we did not know before. \n\nIt would appear as if our intelligence service has a fairly good handle on the issue.
translation: 对共党窝点的一系列清剿，让我们知晓了有关共党渗透计划的大量讯息。对被捕的共产党人的严刑拷打揭示了我们以前不知道的东西。\n\n看起来我们的情报部门对这个问题处理得相当好。

original: We should mop up the few cells we know about.
translation: 我们应该用最残忍的手段根除我们所知道的共党们。

original: Hopefully we got rid of them all.
translation: 希望我们已经把它们斩尽杀绝了。

original: Communist threat defeated
translation: 共党被击败了！

original: It seems as if the Communists have been dealt severe blows and setbacks over the last few months. Our agents have intercepted a growing number of messages from Communist Party Headquarters, asking local leaders about their status - often after arresting said leaders and lying in wait for the couriers. For the moment, it appears like the Communists are on the back foot, their organisation on the state level disrupted to the point of ineffectiveness. \n\nWe must remain vigilant, however, for as long as the Communist Party exists in any form, it may yet decide to renew its efforts.
translation: 看起来好像共党在过去几个月遭到了严重的打击和挫折。我们的国民政府军事委员会拦截了来自共党总部的越来越多的信息，我们要求共党了解他们的地位 - 我们逮捕了所有的共党领导人。目前看来，共党的情况非常不乐观，他们在州一级的基层组织已经被我们完全粉碎\n\n但只要共党以任何形式存在，我们必须同样保持警惕，防止他们卷土重来。

original: This will upset the warlords. They may decide to leave your faction, refuse your attempts to control them and will remember this slight in the future.
translation: 这会使军阀们感到不安。他们可能会拒绝控制他们的想法，更有可能决定离开你的阵营，并且他们还会把这件小事藏匿于心中，秋后算账。

original: An invitation from [From.GetLeader]
translation: 一次邀请来自[From.GetLeader]

original: [From.GetLeader] has sent a formal invitation to [CHI.GetLeader] to meet in Xi'an to discuss the current situation and future steps in the conflict against the Communists.\n\nRefusing this invitation will be seen as a personal slight by [From.GetLeader] and will no doubt be noticed by the other warlords.
translation: [From.GetLeader]向[CHI.GetLeader]发出了正式邀请，我们决定在西安举行会议，讨论当前的形势和未来的计划，以及针对共党冲突的解决方案。\n\n不受此次邀请将被[From.GetLeader]视为无理，并且无疑会被其他军阀注意到。

original: Go
translation: 即刻启程

original: Don't Go
translation: 且慢，容我三思

original: [From.GetLeader] arrives in Xi'an
translation: [From.GetLeader]到达了先

original: Traveling with only a small escort, [From.GetLeader] has come to Xi'an to discuss the situation with us. He no doubt expects us to renew our commitment against the communists to wipe them out. With the Japanese army on our doorstep, we will have to make things clear to him.
translation: [From.GetLeader]只带了一支小护卫，来到西安与我们一起讨论当权局势。他毫无疑问地希望我们重申我们的承诺：旗帜鲜明地反对共党并将其消灭。但是日本侵略者已经打到了我们家门口，我们将不得不向他澄清一些事情……

original: Ask him to ally with the Communists.
translation: 兵谏，迫使他和中共结成抗日民族统一战线。

original: [From.GetLeader] refuses to meet.
translation: [From.GetLeader]拒绝会面。

original: Citing a nasty cold, [CHI.GetLeader] has 'reluctantly' turned down our invitation. Whether this means that he plans to take more direct control of our lands in the immediate future or that someone leaked our plans to him remains to be seen.
translation: 以重感冒为由，[CHI.GetLeader]'勉强'拒绝了我们的盛邀。这是否意味着他计划在不久的将来更直接地控制我们的土地，或者是否有人将我们的计划泄露给他，这还有待观察。

original: Maybe he really has a cold?
translation: 也许是中风了？

original: [From.GetLeader] proposes an alliance with the Communists
translation: [From.GetLeader]保证与中共结成抗日民族统一战线

original: At the Xi'an meeting, [From.GetLeader] has made a surprising suggestion: He believes that we should forge an alliance with the communists to be able to face the Japanese threat as a united front.
translation: 在西安会议上，[From.GetLeader]出了一个令人惊讶的建议：他认为我们应该与共党建立联盟，结成中华民族统一战线，以便对抗日本侵略者的威胁。

original: Perhaps he is right.
translation: 也许他是……对的吧。

original: We still remember how the last one went.
translation: 我们仍然记得最后是怎么回事。

original: [CHI.GetLeader] proposes an alliance.
translation: [CHI.GetLeader]保证结盟。

original: It seems that the Nationalist camp has finally grown tired of trying to wipe us from the map. At a meeting in Xi'an, [CHI.GetLeader] has apparently agreed to explore the possibility of an alliance with us against the Japanese.\n\nWe should carefully weigh our options.
translation: 似乎国民党阵营终于厌倦了试图从地图上抹去我们。在西安举行的一次会议上，[CHI.GetLeader]显然已经同意探讨与我们的盟约来对抗日寇。\n\n我们应该仔细权衡我们的抉择。

original: The Japanese are the bigger threat.
translation: 兄弟阋于墙，外御其侮。

original: No deals with the Nationalists!
translation: 跟在老苏区屠杀三十万老百姓的白匪免谈!

original: [From.GetLeader] refuses to ally with the Communists
translation: [From.GetLeader]拒绝跟共产党结盟

original: Despite our arguments and demands to stop this needless war, [From.GetLeader] has refused to entertain the notion of a United Front with the Communists. It is clear that more decisive measures will need to be taken. Should we arrest him and turn him over to the Communists?
translation: 尽管我们有理由和要求阻止这场不必要的战争，但[From.GetLeader]拒绝接受中华民族抗日统一战线与跟共产党人合作的观念。显然需要采取更加果断的措施。我们应该逮捕他并把他交给共产党人吗？

original: It is our only option.
translation: 机不可失，兵谏！

original: That could easily spiral out of control.
translation: 这可能很容易失控

original: [CHI.GetLeader] arrested in [CHI_xian_instigator.GetNameDef]!
translation: [CHI.GetLeader]在[CHI_xian_instigator.GetNameDef]被捕!

original: [CHI_xian_instigator.GetLeader] has sent a message saying that he has arrested [CHI.GetLeader] and is willing to turn him over to us. \n\nThis may be the best chance we will ever have to execute this enemy of the people!
translation: [CHI_xian_instigator.GetLeader]已经给我们发来了急电，告诉我们他们逮捕了[CHI.GetLeader]并愿意把他交给我们。\n\n这可能是我们公审蒋介石--全中国人民的敌人的最好机会！

original: [From.GetLeader] has refused our proposal to execute [CHI.GetLeader]. Instead, we are supposed to make an alliance with the Nationalists, as apparently we are not yet ready to lead the revolution and defend ourselves against the Japanese at the same time.
translation: [From.GetLeader]已经拒绝了我们将公审[CHI.GetLeader]的提议。相反，我们应该与国民党结盟，因为显然我们还没有准备好领导革命，同时我们应该跟国民党一道准备保卫祖国，打倒日寇。

original: Ask the Soviets for approval.
translation: 请求苏共中央批准

original: Off with his head!
translation: 发动全苏区公审他！

original: We should ally with him against the Japanese.
translation: 兄弟阋于墙，外御其侮

original: Killing him now would lead to a war we can not win. Let him go.
translation: 现在公审只会让我们全盘皆输，放了他从长计议。

original: [From.GetLeader] has arrested [CHI.GetLeader]!
translation: [From.GetLeader]已经逮捕了[CHI.GetLeader]！

original: We have intercepted a message from [From.GetLeader], saying that he has [CHI.GetLeader] in custody and wants to turn him over to the Communists. Given the level of hatred they have for him, it is unlikely that he would survive this for long. \n\nIf we want to avoid seeing [CHI.GetLeader] put on a show trial by [PRC.GetLeader] and executed, we must act swiftly and decisively!
translation: 我们截获了一封来自[From.GetLeader]的消息，他们说道[CHI.GetLeader]在羁押之中，并想把他交给共产党人。并想把他交给共产党人。鉴于共党对他的仇恨程度，他早晚会被公审。\n\n如果我们想避免[CHI.GetLeader]被[PRC.GetLeader]拉到延安的闹市区公审并交给群众处决，我们必须迅速行动！

original: Send in the troops!
translation: 我们必须立刻行动！

original: They wouldn't harm him. Let's wait.
translation: 共党不会伤害他，喝杯红茶看戏吧。

original: [CHI.GetLeader] arrested in [CHI_xian_instigator.GetNameDef]!
translation: [CHI.GetLeader]在[CHI_xian_instigator.GetNameDef]被捕！

original: [PRC.GetLeader] has sent a message stating that the Communists have the unique opportunity to put [CHI.GetLeader] on trial for his crimes against the people and the revolution. Executing him would be a huge victory for the communist party in their struggle for leadership in China. \n\nHowever, it would also weaken the Nationalists in a critical moment, perhaps allowing the Japanese to make further progress in China.
translation: [PRC.GetLeader]发出消息指出，共产党人现在有绝佳机会将国民党反动派领导人[CHI.GetLeader]公审，这是对苏区百姓的屠杀的“正名”行动。公审并处决他将是共产党争取领导中国革命的一次巨大胜利。\n\n然而，这也会在潜移默化中削弱整个中国的力量，同时这也会让虎视眈眈的日本人在中国的阴谋得逞。

original: Another bourgeois enemy meets his end.
translation: 另一个白匪走到了他的末日。

original: He is still needed.
translation: 他仍然有用。

original: [PRC.GetLeader] proposes an alliance
translation: [PRC.GetLeader]提出了一个联盟

original:
Rather than the expected show trial and subsequent execution, the Communists have instead signalled that they would prefer a formal alliance against the Japanese. 

They are clearly stalling for time, knowing that another good push would see them wiped out. If they actually wanted [CHI.GetLeader] dead, he would already have been executed.

However, some people in our government wonder why the Communists would push for an alliance now - perhaps they know something we don't?
translation:
共产党人不但没有预期的公审并且处决蒋介石，反而表示他们更愿意与国民党建立正式的联盟来对抗日本人。

他们显然拖延时间，知道另一个好的推动会使他们精疲力竭。如果他们真的想要[CHI.GetLeader]死，他应该已经被公审了。

我们政府的一些人想知道为什么共产党现在会跟他们的宿敌推动一个联盟 - 也许他们正在暗中谋划什么？？？

original: As long as they follow our orders.
translation: 只要他们听从我们的命令。

original: No deals with the Communists!
translation: 跟共党免谈！

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] offers support
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]提供支持

original: [From.GetLeader] has arrived at our capital to discuss our situation. Meeting with independence activists as well as the government, he stated that our independence is a vital national interest of [From.GetNameDef], and they are willing to support any attempt to move towards greater independence.
translation: [From.GetLeader]已经到首都讨论我们的情况了。在政府首脑会见了自由主义人士，他们声称国家至关重要的利益在于[From.GetNameDef]的独立和自主性，他们愿意共同进退并同意一致向前，为国家强盛迈出更大的一步。

original: Their help is more than welcome.
translation: 他们的帮助将助我们一臂之力。

original: We are quite happy with our current situation.
translation: 我们对目前的形势很满意。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] accepts our support
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]接受了我们的支持

original: In a private conversation, government officals from [From.GetNameDef] have expressed great interest in what we can do to support an independent state. Funds have been made available for groups advocating greater independence, and we have begun organising a "Provisional Free [From.GetAdjective] Government in Exile".
translation: 在一个私人会议中，政府高层[From.GetNameDef]对我们想为国家独立所献出的一份力表示有极大的兴趣。政府高层为倡导更大独立提供了资金，我们已经开始组织“临时[From.GetAdjective]自由流亡政府“。

original: Their fight is our fight.
translation: 共同进退

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] refuses our support
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝了我们的支持

original: In a stern note, [From.GetLeader] has informed us that his government would not tolerate any interference with internal [From.GetAdjective] matters. Diplomatic protocol forbids declaring [From.From.GetLeader] a persona non grata and forbid him entry, but practically our entire delegation has been banned from returning to [From.GetNameDef] instead.
translation: 严肃的事实却是[From.GetLeader]他告诉我们，他的政府绝不容忍[From.GetAdjective]干涉内政的行为。外交部宣布[From.From.GetLeader]为不受欢迎的人且被禁止入境，准确的说我们整个代表团都被禁止再次踏入[From.GetNameDef]的领土了。

original: Shame.
translation: 真是耻辱！

original: Independence movement in [From.GetNameDef] gathers strength
translation: 在[From.GetNameDef]的独立运动中大显身手

original: It appears that [From.From.GetLeader]'s recent visit to [From.GetNameDef] was not just an exchange of niceties over tea. Recently, the previously separate and splittered independence movements in the country have started to coordinate in a much better fashion. It almost appears as if someone is helping them organise from abroad.
translation: 看来[From.From.GetLeader]最近访问[From.GetNameDef]并不仅仅是互相交流品茶的经验。最近一段时间，国内之前相互没有联系的独立运动开始变成了有组织的行动。基本可以肯定这是被在国外的某人组织起来的。

original: Unsettling.
translation: 令人不安。

original: The Flying Tigers
translation: 飞虎队

original:
Soong Mei-Ling, Wife of Chiang Kai-Shek and one of his most trusted advisers, has travelled to Washington to lobby for increased support to China in its struggle against Japan. The Chinese Air Force is in desperate need of modern planes and skilled pilots to fly them.

Soong's appeal has resonated with the gernal public, and a number of our pilots have resigned from the service to sign up at a Chinese company to provide "Training and Instruction" to Chinese pilots.

With the issue of pilots resolved, Soong Mei-Ling has approached us with a request to allow the transfer of about 150 of our most modern fighters to reequip the Chinese Air Force.
translation:
宋美龄——蒋介石的爱人，也是他最值得信赖的顾问之一，前往华盛顿游说支持中国与日本的抗争。中国空军迫切需要现代化的飞机和熟练的飞行员来驾驭天空。



飞行员的问题解决了，宋美龄还与我们的请求，允许150架次的众数现代战斗机转移到中国空军装备库存中。

original: The war in China has taken its toll on the Chinese Air Force. Outnumbered and outgunned by their opponents, they have fought gallantly to contest the skies over China. \n\nDespite the bravery of their pilots, the [From.GetAdjective] Air Force is desperately searching for new planes and pilots to replace its losses. A delegation sent by [From.GetLeader] has arrived in Washington to negotiate the transfer of about 150 modern fighters and allowing a similar number of pilots to go to China to fly those planes.
translation: 在中国空域上的战役已经让中国空军损失惨重，面对数倍自身的敌机，他们依然能够英勇的驰骋在中国的上空。\n\n尽管飞行员们很勇敢，但[From.GetAdjective]空军正在拼命寻找新的飞机和飞行员来弥补损失。派出一个代表团由[From.GetLeader]抵达华盛顿谈判，将150架现代战机和相同数量的飞行员一起运往中国。

original: We must support them in any way we can.
translation: 我们必须以任何方式支持他们。

original: We must not allow ourselves to be drawn into this conflict.
translation: 我们决不能让自己卷入这场冲突中。

original: The Soviet Volunteer Group
translation: 苏联志愿者小组

original: The continued fighting in China has created a need to provide air support for our comrades in the [From.GetAdjective] Red Army. [From.GetLeader] has approached us about sending a volunteer group of pilots and planes. He requests about 50 bombers and 100 fighters to provide escort to them. \n\nThis may provide useful experience for our pilots and allow us to test our newest designs in action.
translation: 持续的中国战事，创造了一个急需我们提供空中支援的战场，让我们为[From.GetAdjective]的同志提供空中支援。[From.GetLeader]向我们寻求派遣一批和飞机的经验丰富的飞行驾驶员志愿者。他要求大约50架轰炸机和100架战斗机为他们提供护航。\n\n这可能为我们的飞行员提供有益的经验，这也允许我们测试我们的最新设计飞行器设计。

original: With the war in China continuing, the [From.GetAdjective] Air Force has been stretched thin trying to defend the airspace over [From.GetNameDef] and provide air support for the fighting troops. [From.GetLeader] has launched a personal appeal to [SOV.GetLeader] to send support in the form of a combined force of about 50 medium bombers and 100 fighters.\n\nThis may prove a useful opportunity to test our most modern equipment under combat conditions.
translation: 随着中国继续战争，[From.GetAdjective]空军已经捉襟见肘，为了捍卫[From.GetNameDef]领空的，为作战部队的空中支援。[From.GetLeader]发起个人呼吁[SOV.GetLeader]，希望他能以大约50架中型轰炸机和100架战斗机的联合飞行部队的形式提供支援。\n\n这可能是在作战条件下测试我们最现代化装备的一个很好的机会。

original: We must support them in any way we can.
translation: 我们必须以任何方式支持他们。

original: They will have to make do with what they have.
translation: 让他们自身自灭，和我们无关。

original: A new general for [From.GetNameDef]
translation: 为[From.GetNameDef]而战的新将军

original:
[From.GetLeader] has sent a letter to [USA.GetLeader], suggesting that we send one of our Generals to serve as a Chief of Staff for the [From.GetAdjective] Army. 

Doing so would earn us the personal gratitude of [From.GetLeader] and may provide valuable experience for our general as well as help the forces of [From.GetLeader] win the war.

Which one of our Generals should we send?
translation:
[From.GetLeader]写了一封讯息给[USA.GetLeader]，建议我们派一位将军担任[From.GetAdjective]的军级参谋长。

这样做将使我们获得[From.GetLeader]他个人的感激，并可能为我们的将军提供宝贵的经验，也有助于[From.GetLeader]赢得战争。

我们应该派哪一个将军来？

original: Send Joseph Stillwell
translation: 约瑟夫·史迪威

original: They will have to fend for themselves.
translation: 他们将不得不自谋生计。

original: Send Douglas MacArthur
translation: 道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟

original: Send Dwight Eisenhower
translation: 德怀特·艾森豪威尔

original: [CHI_USA_General.GetName] Comes to China
translation: [CHI_USA_General.GetName]来到了中国

original: [From.GetLeader] has accepted our request for assistance and has ordered [CHI_USA_General.GetName] to report for duty here in China as soon as possible.\n\nThe General is not supposed to be a mere advisor to [Root.GetLeader] but to command troops in the field as well, giving him some first hand experience in fighting in a modern war.
translation: [From.GetLeader]已经接受了我们的援助请求，下令[CHI_USA_General.GetName]尽快到中国报到。\n\n将军不应该仅仅是[Root.GetLeader]的顾问，更是在战场上指挥军队的指挥官，在真实的战场中给予将军第一手的战斗经验。

original: A valuable addition.
translation: 有价值的附加

original: No help from [From.GetNameDef]
translation: 从[From.GetNameDef]寻求不到帮助

original: Our request to [From.GetLeader] has fallen on deaf ears. While several high-ranking officers in the US Army have indicated that they would be willing to take the assignment, the Secretary of War and President [From.GetLeader] have both vetoed the idea as impractical and not in the national interest.
translation: 我们对[From.GetLeader]的要求置若罔闻。虽然美国军队的几名高级军官表示愿意接受这项任务，但战争部长和[From.GetLeader]国总统都否决了这一想法，认为这不切实际，也不符合国家利益。

original: Are they cowards, fools, or both?
translation: 他们是懦夫，傻瓜，还是两者都是？

original: [From.GetLeader] suggests an alliance
translation: [From.GetLeader]提议结盟

original: After years of ineffective conflict, and with the threat of Japan looming in the background, the communists have approached us with the offer to create a joint government. Our armies would fight side by side, and we will coordinate on our policies.\n\nThe motive behind this sudden change of heart in the communists is less clear, and some in the government believe that is merely the first stage in a plan to take over the country.
translation: 多年的无效的冲突之后，在日本威胁的背景下，共产党向我们提出了建立联合政府的提议。我们的军队将并肩作战，我们将协调我们的政策。\n\n共产党人突然改变主意的动机还不太清楚，政府中的一些人认为这只是接管国家计划的第一步。

original: We must unite against our enemies.
translation: 我们团结一致！

original: We won't fall for this cheap trick.
translation: 我们是不会被这个低级骗术骗到的。

original: [From.GetLeader] refuses Alliance.
translation: [From.GetLeader]拒绝联盟。

original: After long deliberation, [From.GetLeader] has decided to turn away our delegation. Our sources inside the government report that he sees communist plots everywhere and believes that we are trying to take over the government and steal the country away from him.
translation: 深思熟虑之后，[From.GetLeader]决定取消代表团。我们政府内部对消息来源进行讨论后，我们觉得这都是共党的阴谋，他们企图颠覆我们的政府，并从我们的手中夺取政权！

original: How paranoid.
translation: 真是偏执！

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] demands our Cooperation
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]要求我们合作

original: Following the creation of the Government of National Defense, [From.GetNameDef] has made it clear that he does not tolerate any "excessive independence and insubordination". With war against Japan becoming more and more likely, anyone not standing with the Government of National Defense will be treated as a potentially enemy, and [From.GetLeader] openly said that he would not wait until a war breaks out to make a move against the warlords that refuse to bend the knee.
translation: 随着统一战线的创建，[From.GetNameDef]明确表示他不会容忍任何“过分独立和不服从”的行为。随着对日战争脚步愈来愈近，任何不站在统一战线手中的人都会被视为潜在的敌人，[From.GetLeader]公开表示，他不会等到战争爆发，才去对付那些拒绝屈膝的军阀。

original: We take our chances with the Government.
translation: 我们得在政府的政策中把握机会。

original: That blustering idiot is clearly bluffing.
translation: 那狂妄的白痴显然是虚张声势。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] joins the Government of National Defense
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]加入统一战线

original: [From.GetLeader] has seen reason and decided to join our Alliance. His forces will now support us in the battles to come.
translation: [From.GetLeader]明白了原因，决定加入我们的联盟。他的部队现在将协助我们进行的战斗。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] refuses
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝了！

original: For reasons passing understanding, [From.GetLeader] has refused to cooperate with us on even the most basic matters. He claims that we are nothing but a group of bandits that will be erradicated soon enough, and has called on other warlords to join him in opposition.
translation: 出于个人原因，[From.GetLeader]在最核心的问题上拒绝与我们合作。他声称，我们只不过是一群野蛮人，将会被历史的浪潮所淹没，他呼吁其他军阀一起反对。

original: He will be brought to heel.
translation: 他将受到惩罚。

original: Korea
translation: 韩国

original: Manchuria
translation: 满洲国

original: Chinese Provocation
translation: 中国的挑衅

original:
New details have emerged about the latest attack on our soil. While none of the perpetrators have been caught so far, evidence clearly suggests that it was a deliberate provocation by the Chinese. 

The Chinese government has been suspiciously slow in condemning the attack, and Chinese newspapers have hailed it as a heroic act of defiance against "Japanese Imperialism".

The Cabinet has assembled to discuss matters and propose measures to deal with the blatant assault.
translation:
最近对我们领土的袭击出现了新的端倪。虽然迄今为止没有一个肇事者被捕，但有证据表明这是中国人蓄意挑衅的行为。

中国政府表面上一直在缓慢地谴责并质疑这次攻击，但中国的报纸都把这称为对“日本帝国主义”的反抗的英雄行为。

内阁聚集起来讨论问题，并提议采取相对应的措施来对付明目张胆的袭击。

original: Demand an apology.
translation: 要求官方致歉。

original: Mobilize the troops and prepare to go to war.
translation: 好好教训他们！

original: Arms Factory Sabotaged
translation: 军用工厂被破坏

original: Reports have come in from one of our factories in [JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet], reporting that a major fire broke out last night. Local firefighters are still tackling the blaze, but are confident that they will have the fire under control by the end of the day. The damage to the factory appears to be significant, as the fire appears to have started in the storage area for highly flammable chemicals.\n\nMilitary Intelligence has started a thorough investigation to find out how the fire could break out despite the strictest safety measures. First leads indicate arson as a strong possibility.
translation: 报告来自我们的又一家工厂——[JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet]，报道昨晚又发生了一场大火。当地仍在进行消防工作，他们相信能在一天内控制火势。但工厂的损坏似乎很严重，因为火灾似乎又是在高度易燃化学品的储存区开始的。\n\n工厂有最严格的安全应急措施，火灾却又爆发了。军情部门再次调查并公开表示，这还可能是由人为纵火所引起的一场火灾。

original: Who would do such a thing?
translation: 谁会做这样的事？

original: Civilian Factory Sabotaged
translation: 民用工厂被破坏

original: Bridge Blown
translation: 大桥被炸

original:
Sometime during the last night, a major railway bridge in [JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet] collapsed under the weight of a passing ammunition train. Rescue and recovery efforts have been made difficult by the secondary exposions from the ammunition. The crew of the train is still missing, presumed dead.

Military Intelligence has dispatched a team to investigate the site as soon as it is safe to do so, to find out how a sturdy bridge could collapse with no warning signs.

Local witnesses report seeing a small group in the valley below the bridge on the day before the collapse. Their whereabouts are currently unknown.
translation:
昨晚的某个时候，又一座[JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet]的主要铁路桥在通过一辆装有武器弹药的列车时，因为列车重量而导致整体桥梁坍塌，与此同时车上弹药引发的二次爆炸更是将整座桥梁炸上了天。救援和恢复工作在弹药的二次爆炸下相当困难，列车上的机组人员依旧下落不明，当地人据推测他们在此归西。

军情部门又派遣了一个小组，在安全的情况下，立即调查这个地点，他们又在寻找一座坚固的桥梁如何在没有任何警告信号的情况下而塌方的。

当地目击者报告说，在坍塌的前一天，桥下的山谷里又看到了一小群人。我们仍未知道那天所看见的游击队的名字。

original: Patrol Ambushed
translation: 人员被袭

original:
One of our patrols in [JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet] has failed to report in. A search party working along the patrol's path found a battlefield, with signs that the patrol was surprised and annihilated in brutal hand-to-hand fighting.

Whether the attackers suffered any casualties is currently unknown, but the only corpses found belong to Japanese Army soldiers.

They almost appear to have been left deliberately, perhaps to send a message.
translation:
我们在[JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet]的一个巡逻队下落不明。一个搜救队沿着巡逻队的路径找到了他们，现场简直不堪入目，迹象表明巡逻队是被惨无人道拳头的攻击中所牺牲的。

袭击者是否有任何伤亡目前还不清楚，但在场发现的尸体属于日本陆军士兵。

他们似乎是故意将尸体弃置并离开，也许是为了传达一个狂妄的讯息。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Wants Overlordship of Our Colonies
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]希望我们的殖民地地位

original: Seizing the opportunity granted by our weakness, the [Root.GetAdjective] have offered to 'help' us with 'maintaining order' in our colonies. They argue that, with the fall of our mainland, we have no possibility of maintaining our hold.\n\nIt is clearly a ploy to wrestle control of our colonies away from us, but what choice do we have?
translation: 抓住我们软弱的机会，[Root.GetAdjective]主动提出帮助我们维持殖民地的秩序。他们争辩说，随着我们大陆的衰落，我们不可能维持我们的地位。\n\n这显然是一种表面说辞，仅仅是让我们殖民地远离我们的策略，但是我们有什么选择呢？

original: It is time to accept Japanese dominance in the East.
translation: 是时候接受日本在东方的统治了。

original: They'll have to take them by force!
translation: 他们得用武力对付他们！

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Grants Overlordship of Colonies
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]授予殖民地

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] have carefully considered our offer to 'maintain order' in their colonies, and have decided to accept. They have effectively transferred total control over to us.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]仔细考虑了我们在他们的殖民地维持秩序的提议，并决定接受。

original: A wise decision.
translation: 聪明的决定

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Refuses Overlordship of Colonies
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝授予殖民地

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] have carefully considered our offer to 'maintain order' in their colonies, and have decided to reject it.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]仔细考虑了我们在他们的殖民地维持秩序的提议，并决定拒绝它。

original: We shall see how that pans out for them.
translation: 我们要看看他们是怎么做到的。

original: Non-Aggression Pact with [From.GetNameDef]
translation: 和[From.GetNameDef]的互不侵犯条约

original: Despite tensions between [From.GetAdjective] and [Root.GetNameDef] increasing until recently, the [From.GetAdjective] have now opened negotiations for a Non-Aggression Pact. The advantages to us are clear, but what should concern us is the advantages it will give to the [From.GetAdjective], and whether we will live to regret this move.
translation: 尽管紧张度因[From.GetAdjective]和[Root.GetNameDef]增加到现在。但现在，[From.GetAdjective]现已开始坐下和谈并签订互不侵犯条约。我们的优势是显而易见的，但我们应该考虑的是它给[From.GetAdjective]带来的好处，以及我们是否会为这一举动在日后感到遗憾。

original: We must have peace... for now.
translation: 我们必须和平…现在。

original: Denying them any advantage takes precedence!
translation: 是时候让他们偿还了！

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Accepts Non-Aggression Pact
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]接受互不侵犯条约

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has formally accepted our offer of a Non-Aggression Pact.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经正式接受我们提出的互不侵犯条约。

original: They play right into our hands.
translation: 他们为我们行了方便。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Refuses Non-Aggression Pact
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap] 拒绝互不侵犯条约。

original: For whatever reason, [From.GetNameDef] has rejected our offer of a Non-Aggression Pact.
translation: 出于某些原因，[From.GetNameDef]拒绝了我们提出的互不侵犯条约。

original: Are they plotting against us?
translation: 他们是不是在对我们搞什么密谋？

original: Exchange of [From.GetAdjective] Generals
translation: [From.GetAdjective]指挥层变动

original: The [From.GetAdjective] have decided to recall their left-leaning civil servants and generals, and have instead sent us their right-leaning generals and civil servants in unofficial exile.
translation: [From.GetAdjective] 决定将其左倾的公职人员和将领们召回，代之以非正式放逐的形式送来了右倾的将领和官员。

original: It would seem something's afoot in [From.GetNameDef]...
translation: 看来在[From.GetNameDef]国内出了什么事……

original: [Root.GetAdjective] Generals Exchanged
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]指挥层变动

original: The process of exchanging our right-leaning generals and civil servants for the left-leaning ones we had previously sent into unofficial exile in [From.GetNameDef] has now beeen completed.
translation: 我们先前用非正式放逐形式以左倾人士撤换右倾将领及官员的行动已经在全[From.GetNameDef]圆满完成了。

original: This will strengthen our hold over [Root.GetNameDef].
translation: 这将有助于我们控制[Root.GetNameDef]。

original: Fate of the Imperial Family
translation: 皇室家族的命运

original: The time has come to see to the fate of the Emperor and his family. Hereditary social status has no place in the Japan we are building. What shall become of them?
translation: 是时候决断皇帝及其皇室家族的命运了。世袭的社会阶层在我们建设的新日本里断然不能存在。我们该如何处置他们？

original: Exile them!
translation: 放逐他们！

original: Have their heads!
translation: 砍了他们的头！

original: Exiled Imperial Family
translation: 放逐皇室家族

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has exiled the imperial family, bestowing a great boon upon us in doing so! He has now arrived in [Root.GetNameDef], and despite his exile his influence with the people and the troops is still great.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]放逐了皇室家族，如此举动使我们蒙受了极大的惠利。天皇陛下现在已经抵达了[Root.GetNameDef]，虽然他已经被逐，但是他在人民和军队中的影响力依然无与伦比。

original: We must be worthy of being his home!
translation: 我们必须无愧于天皇新居之名！

original: The Manchurian Reunification
translation: 统一满洲

original: With their recent victory against [MAN.GetName], the Japanese government has now acknowledged Chinese ties to the region, and has, as of immediately, transferred all control to us. With this gesture of goodwill, they offer us an alliance.
translation: 在最近对[MAN.GetName]的胜利过后，日本政府认识到了这一地区与中国的紧密联系，立刻将此地全面转交给了我方。他们借此好意，向我们提出军事同盟。

original: Perhaps the Japanese can indeed be dealt with.
translation: 也许和日本人真的谈得来。

original: We will accept Manchuria, but not their kindness.
translation: 我们会接收满洲，但不会接受他们的好意。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] thanks us for the return of Manchuria, and have accepted our offer of an alliance.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap] 感谢我们归还满洲，接受了我们提出的军事同盟。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] thanks us for the return of Manchuria, but have rejected our offer of an alliance.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap] 感谢我们归还满洲，但是拒绝了我们提出的军事同盟。

original: Phillipine Sovereignty
translation: 菲律宾独立

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has made overt and public statements that they 'are no longer able to sit by and watch' as a nation in their sphere of interest continues to exist under Western boot. They now demand that we speed up our decolonization timeline and grant the Phillipines full sovereignty immediately.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经公开声明，他们“不能再坐视”一个西方控制国家在他们的势力范围内继续存在。他们现在要求我们加速去殖民化进程，立刻将全部主权让渡给菲律宾人民。

original: They are right. They deserve their freedom.
translation: 他们是对的。菲律宾应该自由。

original: The Phillipines will remain American!
translation: 菲律宾人还是美国的一份子！

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has responded to our demands for full Phillipine independence, and the American government has now made immediate arrangements to granting their Pacific subject full sovereignty.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经回应了我们提出的菲律宾完全独立的要求，美国政府将立即着手让他们这个太平洋属国完全独立。

original: At least they are sensible.
translation: 还好他们明事理。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has responded to our demands for full Phillipine independence, reiterating the 'vital American interests' the Phillipines represent in the region.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap] 已经回应了我们提出的菲律宾完全独立的要求，重申菲律宾在这一地区代表了“美国至关重要的利益”。

original: And they call themselves the 'defenders of Freedom'?
translation: 他们还管自己叫“自由卫士”？

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has responded to Japanese demands for our full independence, and the American government has now made immediate arrangements to grant us full sovereignty!
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]回应了日本要求我们完全独立的请求，美国政府现在将立即着手让我们完全独立！

original: Praise the Japanese!
translation: 感谢日本人！

original: Young Officer Coup
translation: 青年军官政变

original:
A group of young officers has succeeded in assassinating various government officials, as well as the prime minister. They have occupied Tokyo city and have secured control of the Imperial Palace, announcing their intent to purge the government of 'corrupt officials' and 'ideological threats', reinstating the Emperor as the sole ruler of the nation.

Their actions had an unexpectedly large following in the military, where intended counter-operations were forestalled by mass arrests and assassinations of elements loyal to the old government. Faced with the sudden and overwhelming nature of events, as well as rebel control of the palace, the Emperor has made no move to denounce the rebels.

Organized government resistance seems already to crumble, and the rebels are expected at any time to announce the establishment of total Imperial control to all areas of domestic, foreign, and military policy.
translation:
一群青年军官成功暗杀了许多政府官员，包括首相在内。他们已经占领了东京市区，并且控制了皇宫，宣称他们这是为了清除政府中的“腐败之徒”和“国体之危”，力主天皇重振地位，成为国家的唯一统治者

他们的行动在军队中吸引了大批追随者，以至于本该有的反制措施也被他们对旧政府支持者的大规模逮捕和暗杀所先发制人。事出突然，势如洪水，叛军也已经控制了皇宫，因此天皇并未对叛军做出任何谴责。

政府方面有组织的抵抗似乎已经开始瓦解，叛军预计随时可能宣布皇权对国内外和军队政策的直接控制。

original: Tennōheika Banzai!
translation: 天皇陛下万歳！

original: Japan Proposes Tripartite Pact
translation: 日本寻求三国同盟条约

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has sent out feelers to ascertain our interest in a three-powers pact between ourselves, the [JAP_initiator.GetAdjective], and the [ITA_fascism.GetAdjective]s. The [JAP_initiator.GetAdjective] argue that it is imperative that we support each other in light of increasingly hostile global opinion directed against our efforts.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]正试探我们是否有兴趣结成一个我方，[JAP_initiator.GetAdjective]和[ITA_fascism.GetAdjective] 的三国同盟条约。[JAP_initiator.GetAdjective]坚持认为在日益敌对的全球舆论下，我们必须互帮互助。

original: An excellent idea. We shall sign the Pact.
translation: 不错的主意，我们签了。

original: No, we must not risk antagonizing the world.
translation: 不，我们可不敢惹恼了全世界。

original: [JAP_initiator.GetNameDefCap] has sent out feelers to ascertain our interest in a three-powers pact between ourselves, the [JAP_initiator.GetAdjective], and the [GER_fascism.GetAdjective]s. The [JAP_initiator.GetAdjective] argue that it is imperative that we support each other in light of increasingly hostile global opinion directed against our efforts. The [GER_fascism.GetAdjective]s have already affirmed their support for the idea.
translation: [JAP_initiator.GetNameDefCap]正试探我们是否有兴趣结成一个我方，[JAP_initiator.GetAdjective]和[GER_fascism.GetAdjective]的三国同盟条约。[JAP_initiator.GetAdjective]坚持认为在日益敌对的全球舆论下，我们必须互帮互助。 而[GER_fascism.GetAdjective]也对这一看法表示赞同。

original: Tripartite Pact Signed
translation: 三国同盟条约签署

original: The [GER_fascism.GetAdjective] and [ITA_fascism.GetAdjective] governments have agreed to sign the proposed Tripartite Pact, pledging to stand by our side in the event of war.
translation: [GER_fascism.GetAdjective]和[ITA_fascism.GetAdjective]政府已经同意签署我们提出的三国同盟条约，表示一旦开战，会和我们并肩作战。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Rejects Tripartite Pact
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝签署三国同盟条约

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government has rejected the proposed Tripartite Pact, preferring to continue alone.
translation: [From.GetAdjective] 政府拒绝签署我们提出的三国同盟条约，他们还是想要自己单干。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Signs Tripartite Pact
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]签署了三国同盟条约

original: The [ITA_fascism.GetAdjective] government has agreed to sign the proposed Tripartite Pact, pledging to stand by our side in the event of war.
translation: [ITA_fascism.GetAdjective]政府已经同意签署我们提出的三国同盟条约，表示一旦开战，会和我们并肩作战。

original: Democratic Elements Stage Coup
translation: 民主派支持者发动政变

original: Democratic elements in the government have instigated a surprise take-over of the country, after the military threatened to once again curb the people's hard-gained democratic rights. With a surprising alacrity, a significant portion of the military has taken up arms in defense of the people and their rights to liberty.\n\nThis split in the military has allowed for the people's representatives to seize power in the legislative and executive branches. While the fighting has only just begun, it is unlikely that the present government can be unseated easily.
translation: 在军方威胁要再次限制人们得之不易的民主权利后，政府中的民主派鼓动了一场出人意料的夺权行动。行动出奇而迅速，军队中很大一部分人都转向捍卫人民和他们的自由权利。\n\n军队中的分裂使得人民代表得以在立法和行政机关中夺取权力。虽然斗争才刚刚开始，但是看起来新政府这次很难被轻松推翻了。

original: Never again shall the military rule us!
translation: 军队再也不能统治我们了！

original: [From.GetName] Attacks Soviet Union
translation: [From.GetName]攻击苏联

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has unilaterally attacked the Soviet Union, despite our non-aggression pact with them. We are left with no alternatives but to either honor our alliance and support the [From.GetAdjective] attack, or to honor our non-aggression pact with the Soviets and denounce the attack.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]单方面进攻了苏联，尽管我们和其有互不侵犯条约。我们要么遵守盟约，支援[From.GetAdjective]的进攻， 要么遵守与苏联的互不侵犯协定，谴责进攻行为。

original: We will join our allies!
translation: 我们会和盟友站在一边！

original: Our deals cannot be broken... Yet.
translation: 我们的互不侵犯条约暂时不能……打破

original: [From.GetName] Joins War
translation: [From.GetName]加入战争

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has decided to join our war against the Soviets, despite their former non-aggression pact with them.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]决定加入我们对抗苏联的战争，尽管他们和苏联已经签订了互不侵犯条约。

original: As they should.
translation: 他们应该如此。

original: [From.GetName] Denounces Our War
translation: [From.GetName]谴责我们开战

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has decided to honor their non-aggression pact with the Soviets, despite their commitment to us as our allies. They have denounced our aggression, in a seeming attempt to salvage the diplomatic situation with their fellow pact member.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]决定遵从他们与苏联的互不侵犯条约，背弃了作为盟友的承诺。他们谴责我们的侵略行径，似乎是想挽救和这个互不侵犯条约对象的外交危局。

original: That is most unfortunate.
translation: 真不幸。

original: [From.GetName] Requests Assistance
translation: [From.GetName]请求援助

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] is currently embroiled in a destructive civil war, and is having trouble matching their enemy's military strength. Their transitionary government has now approached our representatives with an offer to trade the Southern Sakhalin peninsula for the military assistance they so sorely need.\n\nThis may be a way to easily get some land in return for some volunteer divisions.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]正陷入一场毁灭性的内战，他们掌握的军事实力与敌人相比不容乐观。他们的过渡政府向我们提出要求，希望以南萨哈林半岛换取他们急切需要的军事援助。 \n\n仅仅需要派遣一些志愿军部队，我们就能很轻松的获得一些领土。

original: An excellent idea!
translation: 不错的主意！

original: These volunteers will be returned to the manpower pool if §Y[From.GetName]§! wins the civil war.
translation: 这些志愿军将回到人力池，如果 §Y[From.GetName]§! 赢得内战。

original: This is not a good trade for us.
translation: 对我们来说这不是多好的交易。

original: [From.GetName] Accepts Trade
translation: [From.GetName]接受交易

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has accepted our offer to trade the South Sakhalin Peninsula for military support. They have dispatched a few divisions of 'volunteers' to aid us in our fight!
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经接受我们提出的以南萨哈林半岛换取军事援助的请求。他们现在派出了一批“志愿师”来帮助我们作战！

original: They will come in very useful!
translation: 他们将会大显身手！

original: Gain 8 units with §Y12 infantry§! and §Y3 support§! battalions.
translation: 获得8个单位的具有§Y12 infantry§!和§Y3 support§!营的部队。

original: [From.GetName] Rejects Trade
translation: [From.GetName]拒绝交易

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has informed us that they have rejected our offer to trade the South Sakhalin Peninsula for military support.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]通知说他们拒绝了我们以南萨哈林半岛换取军事援助的请求。

original: We are on our own...
translation: 我们只能靠自己了……

original: [From.GetName] Takes Tokyo
translation: [From.GetName]占领东京

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has taken the Japanese capital, and the fascist [From.From.GetAdjective] government has fallen. If we wish to act, we must do so immediately. It is imperative that we move swiftly and secure control over the outlying Japanese islands and take command of the remaining fascist elements, if we are to contain the communist threat.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经占领了日本首都，法西斯[From.From.GetAdjective] 政府已经倒台。我们如果想采取行动，就要迅速执行。如果我们要遏制共产主义威胁，我们必须迅速、安全地控制外围的日本岛屿，并控制剩下的法西斯支持者。

original: Enact this plan.
translation: 开始计划。

original: This is not of interest to us at this time.
translation: 现在这样做毫无益处。

original: Fascists flee to Manchuria
translation: 法西斯分子逃往满洲

original: With the capture of Tokyo, the fascist government has fallen and their remaining supporters and military units have fled to [MAN.GetName], which has taken control of the outlying islands and Korean and Chinese possessions.\n\nThe civil war is effectively over, but the truce is tenuous, at best, as the fascists have not been decisively defeated.
translation: 东京被占领后，法西斯政府已经倒台，他们剩下的支持者和军队都逃往了[MAN.GetName]，并控制了外围岛屿以及朝鲜和中国的占领区。\n\n内战是迅速结束了，但是局势并不太平，法西斯分子还没有遭受决定性的失败。

original: We will deal with them later.
translation: 我们接下来会处理他们。

original: Fascist Resistance Collapses
translation: 法西斯分子的抵抗瓦解

original: With the capture of Tokyo, the fascist government has utterly collapsed. Their remaining supporters and military units have nothing to rally around, and have begun to disperse, allowing easy capture of the remaining and outlying territories.
translation: 东京已经被占领，法西斯政府彻底崩溃了。他们剩下的支持者和军队无从集结，树倒猢狲散，我们现在很轻松的占领了剩下的外围领土。

original: The war is won.
translation: 战争胜利了。

original: Volunteers Return Home
translation: 志愿者回家

original: With the communist victory in Japan, our surviving volunteers have now returned home.
translation: 日本的共产主义者胜利了，我们剩下的志愿部队现在要回家了。

original: Soviets Return Manchuria
translation: 苏联归还满洲

original: Having liberated Manchuria from the Japanese, and having rid it of the deposed Qing emperor, [From.GetNameDef] now has offered us the return of Manchuria, claiming it should return to rightful [Root.GetAdjective] hands.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]从日本人手中解放了满洲，打倒了那个逊位的清朝皇帝，现在他们提议将满洲归还，认为他应该正当交还到[Root.GetAdjective]手中。

original: [From.GetName] Offers Peace
translation: [From.GetName]提议和平

original: [From.GetAdjective] officials have approached us with a peace offer. They will leave the continent altogether, in return for an immediate cessation of hostilies.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]当权派向我们提出和平提议。他们将离开大陆，希望我们能停止一切敌对行为。

original: The war has been won.
translation: 战争胜利了。

original: We will only be satisfied with total victory!
translation: 不取得彻底胜利我们绝不会罢休。

original: [From.GetName] Accepts Peace
translation: [From.GetName]接受和平提议

original: [From.GetNameDef] has accepted our peace offer, and has ceased hostilies in return for our continental possessions.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]接受了我们的和平提议，停止了一切敌对行为，得到了我们全部大陆占领区。

original: They have bested us... For now.
translation: 他们打败了我们……暂时

original: [From.GetName] Rejects Peace
translation: [From.GetName]拒绝和平

original: [From.GetNameDef] has rejected our peace offer, vowing to pursue the war until they obtain an unconditional surrender.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]拒绝了我们的和平提议，发誓要继续战争，直到我们无条件投降。

original: Then we will fight to the last!
translation: 那我们就打到底！

original: [From.GetLeader] Demands Manchuria
translation: [From.GetLeader] 要求满洲

original: A few days ago, the government of [From.GetNameDef] began a concerted effort to apply pressure on us. Lead articles in newspapers demanded that we return Manchuria to [From.GetAdjective] control. This is not a mere propaganda move for internal consumption, as representatives of [From.GetLeader] have sounded us out through diplomatic backchannels to secure an agreement about the future of the Manchurian territories.\n\nToday, [From.GetLeader] himself weighed in on the matter, demanding a full return of Manchuria to [From.GetNameDef] as soon as possible. Otherwise his government would have to reconsider our current cooperation.
translation: 几天前，[From.GetNameDef]政府开始向我们不停施压。报纸头条都在呼吁我们将满洲交还给[From.GetAdjective]。这不仅仅是针对内部的宣传活动，[From.GetLeader]的代表也通过外交秘密途径对我们摸底，希望能达成一项关乎满洲领土未来命运的协定。\n\n今天[From.GetLeader]亲自就此事发表看法，要求我们尽快将满洲交还[From.GetNameDef]。否则他的政府将不得不重新考虑我们之间的合作关系。

original: It belongs to them.
translation: 满洲属于他们。

original: They are not yet ready to rule themselves.
translation: 他们还没做好亲自统治该地的准备。

original: Military Aid from [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]的军事援助

original: The Imperial Japanese Headquarters have decided on a fundamental shift in the strategic outlook. In a conference with the Emperor, the Army Minister presented a new plan that assumes that war with the Soviet union will break out in the near future. To prepare for this war, the Imperial Japanese Army has decided that our military must be able to defend parts of the front. For this purpose, a large amount of only slightly outdated equipment has been made available.
translation: 日本帝国大本营已经决定转变战略方向。在一次觐见天皇的会议中，陆军大臣提出了一项新计划，预估未来日苏之间会爆发战争。为了准备这次战争，日本帝国陆军要保证我军至少能守住一部分前线地区。因此，他们送给了我们很多只是稍稍过时的装备。

original: How nice of them.
translation: 他们真好。

original: [JAP.GetNameDefCap] Assumes Control Over [From.GetAdjective] Colonies
translation: [JAP.GetNameDefCap] Assumes Control Over [From.GetAdjective] Colonies

original: In light of [From.GetNameDef]'s current weakness, it is perhaps no surprise the [JAP.GetAdjective] have increased pressure for control over the [From.GetAdjective] east asian holdings. This morning, however, officials from the [From.GetAdjective] government made a surprise announcement that control of the [From.GetAdjective] colonies would be transferred to [JAP.GetNameDef], effective immediately.
translation: 鉴于[From.GetNameDef]最近力量虚弱，[JAP.GetAdjective]屡屡施压希望获取 [From.GetAdjective]的东亚领地也就不足为奇。然而今天早晨，[From.GetAdjective]政府的官员突然发出声明，声称[From.GetAdjective]的殖民地要立刻转交到[JAP.GetNameDef]手中。

original: Asia for the Asians!
translation: 亚洲人的亚洲！

original: A sad day for Europe...
translation: 欧洲人的伤心日……

original: Is it the end of colonialism?
translation: 这会是殖民主义的末日吗？

original: Phillipine Independence
translation: 菲律宾独立

original: As a result of [JAP.GetAdjective] pressure, the [From.GetAdjective] government has now announced the immediate cessation of [From.GetAdjective] colonial rule of the archipelago. As of today, full sovereignty has been granted to [PHI.GetNameDef].
translation: 作为[JAP.GetAdjective]施压的结果，[From.GetAdjective] 政府现在宣布立刻放弃[From.GetAdjective]对该群岛的殖民统治。就在今天，他们将全部主权让渡给了[PHI.GetNameDef]。

original: We were going to decolonize anyway.
translation: 我们早晚会摆脱殖民的。

original: A joyous day!
translation: 值得庆祝的一天！

original: Japanese Young Officer Coup
translation: 日本青年军官政变

original: A group of young officers has succeeded in toppling the government and reinstating the Emperor as the supreme ruler of the Japanese nation. It appears this was a reaction to perceived threats of wide-spread government corruption and adherents to hostile ideologies.\n\nAlready referring to the nation even more consistently in Imperial terms, the officers have announced purges will continue until 'all unsavory elements have been removed from the military and the government'. Emperor Hirohito, himself, has released a brief statement assuming the leadership offered to him by the rebels, and made clear overtures of reconciliation with China and the Western colonial powers in the Pacific.
translation: 一群青年军官已经成功地推翻了政府，将天皇恢复为日本民族的最高统治者。这一举动之所以发生，可能是因为他们发现了政府中腐败问题以及敌对思想派别极为广泛，从而感到了威胁。\n\n这些军官对天皇极为忠心，他们宣布将要继续清洗，直到“全部奸佞之徒都从政府和军队中被清除出去”。裕仁天皇本人发布了简短的声明，接受了叛军带给他的领导地位，并且明确表示了对中国与太平洋上西方殖民势力的和解意愿。

original: Banzai!
translation: 万岁！

original: Troubling news... They have made no such overtures to us...
translation: 糟糕的新闻……他们可没有和我们示好……

original: Does this guarantee peace in the Pacific?
translation: 这能保证太平洋的和平吗？

original: A sudden turn of events.
translation: 真是事出突然。

original: Chiang Kai-Shek Executed
translation: 蒋介石被处决

original:
Following his arrest by [CHI_xian_instigator.GetLeader], Chiang Kai-Shek has reportedly been killed by a Communist firing squad earlier this morning. After a quick trial for crimes against the people and the party, [PRC.GetLeader] pronounced the death sentence for Chiang Kai-Shek. Even a direct intervention by the representative of the Soviet Government was not enough to save his life.

[SOV.GetLeader] is reportedly furious about the "betrayal" by [PRC.GetLeader] and has ordered the arrest of of the Chinese Comintern delegation.

New Nationalist Leader [CHI.GetLeader] has vowed that the death of Chiang will be avenged and the Communists "exterminated".
translation:
被[CHI_xian_instigator.GetLeader]逮捕后，据说蒋介石已于今早被共产党行刑队枪杀。他们召开了一场简短的审判，称蒋的作为反党反人民，然后[PRC.GetLeader]宣判了蒋介石死刑。即便是苏联政府代表亲自出面也没能救下他的性命。

[SOV.GetLeader]据称对[PRC.GetLeader]的“背叛”极为愤怒，已经下令逮捕中国的共产国际代表。

新的国民党领导人[CHI.GetLeader]发誓要为蒋介石报仇，彻底“铲除”共产党。

original: He got what he deserved.
translation: 他罪有应得。

original: They made a murder and called it justice!
translation: 他们这是谋杀，还管自己叫正义！

original: This will have consequences.
translation: 这肯定会引发些事端。

original: China will destabilize even further.
translation: 中国的未来更不稳定了。

original: Chiang Kai-Shek Executed
translation: 蒋介石被处决

original: Following his arrest by [CHI_xian_instigator.GetLeader], Chiang Kai-Shek has reportedly been killed by a communist firing squad earlier this morning. After a quick trial for crimes against the people and the party, high treason, and counter-revolutionary activities, [PRC.GetLeader] pronounced the death sentence for Chiang Kai-Shek. The Soviet Representative acted as the prosecutor in the trial, fuelling speculation that [SOV.GetLeader] secretly approved the decision. \nNew Nationalist Leader [CHI.GetLeader] has vowed that the death of Chiang will be avenged and the Communists "exterminated".
translation: 被[CHI_xian_instigator.GetLeader]逮捕后，据说蒋介石已于今早被共产党行刑队枪杀。他们召开了一场简短的审判，称蒋犯下了反党反人民，叛国反革命的罪行，然后[PRC.GetLeader]宣判了蒋介石死刑。苏联代表也在审判中充当了公诉人，证实了[SOV.GetLeader]秘密支持这项决定的传言。\n新的国民党领导人[CHI.GetLeader]发誓要为蒋介石报仇，彻底“铲除”共产党。

original: We made the right decision.
translation: 我们做出了正确的决定。

original: Chiang Kai-Shek released from House Arrest
translation: 蒋介石被解除软禁

original: After being arrested by [CHI_xian_instigator.GetLeader] and turned over to the communists, [CHI.GetLeader] has reportedly returned home following extensive negotiations. Reports are still sketchy, but evidence suggests that [PRC.GetLeader] offered an alliance against the Japanese. Both sides have denied any such rumors, with [PRC.GetLeader] saying that he would rather see the country burned to ashes than to make common cause with the Nationalists, a sentiment that [CHI.GetLeader] quickly returned.
translation: 被[CHI_xian_instigator.GetLeader]扣押并交给共产党后，双方进行了广泛的谈判，[CHI.GetLeader]据称已被释放了。具体情况仍不清楚，但有证据表明，[PRC.GetLeader]提出要建立共同对抗日本的联盟。双方都否认这样的传言，[PRC.GetLeader]声称他宁愿国破家亡也不愿和国民党并肩作战，而[CHI.GetLeader]的看法也是如此。

original: What designs do they have on us?
translation: 他们在对我们搞什么密谋？

original: Like squabbling children...
translation: 跟小孩子吵嘴一样……

original: Japan will use this to their advantage.
translation: 日本会趁机火中取栗。

original: We could use this to our advantage.
translation: 我们会利用这机会的。

original: [PRC.GetLeader] denounces Nationalist Treason
translation: [PRC.GetLeader]谴责国民党叛国

original:
Following a meeting between [CHI.GetLeader] and [PRC.GetLeader], the later has decried what he calls "a blatant and transparent attempt to co-opt the Red Army for Nationalist and counter-revolutionary purposes." [CHI.GetLeader] has refused to comment on the issue, saying only that the Nationalist armies stand ready to defend China from any attacker. 

Reportedly, the two leaders discussed the possibility of forming a United Front against Japan.

Whether this breakdown leads to a renewal of the conflict between the two parties remains to be seen.
translation:
[CHI.GetLeader]和[PRC.GetLeader]的会面结束后，后者谴责对方“公开透明地用红军为国民党和反革命势力牟利”。[CHI.GetLeader]拒绝就此事作出评论，只说国民党军队做好了保卫中国抵抗任何侵略的准备。

据报道，两位领导人讨论了组建联合阵线对抗日本的可能性。

此次外交挫折是否会导致双方冲突的升级仍有待观察。

original: Why did we ever think they would change?
translation: 我们怎么就以为这帮人会有所长进？

original: Flying Tigers formed
translation: 飞虎队建立

original: Following a Chinese appeal for American pilots and mechanics to join a volunteer outfit, US President [USA.GetLeader] has officially approved the transfer of more than a hundred modern fighter planes to the Chinese Air Force. Pilots in the US Army, Navy or Marine Corps are also given leave to join this unit.\n\nThe first ships carrying the new fighters are supposed to leave as soon as the necessary equipment is assembled. Congressional leaders have expresseed concern that skirting the edges of international law like this will invite repercussions.
translation: 鉴于中方要求美国提供一整支飞行员与技师志愿者团队，[USA.GetLeader]总统正式批出一百余架新型战机送给中国空军。这批援助还包括来自美国陆军，海军和海军陆战队的飞行员们。 \n\n一旦必须的装备集结完毕，装载战机的船只就会出港。国会领导人表示，此举是在国际法边缘的试探，他们担忧这可能引起某些后果。

original: Good Hunting!
translation: 打猎愉快！

original: They are most welcome.
translation: 热烈欢迎。

original: Volunteers? More like Mercenaries!
translation: 志愿者？我看更像是雇佣兵！

original: The end of US isolation?
translation: 美国孤立主义的结束？

original: The Shanghai Incident
translation: 上海事变

original:
Tensions between China and Japan have risen sharply after a clash in Shanghai last night. 

Reports by western observers indicate that a brawl broke out between Chinese Police and a group of Japanese sailors, in which both sides suffered some injuries. When a Japanese patrol arrived to investigate, Chinese Army units had already blocked off all access to the site and arrested the Japanese sailors, who are to be charged with attempted murder.

The Japanese government has issued a sharp warning that, unless the sailors are released at once, measures would be taken to secure their freedom.
translation:
中日之间的紧张局势在昨晚在上海的一次冲突之后急速升温。 

西方观察家的报道表明，中国警察和一群日本水兵发生了冲突，双方各有人受伤。当一名日本巡逻队前来调查时，中国军队已经封锁了所有进入现场的地点，并逮捕了日本水兵，他们被控谋杀未遂。

日本政府发出一封咄咄逼人的警告，要求船员立即获释，否则将采取措施确保他们的人身自由。

original: Outrageous!
translation: 令人愤怒！

original: All according to plan.
translation: 正如计划所安排。

original: War is in the air.
translation: 战争即将到来。

original: This seems premeditated.
translation: 这似乎是有预谋的行动。

original: Chiang Kai-Shek Dead in Plane Crash
translation: 蒋介石死于空难

original:
Tragedy struck [CHI.GetNameDef] earlier today as a plane carrying Chiang Kai-Shek exploded in mid-air mere moments after take-off. Rescue crews are still combing through the wreckage, but few still hold out hope that they will find any survivors from amongst the crew and passengers.

Both the Generalissimo and his wife are presumed dead.

New Chinese leader [CHI.GetLeader] has promised a full investigation into the causes of the catastrophe. Rumors abound of a plot to kill the Generalissimo, seen by many as an obstacle in uniting the various factions inside China.
translation:
今天早些时候[CHI.GetNameDef]发生了一起悲剧，蒋介石搭乘的飞机起飞后不久就半空爆炸了。救援人员仍在寻找飞机残骸，但没几个人还抱着找到任何生还机组人员和乘客的希望了。

蒋委员长夫妇应该都死于空难之中了。

新的中国领导人[CHI.GetLeader]承诺要彻底调查此次事故的原因。很多流言都说这是一场刺杀委员长的阴谋，因为很多人视他为统一中国诸派系的阻碍。

original: One less problem to worry about.
translation: 又一个问题不必担心了。

original: This was no accident.
translation: 这可不是什么事故。

original: Tragic.
translation: 悲剧。

original: People's Republic of China declared
translation: 中华人民共和国成立

original: In a triumphant speech, [PRC.GetLeader] declared that "the Chinese people have stood up" and delivered the Communists to victory in the Chinese Civil War. With the Nationalists in full retreat, the Communist Party has at last secured victory after decades of strife. Henceforth, what was previously a small rebel group hiding in remote mountain villages will become a full-fledged government in a People's Republic of China.
translation: 在这场欢欣鼓舞的胜利演讲中，[PRC.GetLeader]宣布“中国人民站起来了”，中国共产党赢得了中国内战。国民党正全面溃退，共产党历经数十年斗争最终获得了胜利。从今以后，从前栖身于穷乡僻壤中的反抗武装将成为中华人民共和国的正统政府。

original: A great day.
translation: 伟大的一天。

original: A mere formality.
translation: 不过是走个形式。

original: They will never amount to anything.
translation: 这帮人什么也搞不出来的。

original: [PRC.GetLeader] wins internal power struggle
translation: [PRC.GetLeader]在内部权力斗争中获胜

original: The fights between the internal factions inside the Communist Party of China seem to have died down, with [PRC.GetLeader] emerging as the paramount leader. Mao Tse-Tung and the more moderate factions have lost considerable influence, as the Soviet-backed [PRC.GetLeader] has managed to outmaneuver them both. What, if any, role [SOV.GetLeader] had in this episode is subject of much speculation.
translation: 中国共产党内部各派的纷争似乎要结束了，[PRC.GetLeader]成为了最高领导人。毛泽东和其他较为缓和的派系的影响力都再不值一提，因为支持[PRC.GetLeader]的苏联政府出手制胜了他们。 [SOV.GetLeader]在这场斗争中的地位成了争议的热点。

original: May he lead us to victory!
translation: 希望他能带领我们走向胜利！

original: Insignificant.
translation: 不重要。

original: A useful ally.
translation: 有益的盟友。

original: He inherits a difficult position.
translation: 他捡着了个烫手山芋。

original: The China Pacification Campaign
translation: 中国安靖作战

original: Following a series of incidents described as "blatant provocations", the Japanese government has declared that a state of "armed conflict" exists in China. They claim that the central government of [CHI.GetLeader] has shown an unwillingness or inability to properly prosecute those responsible. Accordingly, they have announced that a "peacekeeping" force of Japanese troops has been dispatched to the country to restore order and prevent further attacks.
translation: 日本政府声称在之前的一系列事件中遭到了“公然挑衅”，宣称在中国发生了“武装冲突”问题。他们声称，[CHI.GetLeader]的中央政府无能或者不愿妥善承担这些责任。因此，他们派出了一支“维持治安”的日本军队前往中国，以恢复秩序，防卫未来可能遭到的攻击。

original: As planned.
translation: 正如计划。

original: Who did this?
translation: 谁干的？

original: What did we do!?
translation: 我们干了啥？！

original: A transparent excuse.
translation: 赤裸裸的借口。

original: They will learn the error of their ways.
translation: 他们会认识到自己的错误。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Offers Subjugation
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]要求附庸

original: With the central government in China utterly unable to provide for the safety of its people from bandits and communists, [From.GetLeader] has finally understood his position and reached out to us in an attempt to secure his position. He would fully cooperate with us and allow our troops free passage. In return, he only asks that we station some troops to protect his territory and remember his contribution when we are finished with reorganizing China.
translation: 由于中国中央政府完全无法保护人民免遭强盗与共产党的威胁，[From.GetLeader]最终明确了自己的位置，向我方接触，希望我们能保护他的地位。他会全力配合我们，让我们的部队自由通行。作为回报，他仅仅需要我们派出一些部队保护他的领地，在我们重组中国胜利之后还能记得他的功劳。

original: Finally, someone reasonable!
translation: 终于有些明白事理的人了！

original: We have no place for them in our plans.
translation: 我们的计划中没有他们的位置。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Accepts
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]接受了

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government has accepted our proposal. In return for their protection, we are to "strongly consider" the advice we are given on how to conduct ourselves. A [From.GetAdjective] government official has arrived to coordinate our policies.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府接受了我们的提议。作为换取保护的代价，我们要“审慎对待”他们的指令，想好该做什么不该做什么。一位[From.GetAdjective]政府的官员已经前来指导我们的政策。

original: A small price for our survival.
translation: 为了生存的一点小代价。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Refuses
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝了

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government has returned our note with a flat refusal to discuss it, saying that we lack the authority to negotiate with a proper national government.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府回复了我们的提议，他们根本不愿意和我们谈判，因为我们没有谈判的资格，并非合法的国家政府。

original: We will grow strong and show them.
translation: 我们要变得更强，让他们看看。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Requests lease of the Azores
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]要求租借亚速尔群岛

original: The [From.GetAdjective] have approached us with a request to lease the Azores for the duration of the war. The strategic location of the islands makes them an important base from which to guard the sea lanes across the Atlantic. The islands would be returned after the end of hostilities.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]向我们提议在战争期间向我们租借亚速尔群岛。这个群岛有极好的战略位置，是确保大西洋航线的重要基地。战争一旦结束，群岛就会归还。

original: Better than dragging us into the war...
translation: 比把我们拖入战争还是好一点……

original: Where is the benefit for us?
translation: 这对我们有什么好处？

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Accepts
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]接受了

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government has approved our request and given us full control over the Azores, with the understanding that we are now responsible for defending them from any attack. A small advance party has already arrived on the islands to set up a base of operations.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府已经接受了我们要求全面控制亚速尔的请求，换取我们担起保卫他们抵抗任何侵略的责任。已经有一个小规模先遣队到达岛上建立行动基地。

original: This will prove useful.
translation: 这将很有益处。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Refuses
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝了

original: Citing their declared stance of neutrality and the laws of warfare, the government of [From.GetLeader] has denied our request for basing rights in the Azores. Unless we find a way to get them into the war on our side, the islands remain blocked for us.
translation: 通过引用中立立场和战争法，[From.GetLeader]政府重申了他们维持中立的立场，例举了战争法，拒绝了我们请求在亚速尔群岛上设基地的请求。除非我们想办法让他们也伙同我们加入战争，否则岛屿依旧会对我们闭门。

original: We will remember this.
translation: 我们会记住的。

original: Azores Lease Over
translation: 亚速尔租借到期

original: With hostilities in Europe at an end, the [POR.GetAdjective] government has reminded us that the lease of the Azores was only made for the duration of the war. The time has come to return control over the islands back to them.
translation: 欧洲战事终于结束，[POR.GetAdjective]政府提醒我们对亚速尔的租借只在战争期间有效。  是时候把岛屿控制权归还他们了。

original: The British always pay their debts.
translation: 大不列颠有债必还。

original: Britain exits the Azores
translation: 不列颠离开亚速尔

original: With the war in Europe at an end, [From.GetNameDef] has honored our agreement and returned the Azores to us. We have already sent a group of administrators to take back control.
translation: 欧洲战事终于结束，[From.GetNameDef]遵守了承诺并把亚速尔还给了我们。我们已经派出一批官员接收控制权。

original: The best possible outcome.
translation: 最好的结果。

original: [state.GetName] Stands
translation: [state.GetName]坚立

original: Despite the enemy onslaught, the defenders of [state.GetName] have stood firm and held the enemy at bay. The invaders have bled themselves white on the defenses, paying a hefty price for every centimeter of ground taken. The tales of the Heroes of [state.GetName] will be remembered for generations to come!
translation: [state.GetName]的守军阻挡了敌人迅猛的进攻。 进攻方每一步每一寸的推进都付出了惨痛的代价，只能无奈退却。[state.GetName]的英雄们的是事迹将世代流传！

original: [state.GetName] shall remain ours!
translation: 我们坚守了[state.GetName]！

original: [state.GetName] Falls
translation: [state.GetName]沦陷

original: Mobilizing all available forces, the [controller.GetAdjective] invaders smashed our defenses outside [state.GetName]. [controller.GetAdjective] forces have entered the city. While our defenders are engaging the enemy in vicious street battles, the city is expected to fall within days.
translation: 在动用了所有部队和力量后，[controller.GetAdjective]进攻者突破了[state.GetName]的防御。 [controller.GetAdjective]部队潮水般涌入城市。 尽管城市的守军正在拼死抵抗，不过城市仍会在数日后沦陷。

original: Lower Army Command Loyalty
translation: 下层部队指挥忠诚度

original: Certain officers in the lower echelons of the military have expressed 'alternative' views on the country's leadership. To limit suspicion, we should limit our efforts to approaching only one potential supporter, and we should spare no resources in buying their loyalty.
translation: 一些下层军官对国家的领导层有些‘不同’想法。 为了缓解顾虑，我们应当把有限的精力和资源放到正确的地方。

original: Anyone will do, we just need someone to lead our armies.
translation: 任何人都行，是人都能带部队。

original: We need someone who at least knows what they're doing.
translation: 我们需要用一些有基本能力的人。

original: Quality is paramount, we should not compromise on cost.
translation: 质量第一，我们不应该考虑成本。

original: Only the very best will suffice.
translation: 我们只使用万中无一的绝世高手。

original: Upper Army Command Loyalty
translation: 高层部队指挥忠诚度

original: Certain officers in the upper echelons of the military have expressed 'alternative' views on the country's leadership. To limit suspicion, we should limit our efforts to approaching only one potential supporter, and we should spare no resources in buying their loyalty.
translation: 一些高层军官对国家的领导层有些‘不同’想法。 为了缓解顾虑，我们应当把有限的精力和资源放到正确的地方。

original: A minor setback.
translation: 有些小劣。

original: Suez Canal Blown
translation: 苏伊士运河受毁

original: In response to hostile forces closing in on the Suez Canal, and risking losing the vital commerce artery to the enemy, [From.GetNameDef] has instead chosen to blown the canal to ensure its use is denied to them. Through a combination of blockships, demolitions, and mining, the destruction is quite complete, and will likely take months of extensive industrial effort to repair.
translation: 为了运河不被敌方所使用，[From.GetNameDef]决定摧毁了运河。在一系列封船钻孔爆破后，运河被摧毁了，重新恢复需要数月以及大量的工程能力支持。

original: In what can only be described as a daring and brilliant military operation, [From.GetNameDef] has succeeded in severing the vital commerce artery that is the Suez Canal. Through a combination of blockships, demolitions, and mining, the destruction is quite complete, and will likely take months of extensive industrial effort to repair.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]靠着一系列大胆而完美的军事行动，成功破坏了苏伊士运河。 在一系列封船钻孔爆破后，运河被摧毁了，重新恢复需要数月以及大量的工程能力支持。

original: A calamity!
translation: 真是噩耗！

original: We could not let the enemy use it.
translation: 我们得不到，敌人也别想用。

original: We shall not underestimate their resolve again.
translation: 看来我们不能小看他们了。

original: We have cut the cord with their Empire!
translation: 我们割断了他们帝国的纤绳！

original: A magnificent blow against the British!
translation: 一个对不列颠的巨大打击！

original: They made the right call.
translation: 他们干的好。

original: A great blow against our ally...
translation: 对我们盟友的巨大打击

original: This will impact the entire world...
translation: 这将冲击整个世界

original: Panama Canal Blown
translation: 巴拿马运河受毁

original: In response to their inability to defend the Panama Canal, and risking losing the vital military communications artery to the enemy, [From.GetNameDef] has instead chosen to blown the canal to ensure its use is denied to them. Through a combination of blockships, demolitions, and mining, the destruction is quite complete, and will likely take months of extensive industrial effort to repair.
translation: 为了运河不被敌方所使用，[From.GetNameDef]决定摧毁了运河。在一系列封船钻孔爆破后，运河被摧毁了，重新恢复需要数月以及大量的工程能力支持。

original: In what can only be described as a daring and brilliant military operation, [From.GetNameDef] has succeeded in severing the vital military communications artery that is the Panama Canal. Through a combination of blockships, demolitions, and mining, the destruction is quite complete, and will likely take months of extensive industrial effort to repair.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]靠着一系列大胆而完美的军事行动，成功破坏了巴拿马运河。 在一系列封船钻孔爆破后，运河被摧毁了，重新恢复需要数月以及大量的工程能力支持

original: A calamity!
translation: 真是噩耗！

original: We could not let the enemy use it.
translation: 我们得不到，敌人也别想用。

original: We shall not underestimate their resolve again.
translation: 看来我们不能小看他们了。

original: Their navy is cut off on the far side!
translation: 他们海军现在被分割开了！

original: A magnificent blow against the Americans!
translation: 一个对美利坚的巨大打击！

original: They made the right call.
translation: 他们干的好。

original: A great blow against our ally...
translation: 对我们盟友的巨大打击

original: Pacific and Atlantic are divided once again.
translation: 现在太平洋和大西洋又被分割开了。

original: Suez Canal Repaired
translation: 苏伊士运河修好了

original: With a tremendous industrial effort [From.GetNameDef] has managed to repair the Suez Canal. This morning saw the re-opening of the vital commerce artery into the Mediterranean, after over half a year of intensive repair work.
translation: 在耗费了大量的工业投入后，[From.GetNameDef]修好了苏伊士运河。 在耗费了大半年的时间后，苏伊士运河今早通航，并使地中海的经济动脉重新连通。

original: We have restored the link to our Empire.
translation: 我们帝国的链接又恢复了。

original: A necessary investment for our nation.
translation: 一个必要的投入。

original: This will aid our efforts greatly.
translation: 帮了大忙。

original: They have undone the setback...
translation: 他们竟然修好了

original: The effects will be felt by all.
translation: 大家都会获益。

original: Panama Canal Repaired
translation: 巴拿马运河修好了

original: With a tremendous industrial effort [From.GetNameDef] has managed to repair the Panama Canal. This morning saw the re-opening of the vital military link between the Atlantic and the Pacific, after over a year of intensive repair work.
translation: 在耗费了大量的工业投入后，[From.GetNameDef]修好了巴拿马运河。 在耗费了一年的时间后，巴拿马运河今早通航，并使太平洋和大西洋的军事重新连接。

original: We have restored the vital link between our oceans.
translation: 我们重新恢复了大洋之间的连接。

original: We may once again move from Pacific to Atlantic.
translation: 我们太平洋与大西洋之间的航线再次畅通无阻了。

original: This will aid our efforts greatly.
translation: 帮了大忙。

original: They have undone the setback...
translation: 他们竟然修好了

original: The effects will be felt by all.
translation: 大家都会获益。

original: [MAN.GetLeader] claims the Mandate of Heaven
translation: [MAN.GetLeader]宣布获得天命

original: Wearing richly decorated robes befitting an Emperor of China, [MAN.GetLeader], Son of Heaven, Lord of Ten Thousand Years, Emperor of the Great Qing Dynasty, has taken the Dragon Throne in an unusual second Coronation ceremony and now resides inside the Forbidden City as his ancestors did. Referencing the old customs, [MAN.GetLeader] claims that the victory of his forces in the Chinese Civil War proves that he has a Manadate from heaven to lead China.\n\nWhether he intents to spread his rule until it encompasses 'All under Heaven', as previous Emperors claimed, remains to be seen.
translation: [MAN.GetLeader]，中国的皇帝，天子，万岁，大清的皇帝穿着华丽的龙袍，倚靠在龙椅上，像他的祖先一样在紫禁城按照传统礼制接受了不寻常的第二次帝位册封。依照传统的礼仪，[MAN.GetLeader]宣布自己取得了内战的胜利，而他则是天命所归的领导者。\n\n尽管如此，他能否像从前的皇帝那样做出一番“普天之下莫非王土”的事业依旧有待观察。

original: The Son of Heaven returns.
translation: 天子归来。

original: A wrong put right.
translation: 拨乱反正。

original: Who does he think he is?
translation: 他以为他算哪根葱？

original: Quite the comeback.
translation: 不错的反转。

original: Preposterous!
translation: 荒唐！

original: [new_leader.GetLeader] takes National Leadership in China
translation: [new_leader.GetLeader]统领了中国

original:
Following an extensive Power Struggle between [old_leader.GetLeader] and [new_leader.GetLeader], the former has finally conceeded defeat and met with [new_leader.GetLeader] in his residence. After a mere two hours of negotiations, [old_leader.GetLeader] has evidently accepted a proposal to transfer power to [new_leader.GetLeader] and step down as Premier of the Republic. 

Groups of supporters of the two leaders had previously gathered outside the house, prompting fears of violent clashes between the two sides depending on the outcome.

However, no violence has been reported and it appears that the transition of power has been fairly smooth.
translation:
[old_leader.GetLeader]和[new_leader.GetLeader]经过一系列政治交锋后，前者承认失败并与[new_leader.GetLeader]在其居住地会谈。仅用了两个小时的时间，[old_leader.GetLeader]接受了对[new_leader.GetLeader]权利转移并退居为总理。 

双方的支持者在屋外聚集，让人不由得忧虑在之后双方会发生冲突和骚乱。

但是最情况依然稳定，权利转移在一片祥和和安宁的环境下结束了。

original: Politics. Politics never change.
translation: 政治。政治从未改变。

original: A stunning success.
translation: 一个出色的胜利。

original: Preferable to violence.
translation: 反正比暴力好。

original: They may just have averted a Civil War.
translation: 他们避免了一场内战。

original: [From.GetLeader] proclaims One China Policy
translation: [From.GetLeader]宣布一个中国的政策

original: Speaking before a group of supporters, [From.GetLeader] today announced a major shift in his government. Previously, [From.GetLeader] was willing to tolerate that some parts of China were largly independent. This is now over. From today forward, [From.GetNameDef] will consider all of China to be their responsibility as the sole government of China. Anyone found refusing orders from the only legitimate Chinese government is to be considered a rebel or a traitor, and will be dealt with accordingly. \n\nIt remains to be seen, however, if the [From.GetLeader] Government can make good on the threat or if it will remain a mere propaganda move designed to shore up support in the population.
translation: [From.GetLeader]被他的支持者簇拥着宣布一个政府政策改动。尽管先前，[From.GetLeader]愿意容忍相当大部分的中国区域自治独立，但是到现在都结束了。 从今往后，[From.GetNameDef]会单独掌管所有中国区域，任何人拒绝接受这个唯一的合法政府将会被视为叛国或是拨乱，然后依据国法予以处理。 \n\n就目前局势，[From.GetLeader]的政府将这个声明作为一个威慑，也可能只是拉拢民众支持度的一个工具。

original: A direct threat.
translation: 一个直接威胁。

original: We will unite all of China!
translation: 我们将会统一中国！

original: Better men have failed.
translation: 更好的人失败了。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Claims Indochina
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]宣称印度支那

original: The government of [From.GetLeader] has declared that the current situation in Indochina presents a clear and present danger to [From.GetAdjective] security. No government in the world, the official statement read, would accept a dagger aimed squarely at its soft underbelly in this manner. Unless the region is pacified or [671.Controller.GetAdjective] authorities replaced with governors more willing to work with [From.GetNameDef], the threat to [From.GetAdjective] interests would continue.\n\nWhile a spokesman for [From.GetLeader] stressed that the [From.GetAdjective] Government would try to seek a peaceful solution, the military option was not ruled out.
translation: T[From.GetLeader]的政府宣布现印度支那的局势很危险并直接威胁[From.GetAdjective]的安全。官方宣称表示：世界上没有政府会官方准许一把刀选在自己的头上。除非地区被和平化或[671.Controller.GetAdjective]政权被替换成愿意和[From.GetNameDef]合作的，[From.GetAdjective]的利益会一直受到威胁。\n\n虽然[From.GetLeader]的发言人声明[From.GetAdjective]政府会尝试使用和平手段，但是军事方案也会作为备选。

original: Someone had to.
translation: 总有人要做。

original: Come and take them!
translation: 来干死他们！

original: Surely nothing bad will come of this.
translation: 这样应该没有什么糟糕的地方。

original: Don't make us come over there!
translation: 我可不想去那里!

original: The Manchurian War of Independence
translation: 满洲国独立战争

original:
Following a period of internal power struggles between the Japanese administrators and the government of [MAN.GetLeader], the fight for supremacy in Manchuria has finally reached a boiling point. 

Reportedly, the confrontation was set off by an incident in the Imperial Household, in which a Japanese General supposedly insulted the Emperor of Manchukuo by demanding that he bow.

Outraged, [MAN.GetLeader] replied that "The Son of Heaven does not bow" and struck the General with his cane, before ordering his military to remove all Japanese soldiers from Chinese soil immediately.
translation:
在日本官僚和[MAN.GetLeader]政府之间发生一系列内部权力斗争后，满洲国的领导权之争终于进入了白热化阶段。 

据报道，冲突的导火索来自于宫内府，恐怕是因为一位日本将军要求满洲国皇帝向他鞠躬而引发了对峙。

[MAN.GetLeader]怒斥对方"天子不会下跪"，并用手杖击倒了他，随后下令要求其所属部队将所有日本部队从中国国土驱逐。

original: The puppy roars?
translation: 走狗的咆哮？

original: We will claim our destiny!
translation: 我的命运我做主!

original: That little traitor!
translation: 那个小叛徒!

original: The Dragon strikes the...Sun?
translation: 腾龙击……日？

original: Hitler Assassinated
translation: 希特勒遭暗杀

original:
German radio announced today that traitorous elements of the military have attempted a coup. Following an explosion at the Führer Headquarters which killed Hitler and injured several others, army units attacked a number of SS offices and units. 

While [GER.GetLeader] claims he has full control of the country and its military, reports are still coming in of firefights between loyalists and rebel forces all over the country.
