Rumor has it that other leading members of the Nazi party are planning their own grab for power in the chaos.
translation:
今天德国无线电台播报一个大逆军事组织尝试政变。随着一个在元首指挥所的爆炸，希特勒被杀多人受重伤，一些军事部队攻击了数个党卫军长官及其部队。

尽管[GER.GetLeader]宣布对国家及军队的全面掌控，但是仍有大量的全国范围的忠诚派与叛乱军的交火。

小道消息称有部分纳粹党计划在混乱中夺权。

original: Vile treachery!
translation: 可恶的叛徒！

original: The situation has not improved.
translation: 情况不乐观。

original: Good riddance!
translation: 我的天！

original: He pushed them too far.
translation: 他压迫他们太久了。

original: Assassination attempt on [GER.GetLeader]
translation: [GER.GetLeader]遭暗杀

original:
German radio announced today that traitorous elements of the military have attempted a coup. Following an explosion at the Führer Headquarters which miraculously only slightly injured Hitler and wounded several others, army units attempted to seize control of several government offices in Berlin. 

News of [GER.GetLeader]'s survival spread quickly, and most units under control of the putschists have since returned to their barracks.

A number of high-ranking German officers commited suicide in the wake of the failed attempt rather than face the indignity of a trial in front of the infamous "People's Court".
translation:
今天德国无线电台播报一个大逆军事组织尝试政变。随着一个在元首指挥所的爆炸，奇迹的是希特勒仅受轻伤另外有其他多名重伤，同时一些军事单位尝试控制柏林的政府办公室。 

[GER.GetLeader]生还的消息迅速扩，绝大部分叛乱士兵放弃并回到他们的军营。

一部分高层军官选项自杀来逃避将要到来的丑名昭著的"人民法庭"的审判。

original: The beginning of the end?
translation: 还没开始就结束了？

original: German radio announced today that [GER.GetLeader] has taken over the government. Following an exchange of gunfire in the Führerbunker, during which the Führer was mortally wounded, SS units moved quickly to seize all major roads and railway junctions leading out of Berlin. Meanwhile, Luftwaffe and Heer units have reportedly been ordered to converge on Berlin to restore order.
translation: 今天德国无线电台播报[GER.GetLeader]掌控了政府。元首在元首的地堡的交火中受致命伤，党卫军迅速控制通往柏林的所有主要道路，铁路枢纽。同时海空军收到命令赶往柏林从而恢复其秩序。

original: Unification of Scandinavia
translation: 统一斯堪的纳维亚

original: Through force of arms, [From.GetOldName] has united the Scandinavian peoples under its rule, and its government is now integrating the newly-conquered territories. In an attempt to rally the people behind the state, there has been an increase in pan-nationalist propaganda with clear support from the government.\n\nAs a side-effect, proponents of Scandinavian unification have already begun citing historical parallels, and point out how the current state of affairs can be seen as simply a natural continuation of earlier attempts at unifying the region. The [From.GetOldAdjective] government has eagerly jumped on the bandwagon of this line of thinking, and has now officially proclaimed a 'restoration of the Kalmar Union', renaming the country to '[From.GetNameDef]'.
translation: 通过军事力量，[From.GetOldName]统合了整个斯堪的纳维亚。为了集结民众，政府进行了一系列泛民族主义宣传。\n\n有副作用的是，斯堪的纳维亚统一在历史上多次发生，而如今行为只是像是历史的复演。[From.GetOldAdjective]政府迫切的希望跳出这个思维定式，并官方声称'重建卡尔玛联盟'，而国家则更名为'[From.GetNameDef]'。

original: A glorious day for all Scandinavians!
translation: 斯堪的纳维亚人辉煌的一天！

original: Scandinavia is stronger together.
translation: 斯堪的纳维亚团结在一起。

original: It will not last long!
translation: 这不会长久!

original: Unification of the Nordics
translation: 统一北欧

original: With the conquest of all of the nations belonging to the Nordic region, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has now begun increasing moves towards integration of the newly-conquered territories. As a result, in an attempt to rally the people behind the state, there has been an increase in pan-nationalist propaganda with clear support from the government.\n\nA [From.GetOldAdjective] official was quoted as saying "The Nordic countries have always felt a strong kinship to each other. It is only natural that they should be unified, and that our peoples should coexist side by side, as one." It would appear the government has resolved to use this kinship as a way of unifying the people, and have now proclaimed "true Nordic unity", renaming the country to '[From.GetNameDef]'.
translation: 在征服了所有北欧国家后，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府加强了新征服领土的整合速度。因此，需要用一系列泛民族宣传来集结民众。\n\n[From.GetOldAdjective]正式声称"北欧国家相互如姊妹。没有比他们统一更自然了，而他们的民众将彼此如一的共存。" 而统一民众的方式就是宣称"真北欧体"，将国家重命名为'[From.GetNameDef]'。

original: The unified North will stand strong!
translation: 统一的北方人将更强大!

original: The North may well prove problematic to their neighbours...
translation: 北方的强大将会使他们邻居的担忧。

original: Rebirth of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]重生

original: Having retaken all of the lands belonging to the old Gran Colombia, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has now begun increasing moves towards integration of the newly-conquered territories. As a result, in an attempt to rally the people behind the state, there has been an increase in pan-nationalist propaganda with clear support from the government.\n\n[From.GetOldAdjective] officials have repeatedly stated their belief that all of northern South America should look at their shared history and use that kinship as a foundation for a unified state. Now, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has taken one step further and proclaimed the "revival of Bolívar's legacy", renaming the country to '[From.GetNameDef]'.
translation: 在夺回原属大哥伦比亚的土地后，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府加强了新征服领土的整合速度。因此，需要用一系列泛民族宣传来集结民众。\n\n[From.GetOldAdjective]官员一再表示他们相信所有的北南美洲应该看到他们共同的历史并将这种亲缘关系作为统一国家的基础。现在，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府进一步推进了“玻利瓦尔的遗产复兴”，将该国重新命名为'[From.GetNameDef]'。

original: The dream of a unified Latin America awaits!
translation: 统一拉美的愿望要实现!

original: The birth of a new American superpower?
translation: 新的美洲霸权诞生？

original: Rebirth of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]重生

original: Having secured all of the Austro-Hungarian Imperial lands, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government, as representatives of the last remaining successor state, has now begun with re-integrating these territories. Government-directed propaganda has flared up, extolling the "glorydays of the Empire" in a clear effort to rally the population behind the wide-spread national reforms and a return to imperial norms.\n\nAs a part of these, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has announced the restoration of [From.GetNameDef], and has changed the nation's official name to reflect this.
translation: 在获得了所有奥匈帝国的土地之后，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府作为最后的继承代表，开始重新整合这些领土。政府大肆宣传，颂扬"帝国的光荣岁月"来拉拢民众为国家区域改革，并重返帝国规范。\n\n作为其中的一部分，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府宣布重新恢复[From.GetNameDef]，并将国家正式更名。

original: Indivisibiliter ac inseparabiliter!
translation: 不离不弃!

original: The Dual Monarchy rises again.
translation: 双元帝国重新崛起。

original: Rebirth of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]重生

original: As Poland and Lithuania are once more governed by a single state, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has begun drawing on history for its propaganda in an effort to unite the people behind its policies. 'Historical experts' bombard the population with the various ways in which a united Poland and Lithuania could stand against the threats on their borders, recounting tales from the height of power of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. The approach seems to be having some effect on redirecting the people's outrage, and on focusing their thoughts on the glorydays of old.\n\nToday, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has taken this one step further and proclaimed the restoration of the Commonwealth, re-naming the country to '[From.GetNameDef]'.
translation: [From.GetOldAdjective]政府依靠历史来宣传民众，波兰和立陶宛原来为一个国家。 '历史专家' 反复向民众灌输玻璃邦联联合抵抗外敌。这种尝试似乎转移了民众的愤怒，并让他们开始向往旧的光辉岁月。\n\n今天，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府进一步宣传恢复联邦，并将国家重命名为'[From.GetNameDef]'。

original: If God is with us, then who is against us?
translation: 神与我们同在，我们所向无敌

original: Will it survive partition this time?
translation: 这次他们能活过瓜分了吗？

original: Reunification of the Low Countries
translation: 低地重新统一

original: With the [From.GetOldAdjective] conquest of the other Low Countries, their government has quite vocally defended its actions. They now claim to be the immediate and lawful successors to the United Kingdom of the Netherlands, and have repudiated the Treaty of London of 1839 with the claim that it was, at the time, criminally forced upon their government by outside forces. Thus, as the nation never ceased to be, [From.GetOldNameDef] has merely reasserted control over land that already belonged to them.\n\nFollowing through on their words, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has renamed the country to '[From.GetNameDef]', and large propaganda efforts are already under way in an attempt at unifying the people, using current global crises as an external threat to rally against.
translation: 随着[From.GetOldAdjective]征服其他的低地国家，他们政府也在对自己的行为进行辩护。 他们现在声称是荷兰联合王国的合法接班人，并且否认1839年的“伦敦条约”，声称当时它被外部势力强加给他们的政府。所以，[From.GetOldNameDef]只是重新取回他们原本的合法领土。\n\n经过他们的辩护，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府将国家重命名为'[From.GetNameDef]'，并进行大规模的宣传，利用当前的全球危机作为外部威胁来统一民众。

original: United again, as intended in 1815...
translation: 就像1815年计划的那样，重新统一

original: Yes... This does all seems to be an internal affair...
translation: 是…… 不过就像是内部事务一样……

original: Rebirth of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]重生

original: With the [From.GetOldAdjective] conquest of the other Central American states, their government has quite vocally defended its actions internationally. Considering itself the lawful successor to the Federal Republic of Central America, it has branded the nations that seceded in the late 1830s as illegal separatist governments, and consistently refers to the recent fighting as their rightful attempts at 'reasserting control' over these territories.\n\nFollowing through on their words, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has renamed the country to '[From.GetNameDef]', and large propaganda efforts are already under way in an attempt at unifying the people, using current global crises as an external threat to rally against.
translation: 随着[From.GetOldAdjective]征服其他中美洲国家，他们政府也在对自己的行为在国际上进行辩护。考虑到自己是中美洲联邦共和国的合法继承者，它已经将那些在1830年代末脱离为非法分裂主义政府的国家纳入旗下，并一直将最近的征服称为他们对这些领土“重申控制”的合理尝试。\n\n经过他们的辩护，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府将国家重命名为'[From.GetNameDef]'，并且以此进行一大波宣传，并利用当前的全球危机作为外部威胁拉拢统一民众。

original: A necessary first step to ascending the world stage.
translation: 一个迈入世界舞台的必要一步。

original: Another United States of the Americas arises.
translation: 另一个美利坚合众国崛起。

original: Unification of the Baltics
translation: 统一波罗的海

original: With the conquest of all of lands belonging to the Baltic states, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has now begun increasing moves towards integration of the newly-conquered territories. As a result, in an attempt to rally the people behind the state, there has been an increase in pan-nationalist propaganda with clear support from the government.\n\nA [From.GetOldAdjective] official was quoted as saying "The Baltic countries have always felt a strong kinship to each other. It is only natural that they should be unified, especially in light of the threats on our borders. Only by standing together can our peoples remain independent and free." They have therefore now proclaimed "true Baltic unity", renaming the country to '[From.GetNameDef]'.
translation: 随着所有属于波罗的海国家的土地的征服，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府政府现在开始加大对新征服地区的整合力度。因此，为团结国家的民众，政府开始大规模提高泛民族主义宣传。\n\nA [From.GetOldAdjective]官方宣称"波罗的海国家一直血浓于水，而他们彼此应当在有外部危难时统一在一起。只有这样，我们人民才能独立和自由。" 他们因此宣称"真波罗的海体"，并将国家重命名为'[From.GetNameDef]'。

original: It is necessary for our survival.
translation: 这我们生存很必要。

original: But will the new state be strong enough?
translation: 但是新的国家足够强吗？

original: Rebirth of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]重生

original: Having secured all of the pre-war Ottoman lands, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government, as representatives of the Ottoman successor state, has now begun with re-integrating these territories. Government-directed propaganda has flared up, denouncing the partitions of the Allies in the Great War, and extolling the "glorydays of the Empire" in a clear effort to rally the population of newly-conquered lands behind the wide-spread national reforms and a return to imperial norms.\n\nAs a part of these, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has announced the restoration of [From.GetNameDef], and has changed the nation's official name to reflect this.
translation: 在拿回所有奥斯曼丢掉的领土后，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府，奥斯曼帝国的继任者开始整合这些领土。政府开始宣传同盟国在大战中肢解自己，并以"帝国的光荣岁月"拉拢民众进行全国改革并重返帝国规范。\n\n而其中的一部分就是，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府宣布恢复[From.GetNameDef]，并将国家正式更名。

original: We have undone the partitions at last!
translation: 我们最终打回到肢解前的形态了!

original: The Eternal State has risen again...
translation: 永恒帝国又崛起了

original: Unification of Europe
translation: 欧洲统一

original: The main powers of continental Europe lay conquered before [From.GetOldNameDef], and for the first time the recent dreams of a united Europe seem attainable. A variety of 'experts', presumably on the government payroll, have already begun repeatedly citing the current political situation as the only way to "prevent future European conflict".\n\nIn further efforts to give the outward appearance of a "nation for all Europeans", government reforms on the national and the local level are being pushed through at an impressive rate, and as a part of those it was announced today that the country shall henceforth be known as '[From.GetNameDef]', so that "all Europeans may feel welcome in it".
translation: 欧洲大陆的主要势力已经拜倒在[From.GetOldNameDef]之下，而统一欧洲变得第一次可行。被政府雇佣的一票'专家'，在各种鼓吹现在的形势是唯一能"避免欧洲今后冲突"。\n\n为了进一步体现"一个有欧洲所有国家的集合"，政府对于国家进行相当大的改革，其中之一便是更名为'[From.GetNameDef]'，这样"所有欧洲人都会接受"。

original: Is this an end to all European war?
translation: 这将会是欧洲战争的终结吗？

original: Let us see if they can pull it off.
translation: 让我们看看他们能否成功。

original: Rise of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]崛起

original: As the [From.GetOldAdjective] nation grows into its neighbours, government attempts at creating historical continuity have become more and more apparent, evidently in an attempt to unify the people. The achievements of the Great Zimbabwean Empire have been strongly romanticized, but incessant propaganda seems to be having an effect on public opinion.\n\nToday, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has taken this one step further and re-named the country to '[From.GetNameDef]', an announcement that was greeted by exuberant crowds in the streets of the major cities.
translation: 随着[From.GetOldAdjective]国家成长，政府努力试图创造历史连续性，团结民众。大津巴布韦帝国的成就被强烈的浪漫化，并影响了公众舆论。\n\n今天，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府更进一步将国家命名为'[From.GetNameDef]'，主要城市的群众欢欣鼓舞。

original: An Africa for Africans!
translation: 一个非洲人的非洲!

original: Is this the end of colonial Africa?
translation: 这将会是非洲殖民的终结吗？

original: Rise of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]崛起

original: The [From.GetOldAdjective] military advance seems utterly unstoppable, and the idea that many sneered at in recent years - the creation of a new Roman Empire - now seems entirely within the Italians' grasp. Most continental European powers that could oppose them have been virtually eliminated, leaving the Italians free to enforce their will upon the conquered peoples.\n\nIn addition to beginning integration of what they have already begun referring to as "reconquered Roman Territories", the Italian government has now announced the rebirth of the Roman Empire, renaming the nation to '[From.GetNameDef]'.
translation: [From.GetOldAdjective]部队无法被阻挡，而一个想法一出现多年 - 建立新的罗马帝国 - 现已近在咫尺。 能够反抗的欧洲国家已被消灭，让意大利人可以为所欲为。\n\n而现在所有征服的土地已被说成"恢复罗马领土"，意大利政府现在罗马帝国重生，并将国家更名为'[From.GetNameDef]'。

original: Roma Invicta!
translation: 罗马无敌!

original: They cannot be serious!
translation: 他们不会当真吧!

original: Rise of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]崛起

original: As the [From.GetOldAdjective] advance continues, the historical parallels have not gone unnoticed by those versed in Persian history. Notable public figures have already begun comparing this expansion to the times of Cyrus the Great, and nationalist pride is rising throughout [From.GetOldAdjective] society.\n\nAs government control is expanded over the new territorial acquisitions, and as the government rides this wave of high public approval, it has now been confirmed by officials that the nation will be officially renamed to '[From.GetNameDef]'.
translation: 随着[From.GetOldAdjective]步伐，现在的成就足以写进波斯史。著名公众人物已经可以和赛勒斯大帝比较，民族主义骄傲已经[From.GetOldAdjective]社会里膨胀。\n\n就在国家获得新的土地时，荣耀也跟随到新的土地，而现在官方已经将国家更名为'[From.GetNameDef]'。

original: Our strength continues to grow!
translation: 我们的实力将继续增强!

original: Will it bring peace and stability to the region?
translation: 他能给地区带来和平与稳定吗？

original: Rise of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]崛起

original: [From.GetOldAdjectiveCap] ascendancy has perplexed many military experts across the globe, but the results speak for themselves. In but a few years, the Greeks have utterly dominated the Balkans, reconquered Istanbul, and crushed any organized Turkish resistance in Anatolia. It seems that the ultimate conclusion of over five centuries of Greco-Turkish conflict has now been reached.\n\nTo further bolster national pride, the [From.GetOldAdjectiveCap] government has utilized historical continuity, and styled their military achievements as a 'Byzantine reconquest against the Turkic invader'. As part of this propaganda, and in the midst of an extravagant ceremonial parade in newly-renamed Constantinople, it was announced that [From.GetOldNameDef] has changed its official name to '[From.GetNameDef]'.
translation: [From.GetOldAdjectiveCap]的军事成功困扰着全球学者，但事实不会说谎。在短短几年内，希腊人完全控制了巴尔干半岛，重新征服了伊斯坦布尔，并击碎了安纳托利亚土耳其有组织的抵抗。看来，五个多世纪的希腊土耳其冲突已经结束。\n\n为了进一步增强民族自豪感，[From.GetOldAdjectiveCap]政府将军事胜利渲染为'拜占庭驱逐土耳其入侵者' 在这个宣传下，新更名的君士坦丁堡举行了华丽仪式的游行，并宣布[From.GetOldNameDef]将正式更名为'[From.GetNameDef]'。

original: Let the reconquest begin.
translation: 开始再征服。

original: A miraculous reversal of fortune...
translation: 一个命运的再次神奇的反转

original: Unification of Arabia
translation: 统一阿拉伯

original: With the [From.GetOldAdjective] conquest of most of what constitutes the Arab world, the government has seized upon a renewed wave of Pan-Arabism spreading through the region. As international disagreements have been 'solved' through the outright removal of obstinate foreign governments through military means, Arab unification has seemed within easy reach, and the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has already shown its willingness to pursue this goal.\n\nWhether merely to 'ride the wave' of this public goodwill, to appeal as a home to all Arabs, or simply to facilitate regional integration, [From.GetOldAdjective] officials have now confirmed that the nation's official name shall be changed to '[From.GetNameDef]'.
translation: 随着[From.GetOldAdjective]铁蹄踏遍阿拉伯世界，政府在区域里进行一系列泛阿拉伯民族主义运动。由于通过军事手段彻底清除顽固的外国政府已经“解决”了国际分歧，阿拉伯统一似乎已经很容易达到，而[From.GetOldAdjective]政府已经表明它愿意追求这一目标。\n\n不管是'随波逐流'被民众怂恿，或只是想整合地区，[From.GetOldAdjective]正式宣布将国家重命名为'[From.GetNameDef]'。

original: Zaydan's dream has been achieved.
translation: 萨迪的梦想实现了。

original: Will this lead to a lasting peace in the region?
translation: 这会给地区带来和平吗？

original: Rise of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]崛起

original: As the [From.GetOldAdjective] nation grows into its neighbours, government attempts at creating historical continuity have become more and more apparent, evidently in an attempt to unify the people. The achievements of the Majapahit Empire have been strongly romanticized, but incessant propaganda seems to be having an effect on public opinion.\n\nToday, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has taken this one step further and re-named the country to '[From.GetNameDef]' in homage to the region's history, hoping that it is something everyone in the region can relate to.
translation: 随着[From.GetOldAdjective]国家持续增长，政府尝试建立一个历史纽带来团结民众。将满者伯夷帝国被强烈的史诗化来影响民众观念。\n\n今天[From.GetOldAdjective]将国家更名为'[From.GetNameDef]'已致敬原来历史上的帝国，希望区域的民众对此接受。

original: This is the end of Asian colonialism!
translation: 这将是亚洲殖民的终结!

original: They have seized their own destiny.
translation: 他们抓住了自己的命运。

original: Rebirth of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]重生

original: As the [From.GetOldAdjective] nation grows into its neighbours, the government has re-evaluated their departure from the Rattanakosin name. As their present borders more and more resemble those from the kingdom's historical high-point, the achievements of the Rattanakosin Kingdom have been increasingly used to influence public opinion.\n\nToday, the [From.GetOldAdjective] government has taken this one step further and officially re-named the country to '[From.GetNameDef]' in an attempt to draw legitimacy from history.
translation: [From.GetOldAdjective]国家在增长，并打算重拾拉达那哥欣这个名字。 因为他们的边界已经超出历史上那个王国的最鼎盛时期，而拉达那哥欣王国依旧在留有相当影响力。\n\n今天，[From.GetOldAdjective]政府更近一步正式宣布将国家重命名为'[From.GetNameDef]'并集成其历史的合法性。

original: We have reasserted our hegemony.
translation: 我们重拾我们的霸权。

original: Are the colonial Empires crumbling?
translation: 那些殖民国家要完？

original: Rebirth of [From.GetNameDef]
translation: [From.GetNameDef]重生

original: Under the rulership of Kaiserin Victoria, [From.GetOldNameDef] has greatly expanded their borders, surpassing even those of the old Holy Roman Empire. All continental foes that would challenge her rule have been brought to their knees by the [From.GetOldAdjective] military machine, leaving her unopposed to pursue her policies further.\n\nNow, the Kaiserin has decreed that the current opportunity shall be seized, and that the nation shall become the spiritual successor of the Holy Roman Empire. To represent this, the nation has now been officially renamed, and with it she has at last achieved the political unification of the region that has eluded the Emperors for centuries.
translation: 在维多利亚女皇的领导下，[From.GetOldNameDef]极大地扩张了自己的领土，甚至超过了原先的神圣罗马帝国。大陆上的所有敌人被[From.GetOldAdjective]战争机器打倒在地，让她的政治路上没有阻拦。\n\n现在，女皇下旨就现在局势，国家将是神圣罗马帝国的精神继承，而国家将正式重命名，也使她达成了几个世纪里历代皇帝希望达到的地区政治重新统一。

original: Aquila Elegit Iovis Omnia Vincit!
translation: 朱庇特选中的雄鹰征服一切!

original: Her splendor and glory cannot be denied!
translation: 她的荣耀和光辉令人瞩目!

original: [warlord.GetLeader] pleads for support
translation: [warlord.GetLeader]寻求支持

original: A delegation from [warlord.GetLeader] has arrived in Moscow to sound us out about possible support in an internal party power struggle. They claim that [communist_china.GetLeader] is not sufficiently commited to the cause of communism and may, in fact, harbor reactionary thoughts and betray the revolution in its most critical phase.\n\n[warlord.GetLeader] instead proposes that we back him, promising eternal and undying loyalty to the communist cause in general and [SOV.GetLeader] in particular.
translation: 一个[warlord.GetLeader]的特使到莫斯科来对党内部的权利争夺发声。他们指出[communist_china.GetLeader]没有共产主义的远大志向，并且他其实有严重的落后思想，很有可能在这个关键时间背叛革命。\n\n[warlord.GetLeader]要求让我们支持他，并承诺宣布永远忠诚于共产理想和[SOV.GetLeader]。

original: A loyal puppet may prove useful.
translation: 一个忠诚的附庸很有用。

original: This will lead to a war with §H[communist_china.GetNameDef]§! if they refuse.\n
translation: 这会导致与§H[communist_china.GetNameDef]§!开战，如果被其拒绝。\n

original: We have no use for such blatant opportunism.
translation: 我们不需要这些机会主义者。

original: A message from [soviet.GetLeader]
translation: 来自[soviet.GetLeader]的消息

original: The representative of the [SOV.GetAdjective] government has informed us that [SOV.GetLeader] harbours grave doubts about the accuracy of [communist_china.GetLeader]'s interpretation of Marxist theory. In this critical phase of the class struggle in China, we must not deviate from the correct application of Marxist-Leninist teachings. It appears that Moscow believes that [warlord.GetLeader] has a better understanding of what is needed to advance the Communist cause in China. As far as Moscow is concerned, the party would do well to accept [warlord.GetLeader] as the new chairman, or suffer the displeasure of [SOV.GetLeader].
translation: [SOV.GetAdjective]政府代表来通知我们，[SOV.GetLeader]怀疑[communist_china.GetLeader]对马克思主义理论的理解。在这个中国的阶级斗争最激烈的阶段，我们对马克思列宁主义的理解不能和苏联有分歧。显然莫斯科方面认为[warlord.GetLeader]对在中国建设共产主义的理解更深刻。就莫斯科方面而言，接受[warlord.GetLeader]作为党是的新主席能引导党走上正确的道路，否则将招致[SOV.GetLeader]的不悦。

original: Send [communist_china.GetLeader] to Moscow to straighten this out.
translation: 派[communist_china.GetLeader]去莫斯科谈判。

original: We will never bow to traitors!
translation: 我们绝不屈服于叛徒!

original: [SOV.GetLeader] Refuses
translation: [SOV.GetLeader]拒绝

original: [SOV.GetLeader] reportedly remains unconvinced of our loyalty or ability to lead. The [SOV.GetAdjective] government continues to support [communist_china.GetLeader] as chairman of the Communist Party of China.
translation: [SOV.GetLeader]不接受我们的效忠。[SOV.GetAdjective]政府仍然支持[communist_china.GetLeader]作为中国共产党的主席。

original: Let's keep this between us.
translation: 那就这样吧。

original: [communist_china.GetNameDefCap] Submits
translation: [communist_china.GetNameDefCap]服从

original: Desperate appeals by [communist_china.GetLeader] to [SOV.GetLeader] did little to sway the Soviets to his side. Recognizing a lost fight, [communist_china.GetLeader] has publically acknowledged his mistakes and promised to work with us to ensure the victory of the revolution.
translation: 显然[communist_china.GetLeader]无法说服[SOV.GetLeader]改变决议。对于争斗的失利，[communist_china.GetLeader]公开的表示自己的理论错误并表示和我们一起工作直至革命胜利。

original: Good.
translation: 好。

original: Join or Die
translation: 加入或者死

original: Faced with the choice between giving up power or calling the Soviet bluff, [communist_china.GetLeader] choose the latter. Unfortunately, it seems that [SOV.GetLeader] was not bluffing and hostilities have commenced. Given our precarious position, we have been subjected to intense pressure by both sides, with the Soviets demanding we help them in ousting the traitor.\n\nRefusal, they say, would be the same as chosing to side with [communist_china.GetLeader].
translation: 在放弃权利和苏联威吓下，[communist_china.GetLeader]选择了后者。不幸的是[SOV.GetLeader]不是在威吓而是实际作出敌对行动。鉴于我们的危险处境，和持续受到双方的压力，苏联提议我们驱逐这个叛徒。\n\n如果拒绝将会视为和[communist_china.GetLeader]一伙。

original: It's not worth dying for [communist_china.GetLeader]
translation: 不值得为[communist_china.GetLeader]死

original: We will not be party to this.
translation: 党将不党。

original: [From.GetLeader] Demands our Support
translation: [From.GetLeader]寻求我们的支持

original: A message from [From.GetLeader] has arrived, demanding that we step up deliveries of the previously agreed on economic aid.
translation: [From.GetLeader]发送了一条消息，要我们提交之前协议的经济支援。

original: This is the price we pay.
translation: 这就是代价。

original: This is robbery!
translation: 这是抢劫!

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Accepts
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]接受

original: Despite the usual protests from [From.GetLeader], he has agreed to increase the pace of the payments as we requested.
translation: 尽管[From.GetLeader]一如既往提出了抗议，他仍按协议的给出我们提出的款项。

original: He should pray we don't alter the deal any further.
translation: 他们应当期待我们不继续抬高要求。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Refuses
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝

original: [From.GetLeader] has answered our request for additional support with a flat refusal, claiming that his nation is utterly unable to make the "absurd" payments we demand.
translation: [From.GetLeader]对于我们的额外要求拒绝，声称他的国家不会支付这种荒谬的款项。

original: He promised, and we will get what is ours!
translation: 他做过许诺，那我们就会拿到所承诺给我们的部分!

original: Let it slide just this once.
translation: 这次就算了。

original: [From.GetLeader] demands closer cooperation
translation: [From.GetLeader]要求进一步合作

original: A message from [From.GetLeader] has arrived, saying that our stage of the revolutionary struggle is a particularly vulnerable one that could easily fall victim to the counter-revolution. His special representative has been instructed to keep a close watch on proceedings in our nation and advise us on how to achieve victory in the class struggle.\n\nThe note goes further to say that any deviation from his 'suggestions' will be considered a sign that reactionary elements have taken hold of our government, and that the necessary steps would then be taken.
translation: [From.GetLeader]发送一条消息称，革命很容易被反革命颠覆。他的代表将继续观察我们国家指导我们获得阶级斗争的胜利。\n\n任何偏离他的建议将会被视为反动主义掌权，而他则会作出必要的行动。

original: We welcome the opportunity to learn.
translation: 这将会是我们一个不错的学习机会。

original: We don't need anyone to tell us what to do.
translation: 我们不需要别人指点我们怎么做。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Accepts
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]接受

original: [From.GetLeader] has welcomed our special representative and appointed him his personal adviser. We now have very good control about their internal and external policies.
translation: [From.GetLeader]欢迎我们的特别代表并让其担当他个人的顾问。现在我们很好的掌握他们内部及外部的政治事务了。

original: He saw reason.
translation: 他看出了原因。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Refuses
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝

original: Although receptive of the idea, [From.GetLeader] has politely but firmely declined our demand of being allowed to influence their policies more directly. It would seem that we are 'unfamiliar' with the conditions on the ground and should leave implementation of Marxist teachings to the local experts.
translation: 虽然接受了这项建议，但是[From.GetLeader]很有礼貌却坚决地拒绝了我们被允许更直接地影响他们的政策的要求。似乎我们对实际情况是“不熟悉”的，应该把马克思主义学说的实践交给当地专家。

original: Maybe we need to repeat ourselves more forcefully.
translation: 或许我们需要更强有力地一再重复我们的话。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Refuses to Pay
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝对此负责

original: [From.GetLeader] has ignored increasingly more forceful demands that he transfer the payments we agreed on previously. Even requesting that he come to Moscow to explain himself are left unanswered.
translation: [From.GetLeader]忽视了越来越强烈的要求以至于转移了我们之前预先约定的款项。即使要求他到莫斯科来解释一下也没有得到答复。

original: So he wants to test us?
translation: 所以他想测试我们？

original: [From.GetAdjective] Alliance
translation: [From.GetAdjective]的联盟

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has requested that the Chinese communists join into a single faction, a People's Front, to defeat the nationalists, reactionaries and foreign invaders under one banner.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]要求中国共产党人加入阵营人民阵线，以在同一旗帜下对抗国民党人，反动派和外国侵略者。

original: The People are the heroes now!
translation: 现在人民就是英雄了！

original: This is against [Root.GetAdjective] interests.
translation: 这违背了[Root.GetAdjective]的利益。

original: [From.GetLeader] Rejects Alliance
translation: [From.GetLeader]拒绝联盟

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has refused the obviously advantageous path of a People's Front united against the nationalists, reactionaries and foreign invaders, stating instead that our alliance would be 'against [From.GetAdjective] interests.'
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝了明显有利的与人民阵线联合起来以对抗国民党人，反动派和外国侵略者的道路，反而声明与我们的联盟将会'违背[From.GetAdjective]的利益。'

original: We will just have to go it alone.
translation: 我们将不得不孤军奋战。

original: We may as well disband the United Front altogether.
translation: 我们完全可以解散统一战线。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] Demands Subjugation
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]要求臣服

original: It appears that [From.GetLeader] has made the decision to finally spread his authority to the far areas of China. A representative from the [From.GetAdjective] Government has arrived, demanding that we bow to the one true Emperor of China, the Son of Heaven, [From.GetLeader]. Refusing to do so, he continued, would be punished as treason of the higest order.
translation: 看起来[From.GetLeader]最终已经决定将他的权威传播到中国的广大地区。来自[From.GetAdjective]政府的代表已经抵达，要求我们向中国的真命天子，皇帝[From.GetLeader]俯首称臣。他补充到，拒绝这么做的话将被视为犯下最高级别的叛国罪。

original: This whole Republic thing was never going to work anyway.
translation: 无论如何这整个民国之事永远无法运转了。

original: Let him try.
translation: 让他试试吧。

original: [From.GetLeader] Submits
translation: [From.GetLeader]同意了

original: [From.GetLeader] has sent the messenger back with a personal note, promising strict obedience and welcoming [MAN.GetLeader] as the true leader of China.
translation: [From.GetLeader]已经以个人的名义送回信使，承诺绝对服从并欢迎[MAN.GetLeader]成为中国的真正领袖。

original: He knows his place.
translation: 他清楚他应处的位置。

original: [From.GetLeader] Refuses
translation: [From.GetLeader]拒绝了

original: [From.GetLeader] has replied to our generous offer with a string of insults and curses, making statements about the ancestry and personal qualities of Emperor [MAN.GetLeader] that are both inaccurate and very offensive.
translation: [From.GetLeader]用一连串的侮辱和诅咒答复了我们慷慨的提议，发表了有关我们的皇帝[MAN.GetLeader]的血统和个人素养的极其不准确且无礼的声明。

original: We will teach him manners.
translation: 我们来教教他们什么叫礼仪。

original: The Five Year Plan
translation: 五年计划

original:
The new Five Year Plan detailing how our government expects to grow the economy over the coming years is slowly coming together. Significant differences still exist between the various departments about where the main focus should be. 

While a consensus exists that an expansion of the heavy industry should be the goal, what these new factories should be producing is still under discussion. 

A decision by must be made to break the deadlock.
translation:
新的五年计划详细说明了我们的政府在未来几年中希望的经济增长是如何缓慢实现的。不同部门之间对于主要重点应该在哪仍然存在显著的分歧。

虽然在重工业的扩张应该作为目标上达成了共识，但新的工厂应该生产什么一直在被讨论。

必须做出决定来打破僵局了。

original: Build up our Aviation Industry
translation: 建立我们的航空工业

original: Invest in the Automotive Industry
translation: 投资汽车制造业

original: A general program of Industrialization
translation: 工业化总体规划

original: Arms Factory Sabotaged
translation: 军用工厂被破坏

original: Reports have come in from one of our factories in [state.GetName], reporting that a major fire broke out last night. Local firefighters are still tackling the blaze, but are confident that they will have the fire under control by the end of the day. The damage to the factory appears to be significant, as the fire appears to have started in the storage area for highly flammable chemicals.\n\nMilitary Intelligence has started a thorough investigation to find out how the fire could break out despite the strictest safety measures. First leads indicate arson as a strong possibility.
translation: 来自我们[state.GetName]的一家工厂报告说，昨晚发生了一场大火。当地的消防员仍在救火，但他们有信心在今天结束前控制住火势。火灾对工厂的损坏似乎很严重，因为它可能发生于易燃化学品的储存区。\n\n军事情报部门已经展开了彻底的调查以查明在采取了最严格的安全措施下火灾是如何发生的。第一条线索表明很有可能是纵火。

original: These terrorists must be hunted down!
translation: 这些恐怖分子必须被捉拿归案！

original: Civilian Factory Sabotaged
translation: 民用工厂被破坏

original: Bridge Blown
translation: 桥梁被炸

original:
Sometime during the last night, a major railway bridge in [state.GetName] collapsed under the weight of a passing ammunition train. Rescue and recovery efforts have been made difficult by the secondary exposions from the ammunition. The crew of the train is still missing, presumed dead.

Military Intelligence has dispatched a team to investigate the site as soon as it is safe to do so, to find out how a sturdy bridge could collapse with no warning signs.

Local witnesses report seeing a small group in the valley below the bridge on the day before the collapse. Their whereabouts are currently unknown.
translation:
昨晚的某个时候，位于[state.GetName]的一架大型铁路桥在一列经过的军火列车的重压下坍塌了。弹药的二次爆炸使得救援和回收变得困难。列车机组人员下落不明，估计已经死亡。

军事情报部门派遣了一个小组，一旦安全就立刻调查该地点，以查明一座坚固的桥梁如何在没有任何预警信号的情况下坍塌。

当地目击者报告说坍塌的前一天他们在桥下的山谷里看见了一小群人。这些人的行踪目前不得而知。

original: Civil War Ends
translation: 内战结束

original: The war that has torn our nation has at last ended. We may now begin the task of unifying the people, and of repairing the destruction.
translation: 撕裂我们国家的战争终于结束了。现在我们可以开始团结人民和修复创伤的任务了。

original: Together, we will work for a better future!
translation: 携手共进，为更美好的未来而奋斗！

original: [From.GetAdjective] Attempts to Sabotage Suez
translation: [From.GetAdjective]尝试破坏苏伊士

original: Military intelligence indicates the [From.GetAdjective] intend to use large-scale demolitions and blockships to sabotage the Suez Canal. If we wish to stop them, we do not have much time.
translation: 军事情报表明[From.GetAdjective]打算用大规模爆破和阻塞船来破坏苏伊士运河。如果想要阻止他们的话，我们已经没有多少时间了。

original: We cannot allow this!
translation: 我们不能允许他们这样做！

original: [From.GetAdjective] Attempts to Sabotage Panama
translation: [From.GetAdjective]尝试破坏巴拿马

original: Military intelligence indicates the [From.GetAdjective] intend to use large-scale demolitions and blockships to sabotage the Panama Canal. If we wish to stop them, we do not have much time.
translation: 军事情报表明[From.GetAdjective]打算用大规模爆破和阻塞船来破坏巴拿马运河。如果想要阻止他们的话，我们已经没有多少时间了。

original: [From.GetName] Issues Diplomatic Protest
translation: [From.GetName]提出了外交抗议

original: [From.GetAdjective] envoys have lodged a strong diplomatic protest with our government regarding the presence of our attachés in nations they are currently in a military conflict with. They demand the immediate recall of our military mission.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]的特使就我们的人员在那些当前与他们有军事冲突的国家的存在向我国政府提出了强烈的外交抗议。他们要求立刻撤销我们的军事任务。

original: It is a reasonable request.
translation: 这是一个合理的请求。

original: Our attachés will be sent where we please.
translation: 我们的人员将被派到我们需要的地方。

original: Due to our relative strength and our §Yopinion§! of them this will have the following effect:\n
translation: 由于我们的相对实力和与他们的§Y关系§! 这将会获得以下效果：\n

original: Due to the amount of §YFascism§! support in our country this will have the following effect:\n
translation: 由于§Y法西斯主义§!在我国的支持程度这将会获得以下效果：\n

original: Due to the amount of §YCommunism§! support in our country this will have the following effect:\n
translation: 由于§Y共产主义§!在我国的支持程度这将会获得以下效果：\n

original: Due to the amount of §YDemocratic§! support in our country this will have the following effect:\n
translation: 由于§Y民主主义§!在我国的支持程度这将会获得以下效果：\n

original: Due to the amount of §YUnaligned§! support in our country this will have the following effect:\n
translation: 由于§Y中立§!在我国的支持程度这将会获得以下效果：\n

original: [From.GetName] Recalls Attaché
translation: [From.GetName]召回人员

original: In response to our demands, [From.GetNameDef] has withdrawn their military mission to our enemies.
translation: 为了应对我们的要求，[From.GetNameDef]已经撤销了他们对我们的敌人的军事任务。

original: [From.GetName] Maintains Attaché
translation: [From.GetName]保留人员

original: In spite of our demands, [From.GetNameDef] has refused to withdraw their military mission to our enemies, stating that "we have no business interfering with internal [From.GetAdjective] affairs".
translation: 尽管我们有所要求，[From.GetNameDef]拒绝撤销对我们的敌人的军事任务，并表示"我们无权干涉[From.GetAdjective]的内政"。

original: We will see about that.
translation: 我们等着瞧吧。

original: Wrest control of the canal's banks within the next month to prevent the enemy plan.
translation: 下个月内夺取运河两岸的控制权以阻止敌人的计划。

original: [From.GetName] Falls Ill
translation: [From.GetName]病倒了

original: In [From.GetHerHis] service to [From.From.GetNameDef], it seems [From.GetRank] [From.GetName] has pushed [From.GetHerselfHimself] too far. As a result of the bad climate in their operational area, the [From.GetRank] has now fallen ill, and will likely need some time to recover. Until [From.GetSheHe] gets well, [From.GetSheHe] will not be performing at [From.GetHerHis] usual level.
translation: 在[From.GetHerHis]服务于[From.From.GetNameDef]时，似乎[From.GetRank][From.GetName]过于逼迫[From.GetHerselfHimself]了。由于作战区域的恶劣气候，[From.GetRank]如今已经病倒，可能需要一些时间恢复健康。在[From.GetSheHe]康复之前，[From.GetSheHe]的表现将不会达到[From.GetHerHis]平时水平。

original: [From.GetName] Wounded
translation: [From.GetName]病倒了

original: In bringing the battle to a successful conclusion, it seems [From.GetRank] [From.GetName] put [From.GetHerselfHimself] at a bit too much risk while leading [From.GetHerHis] men. [From.GetSheHeCap] has been wounded, and it will likely take some time for the wounds to fully heal, until which time the [From.GetRank] will not be performing at [From.GetHerHis] usual level.
translation: 为了使这场战斗取得圆满成功，似乎[From.GetRank][From.GetName]在带领[From.GetHerHis]部下的时候使[From.GetHerselfHimself]冒了太多的风险。[From.GetSheHeCap]已经负伤，可能需要一些时间来完全愈合，在此之前[From.GetRank]的表现将不会达到[From.GetHerHis]平时水平。

original: Japanese Provocation at our border
translation: 日本人在我们的边界挑衅

original:
As part of maintaining the demarkation line on the border between us and [JAP.GetNameDef], a work party was sent out to check the demarcation markers near Lake Khasan. When approaching the border, the work party was taken under fire by a local Japanese outpost. 

 We have lodged a formal diplomatic protest, but the Japanese ambassador maintains that the work party was sent to move the markers to allow us to claim more territory.

The Japanese have assured us that they will respect the border but will not allow any "tampering" with the current demarcation and will respond with force should we attempt to do so.

 This effectively means that we can no longer move freely about our territory in the area.
translation:
作为维护我们与[JAP.GetNameDef]边界的分界线的一部分，一个工作小组被派去检查哈桑湖附近的界标。在接近边界的时候，工作小组遭到了当地的一个日本前哨站的攻击。

我们已经提出了正式的外交抗议，但日本大使坚持认为工作小组是被派来移动界标以便我们宣称更多领土的。

日本人像我们保证他们将尊重边界但不会允许任何对当前分界线的"篡改" 并将在我们试图这样做时回应以武力。

 这实际上意味着我们再也不能在这片区域内我们的领土上自由地行动了。

original: Unacceptable.
translation: 难以接受。

original: Japanese Victory at Lake Khasan
translation: 日本人在哈桑湖的胜利

original: Following a clash between [SOV.GetAdjective] and Japanese forces in the border area around Lake Khasan, the [SOV.GetAdjective] forces are reportedly in full retreat. Japanese units have occupied a number of strategic hills around the area and begun to fortify their positions.\n\nDuring the battle, the Japanese captured a number of [SOV.GetAdjective] tanks, which have been shipped to Tokyo for evaluation.
translation: 在[SOV.GetAdjective]与日本军队在哈桑湖周边地区发生冲突后，[SOV.GetAdjective]军队据说已经完全撤退了。日本部队已经占领了该地区的一些战略山头并开始巩固阵地。\n\n在战斗中，日本人缴获了一些[SOV.GetAdjective]坦克，这些坦克已经被运往东京进行评估。

original: We have settled this matter honorably.
translation: 我们已经光荣地解决了这个问题。

original: We must prepare an appropriate response.
translation: 我们必须准备一个适当的回应。

original: Japanese Defeat at Lake Khasan
translation: 日本人在哈桑湖的失败

original: Following a clash between [SOV.GetAdjective] and Japanese forces in the border area around Lake Khasan, the Japanese ambassador in Moscow has requested a cease-fire. \n\n Several Japanese assaults on [SOV.GetAdjective] positions failed with heavy casualties during the battle, raising concerns in the Japanese military about the capabilities of their forces.
translation: 在[SOV.GetAdjective]与日本军队在哈桑湖周边地区发生冲突后，日本驻莫斯科大使要求停火。\n\n日本人在对[SOV.GetAdjective]阵地的几次攻击中伤亡惨重，这引起了日本军方对其部队战斗力的担忧。

original: It is better to fail with honor than never to try at all.
translation: 虽败犹荣总比根本不尝试要好。

original: Our forces have acquitted themselves well.
translation: 我们的部队表现得很好。

original: Stalemate at Lake Khasan
translation: 在哈桑湖的僵局

original: Fighting between Japanese and [SOV.GetAdjective] forces around Lake Khasan has died down after both sides withdrew from the contested region to regroup and resupply. Recognizing the futility of further offensives, the Japanese military has asked for a cease-fire and negotiations to fix the border.
translation: 日本和[SOV.GetAdjective]军队围绕哈桑湖的战斗在双方从争议地区撤出以重新整编和补给后平息了下来。认识到进一步攻击的徒劳后，日本军方要求停火和以谈判解决边界问题。

original: We gained valuable experience.
translation: 我们获得了宝贵的经验。

original: Escalation at Lake Khasan
translation: 在哈桑湖冲突升级

original: Fighting continues between Japanese and [SOV.GetAdjective] forces around Lake Khasan. In an effort to break the dealock, Japanese forces in other areas have also started to engage [SOV.GetAdjective] forces in that sector. Intelligence suggests that the Japanese may soon reinforce the attack with fresh troops transfered from other parts of their Empire.
translation: 日本与[SOV.GetAdjective]军队围绕哈桑湖的战斗仍在继续。为了打破僵局，其他地区的日本军队也开始与[SOV.GetAdjective]军队在这一区域交战。情报表明日本人可能很快就会用从帝国其他地方调来的新部队增援进攻。

original: We must hold the line.
translation: 我们必须守住防线。

original: Soviets Tested
translation: 苏联人经受住了考验

original: Provocation Successful
translation: 挑衅成功

original: Working under the cover of night, our comrades in [JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet] have sabotaged a Japanese factory. Details about the damage done are sparse as the Imperialists have declared the entire area a restricted area.\n\nThis fact alone should tell us that we have struck true. It remains to be seen if this will prompt the Japanese into action.
translation: 伴着夜幕的掩护，我们在[JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet]的同志已经破坏了一座日本工厂。由于帝国主义者宣布整个地区都为禁区，关于造成的伤害的细节很少。\n\n这一事实本身就告诉我们，我们已经打击成功了。此事是否会促使日本人采取行动还有待观察。

original: We've struck the Hornet's Nest.
translation: 我们捅了马蜂窝。

original: Working under the cover of night, our comrades in [JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet] have managed to sabotage a vital bridge. The small commando force reports that the bridge has been completely destroyed and took an ammunition train with it as it collapsed. \n\n\they have made sure to be seen by the locals, making it clear that this was an act of sabotage. It remains to be seen if this will prompt the Japanese into action.
translation: 伴着夜幕的掩护，我们在[JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet]的同志已经成功地破坏了一座重要的桥梁。这支小型突击队报告称这座桥已被彻底摧毁，还在倒塌的时候带走了一列军火列车。\n\n\t他们已经确保得到当地人的注意，明确表示这是蓄意破坏。此事是否会促使日本人采取行动还有待观察。

original: We have successfully ambushed and annihilated a Japanese patrol in [JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet]. Their bodies were left at the scene to make sure the Imperialists get the right message. \n\nTime will tell if they consider this action reasons enough to go to war.
translation: 我们已经成功地在[JAP.GetManchuriaPuppet]伏击并消灭了一支日本巡逻队。他们的尸体被留在现场以确保帝国主义者得到正确的信息。\n\n时间将会证明他们是否认为这一行动足以引发一场战争。

original: We should withdraw from the continent altogether.
translation: 我们应该彻底从大陆上撤出。
